story:
Short Summary

Hello from 3 women passionate about coffee and doing business in a conscious way.  We are so excited about providing high quality organic coffee beans sourced with social responsibility as our priority, as well as supporting earth~friendly farming practices.

Fair Trade coffee empowers farmers  to lift themselves out of poverty by investing in their farms and communities, protecting the environment, and developing the business skills necessary to compete in the global marketplace.

Maine Morning Micro Roasters is committed to serving the greater good and providing fresh, top notch, small batch coffee roasted with love sourced from family farms where people are being supported for their hard work.

What We Need & What You Get

Help us get a leg up!

  • We need $6000 to purchase a micro coffee roaster, associated equipment and complete minor electrical and carpentry work to relocate operations in Nancy's home.
  • We need $500 for commercial insurance so we can sell coffee at our Farmers Markets.
  • We need $1000 for website and logo design and to print marketing materials.

The Impact

  • We want to make a socially and environmentally responsible statement by proving that we can provide amazing coffee in an affordable way that supports the greater good. 
  • Our importer buys our Central American and African coffees directly from the farmer eliminating a middleman, thus making sure the growers are the ones that receive a fair benefit of their labor. Our Bolivian and Costa Rican coffee farmers are paid above market prices for quality coffee beans (usually above Fair Trade guidelines).  The farmer that toiled cultivating our coffee beans was treated with the respect he/she deserves and also received fair compensation for his/her added efforts.
  • Each of us are successful small business owners and find this new path an intelligent and sweet way to combine forces, passions, and to work smart, sharing something we love in a conscious way. 
  • We have had extremely positive responses from our friends, family and community when we told them about this business opportunity that came to us. The previous owners of this small coffee roasting company were already touching many and we got handed an opportunity to bring it to the next level for a reasonable investment.

Risks & Challenges

We are learning the art and science of  care~fully selecting and roasting coffee beans, while maintaining our other businesses and busy lives. In this interim period we are doing all we can to remain balanced and minimize additional commitments while we follow what really excites us, transitioning into ownership of  Maine Morning Micro Roasters.

  • We have been self~employed for a combine total of 32 years! That is a lot of experience in being creative and resourceful to generate a living.
  • We are a team each bringing unique skills to the table that compliment each other very well. From customer service, to attention to detail, to bookkeeping, marketing and having a student's mind, we have all it takes for great success!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please help us in other ways:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!



Copyright - The image used on this page is a Creative Commons licensed picture from taken by Sonny Abesamis.

story:
ABOUT NAKED BACON

We are the Ben and Jerry’s of Bacon. We are one of the first companies to do flavors of bacon, which is what Ben and Jerry’s did for ice cream. Our flavors include Jalapeno, Sugar Free, and Original flavors with more coming soon. We are one of the few companies that makes a sugar free bacon in the country and those who are into paleo, crossfit, and whole eating love our bacon. We are one of only a few bacon companies that is Whole 30 approved. Whole 30 is an all-natural whole foods diet and being whole 30 approved gives us great credibility in the natural foods segment.

          


WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We are a local company in Missouri, yet we have so many people across the country that want Naked Bacon in their area. We currently have hundreds of people order online, but need your support to guarentee nation-wide distribution so you can buy Naked Bacon in a store near you!

We hope to gain distribution to major cities around the U.S. and then expand into smaller communities.  By the end of the year, we plan on being in such cities as:  Los Angeles, San Diego, Chicago, New York City, Miami, Minneapolis, Denver, Boulder, Seattle, Portland, San Francisco, Napa, Phoenix, Atlanta, Dallas, Kansas City, Indianapolis, Columbus, Cleveland, Philadelphia, and Boston.  When we get into these major cities, we can then expand into the surrounding communities and grow throughout the U.S.

This will allow us to substantially grow our distribution network and allow you, yes YOU, to buy Naked Bacon All-Natural goodness throughout the country.




WHAT WE HAVE DONE

In the past year, we have developed packaging and started distribution throughout the St. Louis and Midwest areas.  These locations include:  Schnucks and Dierbergs locations throughout the St, Louis area. Local Harvest Grocery, Lucky's Markets, Potash Brothers Markets-Chicago, Kakao Chocolate, Ladue Market, Global Foods, United Provisions, Planet Health, and Greene's Country Store in Lake St. Louis, 

We ship online to all 50 states and have a large customer base on both the West and East Coasts.

We also started selling Naked Bacon at farmers markets around St. Louis and are even the bacon provider for the St. Louis Rams!


MORE ABOUT THE BACON
Naked bacon is also one of the few pork bacon companies with nutrition characteristics of 44% less fat and 25% less sodium than normal bacon. This claim for our bacon has been approved by the USDA and allows us to place the nutritional claims on our packaging. We achieve this through our proprietary traditional curing methods and secret ingredients.


WE DON'T JUST TASTE GOOD, WE LIKE TO DO GOOD TOO.

That’s why we give a portion of the proceeds from every sale of Naked Bacon to our favorite charities, such as World Food Program USA.

It’s just one more reason to buy Naked Bacon—as if you needed one.


HELP US AND HELP YOURSELF!

Please help us spread the word about Naked Bacon and earn great stuff at the same time!

How it works: Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (to the side of the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about us with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn rewards quickly! You can even track your own progress by visiting your Indiegogo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."


FAQ'S

story:
Love to shop in local stores?  Of course !  So do we.

WHAT IF they could offer you FREE personal shopping and delivery in 30-45 minutes 24/7/365 ?  And pay the same (or lower) price than in-store?

AND WHAT IF you could ALSO order items from other nearby stores for FREE delivery in the same order.  Say, a cheeseburger, groceries, shoes, toys and ?!?

GOOD NEWS! We have the Secret Sauce = proprietary technology, patented business method, systems and experience to grant you Instant Gratification of your time-sensitive orders!  

We successfully created, tested and patented a way to link all local stores and restaurants on an online network we call the SuperCyberCenter® Network.

Donate NOW to be our Top Priority for the SuperCyberCenter Network launch in your zip code. We'll target the first cities to roll out where our donors are located.

Your donation will assist us to install and operate our SuperCyberCenter Network in multiple towns and cities across North America - starting with YOURS.

GET FREE GROCERIES: Your $25 / $50 / $100 donation earns you $25 / $50 / $100 credit to your grocery order on the SuperCyberCenter Network when it is in service in your zip code or the zip code in which you place the order for yourself, a friend, relative or associate. Please see Perks for details.

What is a SuperCyberCenter® Network?

The SuperCyberCenter Network is comprised of local online malls featuring physical stores in local neighborhoods - usually 5 to 7 zip codes per Area.  This enables 30-45 minute shopping and delivery to your home and office.

Major retailers are the Anchor tenants in the SuperCyberCenter Network similar to physical malls. Anchor retailers help attract customers and benefit from joint marketing programs with other smaller retailer and business tenants. This increases local shopping and employment. Communities remain vibrant.

Our role is the Network Coordinator. Our extensive field trials generated millions of orders for customers who became fervent fans of 30-45 minute shopping and delivery from all local SuperCyberCenter Network stores. 

We also learned we needed to enlist the major retailers both as Anchor tenants and as our Major Marketing Partners by offering them the necessary incentives common in every major Bricks and Mortar Regional mall.

 Your donation will be applied in these important areas:

  1. Launch the SuperCyberCenter Network in your city as Priority #1
  2. Travel to major retailers to enlist them as our Marketing Partners
  3. Update our R&D beta website www.TheNowMall.com (use zip 33180 to test)
  4. Fund our Team's attendance and exhibition in industry tradeshows

The growth of Amazon is sucking the lifeblood from local stores – and the speed of this is accelerating fast.  Soon shopping malls will be shadows of their former selves and communities will have greater unemployment. 

Over 4.3 million Americans work in retail stores. These jobs will disappear unless we help local stores offer FREE Delivery of Everything in 30 to 45 Minutes, 24/7/365 = The Ultimate Shopping Convenience®

We provide Rapid Online Order Fulfillment (ROOF) that enables customers to order online or by phone from one or more stores and have their products delivered FREE within 30 to 45 minutes by our team of professional CyberValet Shoppers who go to the stores, buy the products and bring them to the customer immediately (not in arbitrary "windows").

You can order anything that local stores have on their shelves: groceries, fast food, clothing, electronics, hardware, office supplies, toys, etc. with FREE Delivery to your home and office. Imagine what you need and want NOW !! 

Local stores join the SuperCyberCenter Network and advertise to their customers in their stores and online to let them know they now have a way to get immediate FREE delivery instead of using Amazon.  This keeps the store owner in business with added incremental higher-profit sales, the staff employed and customers VERY happy!

Perks:  When you register online with your local SuperCyberCenter Mall, you can choose to be a regular member or an Advantage Member. Just think of your lifestyle improvement with your Advantage Membership service in the SuperCyberCenter Network from these magnificent major retailers and all the other local stores that will come along with them in your local area.  (Amazon charges $99 yearly for Prime Membership and you still don't get 30-45 minute service, let alone FREE delivery that fast - and you're limited to what is in their warehouse.)

Your Advantage Membership includes 5% product discount and ability to place phone orders. Your Advantage Membership confirmation will be sent within 45 days of your donation. The valid time period will begin when these retailers open their part of the service in your zip code.  See Perks for details

Here's our deal:

  • $10 Donation = Autographed copy of Book sent to Top Retailers
  • $25 Donation = 1 year Advantage membership in TheNowMall
  • $50 Donation = 2 years Advantage membership in TheNowMall
  • $75 Donation = 3 years Advantage membership in TheNowMall
  • $100 Donation = 5 years Advantage membership in TheNowMall

We field tested our proprietary technology and marketing programs in many cities with excellent results.  

We bootstrapped our R&D and now your donations are needed to help us launch the SuperCyberCenter Network nationwide - starting with the Areas where our donors live, update our beta R&D website, attend and exhibit in industry tradeshows and meet with major retailers to get them to join us as marketing partners to roll out nationwide.

We met with senior executives of several major retailers and shopping malls who call our program The Holy Grail Of Retail. Your donation will enable us to continue our conversation and enlist their participation. 

These major retailers (e.g. Best Buy, Target, Publix and Walgreens) and shopping malls also have experienced flat or declining sales for years due to Amazon’s growth and all their omnichannel efforts have failed to put them back on track. 

Get our book "INSTANT GRATIFICATION: The Trillion Dollar Retail Market Revealed" as a perk or order on Amazon. It outlines the challenges faced by Bricks and Mortar retailers and the key to their survival.  And it identifies the companies who have tried and failed to copy our Secret Sauce - eBay NOW, Amazon Prime NOW, Google Express.

The major Bricks and Mortar Retailers have the marketing power to lead the way for their neighboring indie store owners to band together in the SuperCyberCenter Network.  We need your donations to enlist these key market leaders to help us roll out nationwide.

When we launch the SuperCyberCenter Network in each new city, we will enroll local stores and businesses on the website so customers can search and shop for products they want assembled and deliverered by our CyberValet Shoppers.  

We will film various aspects of the launch as a marketing tool to help attract additional stores in new cities. As a donor of $25 or more, you can have a cameo role in these launch DVDs!

We're experienced, seasoned and excited to roll out nationally with your help in this campaign. We received a Smithsonian ComputerWorld Award (see pix of Richard Cherry wearing the medal and Gail Nichols co-founder) and President's Task Force Award for pioneering and patenting the virtual call center we called the Willow CyberAgent Network (now called www.Arise.com) that today employs over 25,000 independent customer service reps working from home in the USA, Canada and Great Britain answering calls for large companies.  We will apply our knowledge to providing call assistance to our SuperCyberCenter Network clients.

Our history also includes 35 years’ experience as rapid fulfillment service providers of time-sensitive commodities to Costco, Staples and McDonald's. Our mentors include Harland Sanders, KFC (see picture below with Richard Cherry, our CEO); Tom Monaghan, Domino's Pizza (see Tom and our Indianapolis CyberValet Shopper Team photo below); and Barry Diller, Home Shopping Network. 


We know what to do - we just need your help in raising this "last mile" funding to reach our goal and help keep our neighborhoods vibrant.
story_txt:
Love to shop in local stores?  Of course !  So do we.WHAT IF they could offer you FREE personal shopping and delivery in 30-45 minutes 24/7/365 ?  And pay the same (or lower) price than in-store?AND WHAT IF you could ALSO order items from other nearby stores for FREE delivery in the same order.  Say, a cheeseburger, groceries, shoes, toys and ?!?GOOD NEWS! We have the Secret Sauce = proprietary technology, patented business method, systems and experience to grant you Instant Gratification of your time-sensitive orders!   We successfully created, tested and patented a way to link all local stores and restaurants on an online network we call the SuperCyberCenter®  Network.Donate NOW to be our Top Priority for the SuperCyberCenter Network launch in your zip code. We'll target the first cities to roll out where our donors are located.Your donation will assist us to install and operate our SuperCyberCenter Network in multiple towns and cities across North America - starting with YOURS.GET FREE GROCERIES: Your $25 / $50 / $100 donation earns you $25 / $50 / $100 credit to your grocery order on the SuperCyberCenter Network when it is in service in your zip code or the zip code in which you place the order for yourself, a friend, relative or associate. Please see Perks for details.What is a SuperCyberCenter® Network?The SuperCyberCenter Network is comprised of local online malls featuring physical stores in local neighborhoods - usually 5 to 7 zip codes per Area.  This enables 30-45 minute shopping and delivery to your home and office.Major retailers are the Anchor tenants in the SuperCyberCenter Network similar to physical malls. Anchor retailers help attract customers and benefit from joint marketing programs with other smaller retailer and business tenants. This increases local shopping and employment. Communities remain vibrant.Our role is the Network Coordinator. Our extensive field trials generated millions of orders for customers who became fervent fans of 30-45 minute shopping and delivery from all local SuperCyberCenter Network stores. We also learned we needed to enlist the major retailers both as Anchor tenants and as our Major Marketing Partners by offering them the necessary incentives common in every major Bricks and Mortar Regional mall.
 Your donation will be applied in these important areas:
Launch the SuperCyberCenter Network in your city as Priority #1
Travel to major retailers to enlist them as our Marketing Partners
Update our R&D beta website www.TheNowMall.com (use zip 33180 to test)
Fund our Team's attendance and exhibition in industry tradeshows

The growth of Amazon is sucking the lifeblood from local
stores – and the speed of this is accelerating fast.  Soon shopping malls will be shadows of their
former selves and communities will have greater unemployment. Over 4.3 million Americans work in retail
stores. These jobs will disappear unless we help local stores offer FREE Delivery of Everything in 30 to 45 Minutes, 24/7/365 = The Ultimate Shopping Convenience®

We provide Rapid Online Order Fulfillment (ROOF) that enables customers to order online or by phone from one or more stores and have their products delivered
FREE within 30 to 45 minutes by our team of professional CyberValet Shoppers
who go to the stores, buy the products and bring them to the customer
immediately (not in arbitrary "windows").
You can order anything that local stores have on their
shelves: groceries, fast food, clothing, electronics, hardware, office
supplies, toys, etc. with FREE Delivery to your home and office.
Imagine what you need and want NOW !!  
Local stores join the SuperCyberCenter Network and advertise
to their customers in their stores and online to let them know they now have a way to get
immediate FREE delivery instead of using Amazon.  This keeps the store owner in business with added incremental higher-profit sales, the staff employed and customers VERY happy!
Perks:  When you register online with your local SuperCyberCenter Mall, you can choose to be a regular member or an Advantage Member. Just think of your lifestyle improvement with your Advantage Membership service in the SuperCyberCenter Network from these magnificent major retailers and all the other local stores that will come along with them in your local area.  (Amazon charges $99 yearly for Prime Membership and you still don't get 30-45 minute service, let alone FREE delivery that fast - and you're limited to what is in their warehouse.)Your Advantage Membership includes 5% product discount and ability to place phone orders. Your Advantage Membership confirmation will be sent within 45 days of your donation. The valid time period will begin when these retailers open their part of the service in your zip code.  See Perks for details
Here's our deal:

$10 Donation = Autographed copy of Book sent to Top Retailers 
$25 Donation = 1 year Advantage membership in TheNowMall 
$50 Donation = 2 years Advantage membership in TheNowMall
$75 Donation = 3 years Advantage membership in TheNowMall
$100 Donation = 5 years Advantage membership in TheNowMall

We field tested our proprietary technology and
marketing programs in many cities with excellent results.   We bootstrapped our
R&D and now your donations are needed to help us launch the SuperCyberCenter Network nationwide - starting with the Areas where our donors live, update our beta R&D website, attend and
exhibit in industry tradeshows and meet with major retailers to get them to
join us as marketing partners to roll out nationwide. We met with senior executives of several major retailers and shopping malls who call our program The Holy Grail Of Retail. Your donation will enable us to continue our conversation and enlist their participation. 
These major retailers (e.g. Best Buy, Target, Publix and
Walgreens) and shopping malls also have experienced flat or declining sales for years due to
Amazon’s growth and all their omnichannel efforts have failed to put them back
on track.  Get our book "INSTANT GRATIFICATION: The Trillion Dollar Retail Market Revealed" as a perk or order on Amazon. It outlines the challenges faced by Bricks and Mortar retailers and the key to their survival.  And it identifies the companies who have tried and failed to copy our Secret Sauce - eBay NOW, Amazon Prime NOW, Google Express.The major Bricks and Mortar Retailers have the marketing power
to lead the way for their neighboring indie store owners to band together in
the SuperCyberCenter Network.  We need
your donations to enlist these key market leaders to help us roll out nationwide. When we launch the SuperCyberCenter Network in each new city, we will enroll local stores and businesses on the website so customers can search and shop for products they want assembled and deliverered by our CyberValet Shoppers.  We will film various aspects of the launch as a marketing tool to help attract additional stores in new cities. As a donor of $25 or more, you can have a cameo role in these launch DVDs!

We're experienced, seasoned and excited to roll out
nationally with your help in this campaign. We received a Smithsonian
ComputerWorld Award (see pix of Richard Cherry wearing the medal and Gail Nichols co-founder) and President's Task Force Award for pioneering and patenting the virtual
call center we called the Willow CyberAgent Network (now called www.Arise.com) that today employs over
25,000 independent customer service reps working from home in the USA, Canada and Great Britain answering calls for large
companies.  We will apply our knowledge to providing call assistance to our SuperCyberCenter Network clients.Our history also includes 35 years’ experience as rapid fulfillment
service providers of time-sensitive commodities to Costco, Staples and McDonald's. Our mentors include
Harland Sanders, KFC (see picture below with Richard Cherry, our CEO); Tom Monaghan, Domino's Pizza (see Tom and our Indianapolis CyberValet Shopper Team photo below); and Barry Diller, Home Shopping
Network.  We know what to do - we just
need your help in raising this "last mile" funding to reach our goal and help keep our neighborhoods vibrant.

story:
Echotopia LLC is a zero waste, biodiversity building company in Baltimore. We  sell green cleaning powder products at farmers markets:

  • Lavender, Sage and Rosemary Laundry Powder 
  • Lemon Thyme All-purpose Scouring Scrub
  • Hint-of-mint Hand Scrub

Together, let's clean up our region!

  • Zero waste Products sold in refillable glass jars and unbleached cotton bags. 
  • Affordable refills Customers can just buy the powders, saving money and packaging waste.
  • Organic, biodegradable ingredients Natural ingredients that won't harm our ecosystem.
  • Fragrant home grown herbs Lavender, rosemary, thyme, sage, lemon balm, and peppermint. 
  • Biodiversity For every sale, an Echotopia Seed Round is planted, sowing native perennial wildflowers. 
  • Fair trade, U.S. economy All materials come from small, regional sources.
  • Local business and artisans We are partners with Jonathan's Spoons of Pennsylvania, a Baltimore seamstress,  a regional silkscreen company and others.

What We Need 

It's taken almost three years to develop our unique business model. Now, in order to realize the dream of a zero waste company, Echotopia needs your support! 

We need $30,000 so we can increase our presence at markets, establish a customer base, and enable our customers to conveniently get refills.  

Our expenses include: materials, insurance, legal, marketing, licensing, bookkeeping, research and development, vendors, utilities, rent, office supplies, technology, transport, labor and more.

What You Get

First and foremost, your support reduces waste in the Mid-Atlantic region, decreasing our dependence on incinerators and landfills, and showing people elsewhere that it can be done. 

If that's not enough for you, we also have great gifts! 

Together, We're the Change

Your funding will support Echotopia as we gain a customer base. No donation is too small, and please share our campaign! 

Echotopia treasures nature, place, and people. 

No matter where you live, you can help make Baltimore's first zero-waste company a reality.

story:
Who We Are

ZipCV is the first machine learning matching job recruitment system. We use a scientific approach to landing a job. Using big science and data to match people to jobs, ZipCV uses "active factors," an algorithm that measures the fit of the candidate to the job. The highest-graded candidate's resume is sent directly to the recruiter through automated submission, removing the manual effort and cost of processing for recruitment.

With a team of fewer than 15 people, we are less than a month away from launch and are currently seeking funding to help jump-start our company and idea. Our vision is to simplify the employment process for anyone and everyone - students, military veterans, recent college graduates, and more. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently seeking $6000 in funding. The money will go to helping launch our startup as well as to causes we care about. 

Causes we will donate a portion of our funding:

We will donate 20% of our $100 perks to Team Rubicon!
Team Rubicon: http://www.teamrubiconusa.org/
Team Rubicon seeks to provide our veterans with three things they lose after leaving the military: a purpose, gained through disaster relief; community, built by serving with others; and self-worth, from recognizing the impact one individual can make.

We will donate 20% of our $50 perks to: Goodwill Southern California!
Goodwill Southern California: http://www.goodwillsocal.org/
Whatever barriers to employment you face, Goodwill Southern California is here to help. We believe in the transformative power of work and are deeply committed to helping individuals with disabilities and other vocational challenges secure sustainable employment and enjoy a greater sense of independence, dignity, purpose and pride.



The Impact

  • ZipCV aims to help America's unemployed as well assisting young professionals and College graduates to start or further their careers. ZipCV gives power to job seekers by not only allowing them to see how good of a fit they are for the various positions they are applying for, but by also taking the work out of finding work. With other job hunting technologies or traditional practices, the job seeker is doing just that: Hunting constantly for a job, manually going through job post after job post, ad after ad and manually applying to each one. With ZipCV you simply setup your profile, enter your resume, cover-letter and job search criteria, then ZipCV does the rest.
  • For Job Posters ZipCV offers small businesses and recruiters a competitive alternative to various high end job matching or head hunting services. ZipCV's proprietary matching algorithm scours through all of the available CVs and Resumes in our system to find the best candidates for your position. These candidates are graded into Gold Silver and Bronze matching results, saving you time so you can review only the best candidates for your position. For job posters or recruiters that have to fill many positions on a regular basis we offer a special subscription package with reduced posting rates and our automated head hunting service.
Our team is growing everyday. From experienced developers to college students, we are working round the clock to make ZipCV into a reality.

story:
My back hurts!

If you are a mobile massage therapist, you know very well how difficult it is to go from appointment to appointment carrying all your stuff - massage beds aren't the smallest, or lightest, things to carry around. In and out of the car, up and down stairs, through doorways, setting up. By the time you've done a days work, it's YOU that needs a massage!

Sound familiar? When I trained as a massage therapist back in 1998, I experienced the same problems, as did many of my fellow students (we had to bring our own beds to each class). That was when I asked the question "what if they folded up smaller, to the size of a sports bag?" And the idea was born. Sixteen  years later ...

Introducing ..... microCOUCH

microCOUCH looks and functions like any other massage bed when setup and in use, but quite different when it comes to moving it! Instead of folding in half like other beds, microCOUCH is made up of six sections and folds in on itself down to the size of a small suitcase. This makes transporting it from place to place easy. It also has a unique leg arrangement. There are no leg support braces and no cables! Each leg has it's own locking catch. Simply pull back the spring loaded catch, swing the leg down and let it 'click' into place. So less setting up time.


Traditional massage tables are typically constructed from wood, with either wooden or aluminium legs. microCOUCH will be made from High Density Polyethylene (HDPE), which is not only very strong, but also lightweight.

We hope that microCOUCH will transform the way in which mobile therapists do their business. No more sore backs.

microCOUCH. Smaller. Lighter. Easier.


Status of the project & next steps

We've spent the last twelve months designing the product and testing the prototypes, and now we are finally ready to start the production, but we need your help.

As of today, all the manufacturers are ready to begin production and your support on our campaign will help us to:

  • Order the moulds for plastic injection
  • Order materials
  • Assemble the product
  • Quality test and inspection
  • Design, produce and manufacture the packaging
  • Shipping to our warehouse
  • International shipping to your home.

We are optimistic about shipping out microCOUCH in the first weeks of September.


Perks




Colour Range


Your help

We are really excited about this, and we hope you are, too. Now we need your help to bring microCOUCH to life.

As a supporter you will get your microCOUCH at a very special price! So please consider backing our project, and share it with your friends.


Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn microCOUCH into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, or other sharing buttons, and let the world know about microCOUCH!

Thank you for visiting our campaign.

story:
Short Summary

The overall purpose of the project is to showcase the wide range of talented women in our industry, and to inspire women to explore their interests in the automotive and motorsports fields. 

The project vehicle, a 1969 AMC AMX, will serve as a platform for women in the industry to design, fabricate, and ultimately build a uniquely powerful and equally beautiful car. Then, go out and race it!

We are seeking funding to be able to bring students into this project to mentor them as well as support the overall project expenses.  As most know, as a student, funds can often times be the hurdle between you and a special opportunity  to join a project that provides a unique resume building experience. It's one thing we don't want them to worry about.

The Car will debut on the Hot Rod Power Tour where we will showcase it along with take it to Children's Hospitals along the route so they can sit and have their picture taken with it.   http://www.hotrod.com/events/power-tour/

Lastly, we are hoping to showcase the car at the SEMA Show.  Here we can show off the talents of these women to hundreds of thousands of people who share in the enthusiasm of this industry... hoping to inspire other woman to join in the fun of building their own car.

So are you ready and inspired to join in on this unique project to encourage and support woman in a heavily populated male industry??

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise $25,000
  • Any amount donated will get your name on our "cool people" wall on our website.  You can brag to friends that you are super cool to the women of WarriorProjects.com

The Impact

The National Institute for Automotive Service Excellence reports the number of certified female technicians has more than tripled in last 10 years, yet women still represent less than 1 percent of the total ASE-certified technicians. Industry experts suggest that women often do not consider auto service careers because of the industry’s gritty, male-dominated image. Yet, some employers are actively recruiting women in service departments because of their ability to relate to customers. Source: Donna Harris, “High-Tech Service Careers Attract More Women,” Automotive News, Detroit

We are working on changing this statistic by encouraging women to get more involved. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to reach out to your friends and family.  
  • Go to our webpage www.warriorprojects.com and sign up in support of our project.

story:
Youth for Palestine is a non-profit organisation set up, and run by a group of young activists, who aspire to raise more awareness of the situation in Palestine. Next to (online) informative campaigns, we try to raise money, or other goods, to lend a helping hand towards the Palestinians.

Now we are part of a collaborated fundraising project, to install solar panels for the Dar Essalam Hospital in Gaza. This hospital provides the poorest of southern Gaza with medical attention. However it is dependent on Israeli electricity, because the last power plant in Gaza was destroyed in the 57-day siege of 2014.

What We Need


Our goal is to raise 10.000 euro, together with the collaborating parties, to pay for the solar panels. Everything from transport, to instalment has been arranged, the only thing left is the money to finance it. We have already successfully raised funds for other projects such as fundraising for school supplies to provide orphans, and we where able to help other funds such as Medical Appeal for Gaza. We want to keep on helping the Palestinians, and try to give them the tools to rebuild and go forward!

The Impact


With the solar panels, we want to give back some independence, and help assure that they always have electricity. In Gaza, hospitals already have a very hard time getting around, and providing as much medical aid as possible, with the few tools and medicine they have. It is not uncommon that electricity gets cut off by Israel. And gas for emergency generators, is also scarce. Consequently, emergency surgeries have been performed with the lights of small telephones or other devices, in unventilated and unsteralized operation rooms, with a risk of infection. The Dar Essalam hospital especially, has an important role in southern Gaza for it also provides medical attention to the poorest of Gaza, with its “Poor Patient Fund”. With your help, we can stop the power shortage, and reassure the doctors and patients.

Other Ways You Can Help


Of course, if you would like to help our campaign aside from donating you can. Share this campaign on your social media platforms, and get the message as far as possible.

No Paypal and No Creditcard ?!? No worries !

If donating through Indiegogo is difficult for you , you can transfer you donation to : NL 94 INGB 0006360364 in the name of ''Stichting Palestina te Rotterdam'' , citing "Light for Gaza YFP "

you can. Share this campaign on your social media platforms, and get the message
as far as possible.
No Paypal and No Creditcard ?!? No worries ! If donating through Indiegogo is difficult for you , you can transfer you donation to : NL 94 INGB 0006360364 in the name of ''Stichting Palestina te Rotterdam'' , citing "Light for Gaza YFP "

story:
Betty Lou's was found by myself Liz Samways, I wanted to be able to offer people the chance to get involved with vintage fashion at an affordable prices and allow talented local creative people a place to work or sell their goods.

I opened the current salon with only £100 I have worked 80+ hours a week building the business into what it is now, using all the money it made to grow and be able to offer more services. Local interest has grown so quietly. 2014 saw the exciting new addition of our Tattoo Parlour, offering great quality custom designs in a safe, clean and friendly environment.

As a Vegan myself I am always looking for products which are animal friendly.

After spending months researching vegan products which are able to offer the same if not better results than their animal non-friendly competitors, I'm ready to launch the first 100% vegan hair salon and tattoo parlour. Everyone should be able to look amazing with out any animals being harmed!! We believe this is how the future of all businesses and we want to be the first to lead the way!

The big difference between vegan beauty products and other products is the animal ingredients. For people who do not want any animals harmed for their beauty it is the only way to go.

Animal ingredients are quite common in all of our personal care products. Beeswax, lanolin and collagen and some colour additives are a few of the more commonly used ingredients used. Unless you know which ingredients come from animals it is not always easy to tell.

All products used in salon will be 100% vegan including all hair colours, shampoos and conditioners, nail polishes, tattoo inks, transfer papers down to the cleaning products we use.

All of the vegan products we will use with in the salon and tattoo parlour will be:

Safe

Natural, organic if possible.

Without animal testing.

Without animal ingredients.

Made by companies who are environmentally responsible.

Always a plus, some ingredients sourced fair trade.


The money raised will allow us to transfer over to completely vegan products and also give us money to keep promoting vegan beauty! Betty Lou Salon does many events such as Brighton Burlesque Festival, Bestival, numourous wedding fairs and has been featured in ect magazing, BN1 magazing, Vintage Brighton and We love Brighton Blog. We get lots of exposure and would love for our message to not just be about amazing service and products but also that it can be done in a way which has no negative impact on our planet.

story:
This year

has been rough.  This year? Okay. The past 27 years have been rough. This year in particular I was diagnosed with Fibromyalgia, a chronic pain disorder that people with depression have a predisposition to. It also can be brought on by a trigger such as PTSD (my diagnose from shortly after my dad passing).

The tricky thing about Fibro is there isn't much information out there about it yet. And medicating the disease is pretty much a crapshoot. The first medication they put me on spiked my depression and landed me in the hospital. I have talked for years and years about how bad my depression and anxiety have been. In the two weeks that they had me on, let's call it "ZimBalta", I was questioning my desire to live and fighting every muscle and bone in my body that were ready to give up.

After a week in the hospital and $50,000 later they weened me off "ZimBalta" and tried me on "Myrica". "Myrica" was actually helping until the auditory and visual hallucinations started. Nothing scarier than being a single, alone, 27 year old girl who keeps slipping out of reality. I got to the point where I removed the dials from my stove and tried my hardest to keep myself safe which was feeling more and more out of my control as the medication kicked in.

After an MRI and some testing, it was determined that "Myrica" was causing the hallucinations and hopefully in weening me off of them I would start to get better mentally, but there were still no answers on how to treat my condition physically. 

What We Need & What You Get

I am tired of being sick and tired. I am tired of being behind with every bill as this year has left me unable to work for large periods of time. I am ready to be well and I am ready to do good. In raising money I promise to take everything passed on to me and pay it forward with my time, experience, words, and love. 

I am currently in need of a piece of shit car, a functioning computer, and just enough to get caught up financially and pay my medical insurance. 

With your help, I promise to spend my time becoming a volunteer and friend to many in need who have been through the same struggles I have. I will be volunteering with a suicide hotline, a sexual abuse hotline/support group, a fibromyalgia support group, and a loss and grief support group.  Every penny raised will just increase my ability to do what I believe I was put on this earth to do, and that's to be there for others and give back as much to this world as I have taken from it. 

The Impact

I believe everything happens for a reason.  Which is crazy considering my past of abuse, struggle, and loss.  But if what happened to me, and the things I have experienced can help or change one person's life - then surviving this all will mean something.

I just want a chance to show the world how beautiful I see it. 

Other Ways You Can Help

A share of this page to me is just as valuable as a dollar raised.  I also find great benefit in words of encouragement, shared stories of love and loss, and any assistance finding a cheap car or computer so I can continue to network, meet strangers and make them smile.

story:
Short Summary

I am an innovative go-getter, and looking to further enrich the lives of others.  I've run and operated different and successful businesses over the years.  This business idea will be a winner!


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the Word. Re-post and Tweet and send Emails with impunity for the next 30-days.  Be a part of the breakthrough of breathing new life into the future of meeting others safely online.

·  Please share my Campaign with your Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+, Twitter followers, and anywhere else you can think to share.

·  Please email my Campaign URL to your friends, business associates, and anyone and everyone, you can think of to help support my Campaign.

You may feel like a drop in the bucket, but every drop counts!  So, please, don’t delay or turn away, because your contribution definitely makes a difference.

story:
The Idea

We are two friends who like to have fun and always willing to try new experiences. Blob grabbed our attention since the first time we saw it in one of the episodes of Jackass. Since my friend and I both like spending time on the beach, we decided to build the Blob on one of the European beaches in Romania. It was the best decision ever! People fell in love with Blob from the first day it got available to the public. We had 4000 jumps a month. We were happy to bring a new type of entertainment to the Romanian beach and we also enjoyed watching people having fun trying it. 

Now it's time to bring it to New York!! There is no better way to have more satisfaction and adrenalin than Blobbing! We are eager to introduce Blob to New York beaches this summer so people can experience a new way of having fun at the shore. 


What is Blobbing
Check out the videos below to understand what's Blobbing is. It is a recreational activity in which one is launched into the air from inflatable trampoline. The feel of free fly brings adrenalin rush and people want to jump again and again! The videos provided below are from different beaches, so you can see for yourself how simple Blob jumping changes ordinary beach time to fun time. 








Yes! This is Blobbing! Aren't you excited? We are! We like it very much and would like everyone to experience it for themselves. 

What we want

I believe we already got your attention and you can't wait to try Blobbing yourself! We would like to put the Blob on New York beaches this summer and we need your support. Only with your contribution we can make it happen. Please join us in this journey and you won't be disappointed.


Why Indiegogo ?

We are confident about success of Blobbing in New York. Crowdfunding will allow us to create something together. Your contributions are valuable and will reinforce the idea of having this recreational activity in New York. We will start with Coney Island Beach first, but would like to introduce the Blob to all famous New York beaches later. It will depend on how many people will support the idea. So we need as much people as possible. If you like our idea, please spread the word to people of New York. Tell your friends to support us on Indiegogo for priority access. 

When Blob is live on the beach, everyone would want to try it! 

We came up we the idea, we know how to do it. Now it's your turn to make it happen. 


Risks and Challenges 

There is a probability that the Blob could not be installed on Coney Island Beach due to New York Parks Department. There were several cases where NYC Park Department issued approval to other recreational activities, however canceled them later. Fortunately, there are lots of other beaches. And with your help and support we will put the Blob on the best beaches. That is why it is important that our Indiegogo campaign to be successful and has as much support as possible. 


What You Get

Your contributions will be rewarded! Check the Perks!
The most important reward is that you, as a supporter, will get to Blob any day you want, on any beach of New York where Blob is located.


What else can I do to help?

Thought you'd never ask! Please share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, E-mail and any other tools, using the Indiegogo tools at the top left of this page. The more we can spread the word about this, more people will have fun!

story:
My name is Judah Briskin, and any serious social activist intent on leaving their mark needs an entity in which to build the movement, and for me it’s the Freedom League of Universal Consciousness.

It is the mission of Freedom League of Universal Consciousness (F.L.O.U.C.) to foster progressive social change through the advancement, development and empowerment of the black community.

The organization will be organized in Florida, with the intention of having chapters all across the country, and will focus on economic development, schooling/training, education, self-defense, literary works, health, spirituality, and building self-esteem/awareness.

 

In order to get the movement started this is how the funds will be spent:

$3,000 to secure location for first chapter.

$2,000 for administrative tasks, and organization.

$2,000 for marketing materials.

$1,000 for web development.

$1,000 for launch rally.

$500 for literature printing.

$500 for miscellaneous expenses.

Any black person who gives a donation of $50 will get free membership to the organization, and be exempt from the first year's membership dues.

Also any donation of $100 or more you will be awarded a plaque , and reconized by the organiztaion as an economic freedom fighter!

 

The Impact

For too long many of our people have sat idly by why our people still face injustice, poverty, and oppression. I will not be one of those people, with your help I plan to build an organization that will galvanize our people to bring about prosperity, and empowerment.

You can be apart of the beginning stages of a movement that can take this land by storm. We are all we have as a people, and let's show not only ourselves, but the world that we can unite, and make life better for all of us.

 

To reduce the chances of failure, and ensure the purity of the movement white sources for funding are not an option including their banks, and grants. I want this to be for the people by the people from inception!

Help me hit the streets, and bring about change for our people. Even if you can't give a donation, help me spread the word! Share the campaign, talk to friends, and family.

When the I is replaced with WE our illness as a people shall become wellness! We can do this!

ONE NATION, ONE GOD, ONE LOVE!

story:
I'm sure you're wondering who I am....

I'm just a dreamer and my name is Salah, and I think I'm a very lucky person who managed to get out of the west-bank cage a short few times. Sometime recently, I managed to live abroad for quiet a long time in Europe, mainly in Poland for about 15 months, which gave me the chance to see different countries and meet lots of free spirits and great people from all around the world. 

Cheap and low cost budget travel always interested me, I've always done it and helped others as well. I hosted people, Surfed others couches, beds, and floors. I traveled, hitchhiked and took share cars in several countries. As well as it is known worldwide Palestine is one of the most interesting places to visit by so many different people and for so many different reasons with as many different perspectives.

Unfortunately due to so many barriers and restrictions, the hosting and couchsurfing idea is not as popular as it should be, you might not know, but occupation makes it really hard for people to trust strangers and international people, although the people here are so very welcoming and hospitable. So here came my idea in order to make the idea of hosting a bit more popular and more accepted. I decided to start my hostel, my hostel is kind of low cost hostel and free hosting place to enable students and low budget travelers to visit and to see the city of Bethlehem the city of Jesus which is the city I came from and low budget means. Travelers will be able to stay for just less than $10 a night in a hostel, taking into consideration that the cheapest other hostel in Bethlehem would cost a person more than $20 a night for low standard Hostel.

I will also be offering many free one night stays to travelers and I hope they will want to stay many more nights.So many advantages can be gained by having this hostel in the heart of the West Bank in a little town called Doha, which is only 10 to 15 minutes by public transportation or a 30 to 40 minutes walk to the old town of Bethlehem and the Nativity Church and besides that Bethlehem is located in the center of West Bank which allows travelers to visit both Jerusalem and Hebron and return to Bethlehem without the need of staying in a very closed and restricted area like Hebron or a very expensive and crowded area like Jerusalem.So why would you donate?Well donating is not going to bring you a high standard hotel stay in Bethlehem or luxurious service or anything like that, but certainly your donations will be in their best place by giving a chance to people from all around the world to come visit, support, and see the hometown of Jesus which has been under occupation for so long. Your donations will help spread the word around the world and give the truth a loud voice and make it more accessible.

If you donate you will be able to stay with us for free in the future you will be able to have influence on our decorations, and you will be welcomed to join us for Palestinian traditional food, nice and free tours around the town of Bethlehem as well as use of all the facilities we have in the future because of your support.

story:
Who is Vanity Bar ?

The concept for Vanity Bar was born when I realized that some of my best memories with my friends were of us all together getting ready to go out. Sometimes the pre-party was better than the destination.

Vanity Bar is the perfect place to go to before:

  • Date
  • Girls Night Out
  • Interview
  • Anytime you just want a pick-me-up

We even have memberships for the every day celebrity. Never have to dry your hair again or do your own makeup - you'll be surprised how affordable it is!

This campaign is important to Vanity Bar because it allows us to give our clients a chance to get our business off the ground while getting an amazing insider deal. This is your chance to get in on the ground floor to be involved in the next beauty hot spot.

I have personally been in the beauty industry for 12 years. I spent 6 years learning as an apprentice before moving on to becoming an educator and senior stylist in Yorkville. Around two years ago I went to spend a year in Miami and Manhattan - this is where I fell in love with the Blowdry Bar concept. It brought me back to why I'm so passionate about beauty - making women feel beautiful, confident and sexy is the by far one of best feelings in the world!

Help us lift the veil on the beauty industry to create a approachable, comfortable and affordable environment where you leave feeling amazing and beautiful every time.


Service List

(Regular pricing)

Blowout or Makeup - $37  [add $7-$10 for thick hair, extensions or lashes]

Blowout & Makeup combo - $70  [add $7-$10 for thick hair, extensions or lashes]

Hair & Makeup touch-up - $45  [arrive with your hair and skin prepped, we do the rest]

5 Service Package - $150 [Blowout / Makeup]

Membership - $120/month
*UNLIMITED appointments
- one service per appointment included (add $30 for combo)



What We Need & What You Get

Your perks go towards:
  • Building supplies and construction (the bar and lather lounge)
  • Inventory ( Our own Makeup line, Hair Products and tools,a cafe, liquors and of course champagne!)
  • Licensing, permits, legal fees, and the Lease will be covered with this investment.

Our Perks are the services we will offer for a discount:

  • Blowouts, makeup, combos and memberships priced as Vanity Bar's way of saying THANK YOU for all our supporters!

The funds we raise will go towards opening Vanity Bar - the funds not raised will be acquired from a small business loan. Vanity Bar will open this Spring/Summer so all perks will be redeemable. 


The Impact

Your contributions will go a long way. This project is important to myself and all of our clients (present and future) because Toronto needs a reliable beauty bar that has taken care of everything and makes it easy. We need affordable luxury! All of our stylists are makeup AND hair artists which makes booking a service so much easier. I believe bridging the gap between hair and makeup while keeping our price-point honest and affordable is important for the industry because that's what every client really wants. 

Blow dry bars are popping up everywhere in cities like New York and Miami but this takes it to the next level. Our opening hours makes it easy to book a last minute appointment for early in the morning (by appointment only) or late at night (open till midnight Thursday - Saturday). Having stylists who are well versed in both hair and makeup means you'll always be able to get what you want.
We have some of the best educators on our team to train and inspire our stylists so we can unleash their creativity and manifest their artistry - this makes a true professional.

Risks & Challenges

Our only risk is not reaching our fundraising goal. The remaining funds will be  raised through a Government secured small business loan to secure our location and supplies.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word! Email vanitybarTO@gmail.com for little clips to post on your social media and get others to hear our story. Or you can simply share our Indiegogo link.
story_txt:
Who is Vanity Bar ?
The concept for Vanity Bar was born when I realized that some of my best memories with my friends were of us all together getting ready to go out. Sometimes the pre-party was better than the destination. 
Vanity Bar is the perfect place to go to before:


Date
Girls Night Out
Interview
Anytime you just want a pick-me-up

We even have memberships for the every day celebrity. Never have to dry your hair again or do your own makeup - you'll be surprised how affordable it is!
This campaign is important to Vanity Bar because it allows us to give our clients a chance to get our business off the ground while getting an amazing insider deal. This is your chance to get in on the ground floor to be involved in the next beauty hot spot. 
I have personally been in the beauty industry for 12 years. I spent 6 years learning as an apprentice before moving on to becoming an educator and senior stylist in Yorkville. Around two years ago I went to spend a year in Miami and Manhattan - this is where I fell in love with the Blowdry Bar concept. It brought me back to why I'm so passionate about beauty - making women feel beautiful, confident and sexy is the by far one of best feelings in the world!Help us lift the veil on the beauty industry to create a approachable, comfortable and affordable environment where you leave feeling amazing and beautiful every time. 
Service List
(Regular pricing)
Blowout or Makeup - $37  [add $7-$10 for thick hair, extensions or lashes]
Blowout & Makeup combo - $70  [add $7-$10 for thick hair, extensions or lashes]
Hair & Makeup touch-up - $45  [arrive with your hair and skin prepped, we do the rest]
5 Service Package - $150 [Blowout / Makeup]
Membership - $120/month *UNLIMITED appointments - one service per appointment included (add $30 for combo)


  What We Need & What You GetYour perks go towards:   Building supplies and construction (the bar and lather lounge)

Inventory ( Our own Makeup line, Hair Products and tools,a cafe, liquors and of course champagne!)
Licensing, permits, legal fees, and the Lease will be covered with this investment.

Our Perks are the services we will offer for a discount:
 Blowouts, makeup, combos and memberships priced as Vanity Bar's way of saying THANK YOU for all our supporters! 


The funds we raise will go towards opening Vanity Bar - the funds not raised will be acquired from a small business loan. Vanity Bar will open this Spring/Summer so all perks will be redeemable. 
   The Impact Your contributions will go a long way. This project is important to myself and all of our clients (present and future) because Toronto needs a reliable beauty bar that has taken care of everything and makes it easy. We need affordable luxury! All of our stylists are makeup AND hair artists which makes booking a service so much easier. I believe bridging the gap between hair and makeup while keeping our price-point honest and affordable is important for the industry because that's what every client really wants.   Blow dry bars are popping up everywhere in cities like New York and Miami but this takes it to the next level. Our opening hours makes it easy to book a last minute appointment for early in the morning (by appointment only) or late at night (open till midnight Thursday - Saturday). Having stylists who are well versed in both hair and makeup means you'll always be able to get what you want. We have some of the best educators on our team to train and inspire our stylists so we can unleash their creativity and manifest their artistry - this makes a true professional.    Risks & ChallengesOur only risk is not reaching our fundraising goal. The remaining funds will be  raised through a Government secured small business loan to secure our location and supplies. 
  Other Ways You Can Help Help us spread the word! Email vanitybarTO@gmail.com for little clips to post on your social media and get others to hear our story. Or you can simply share our Indiegogo link.

story:
Are you feeling generous? Welcome to our latest "A Dollar And A Dream" challenge.

Hi, my name is Kevin (The brother in the pitch image with a black tee on the right) from a music, arts and techie collective in Nairobi, Kenya and I’m nominating you for this awesome challenge.

Here’s the challenge:

1. You have been dreaming of donating books, computers, paintings, clothes and more to your favorite charity=A Dream.

2. This challenge will allow you to use your brilliant mind to turn all of this into dollars so you can donate to this amazing cause=A Dollar.

Let us illustrate:

1. Tracie who has a Salon has been dreaming of a make over donation to an amazing cause=Tracie’s Dream

2. Tracie calculates the value of the make over and it comes to $140 that he will use to donate to this amazing cause=Tracie’s Dollar

Yes it's that simple,and the good thing about this is that Wasanii Mtaani will make these resplendent dreams come true :-)

Is it true that Wasanii Mtaani sounds Chinese?

False. Wasanii Mtaani is Swahili for Artists in the Hood. We are a youth organization that mainly do music, sustainability, arts,activism and technology projects. We provide a platform for Underground Emcees who are both visual and verbal artists while at the same time creating positive social change in our community.

Check out our blog here 

Check out our page here 

Check out a sample program we help organize  here

Check out a video of the Afrikan Hiphop Caravan Nairobi chapter here 

What We Need & What You Get

For most of you that are on this type of grind you recognize that as donors, supporters and contributors budgets get tighter and tighter the rate of out of pocket expenses continue to increase. And we don’t have that kind of money.We need to raise 999 dollars to offset that extra dollar of running our projects on a day to day basis within the next few weeks.

So we're turning to our strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, we're giving you the chance to share in the joy of giving. (Yes you heard me right there are no perks but you never know we could throw you a couple Afrikan Hiphop mixes).

If we don't reach our goal this means that a few establishments here and there could be derailed. For Instance, an awesome international cooperation project travel opportunity could be turned down due to expensive visa fees and local transport fees yet airtickets were paid for.

The Impact

You will share in the joy of promoting excellence in the arts, technology and visual arts sector. Empowering these beautiful people socially, politically and economically and lastly you will aid us in our mission of incorporating Eco-sustainability ethos in our work.

Other Ways You Can Help

·   Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about our Dollar A Day campaign .

·  Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools or  give a shout in your blog,website ,link,radio show or other media!

story:
Hi, I'm Jess - campaign founder of Jessica's Promise. 

I've teamed up with some very good friends and fellow volunteers to fight for the lives of people battling blood cancers like Leukaemia. 

After losing both parents before the age of 15, I made a promise that I would do anything I could think of to make sure other mums and dads could beat cancer and be around to watch their children grow. 

So, other mums and dads battling cancer out there: for you - we won't stop fighting. 
We're holding a fundraising event to help us reach our campaign fundraising target of £10,000. Our event sold out in 15 days, bringing 180 members of the local community together to unite in our fight against the devastating effects of cancer. This campaign is extremely important to me because whilst I cannot change how my story ended, raising money for this charity means we can all be a part of re-writing someone else's - by saving the lives of desperately ill patients, and changing the world for their whole family. I cannot allow cancer to cause anybody else to lose what I lost, or live how I've lived. You can read more about my story in the MailOnline article here: http://dailym.ai/1HU97Hh

Below are details of the funding we need in order to host this event and where it will go: 

£450 : Hiring the sound equipment required 

£200: Hiring a DJ for the event

£250: An Entertainment Performance for our 180 guests 

£100:  Decorating the event space 

If we don't reach our entire goal, all funds raised here will contribute towards the above costs associated with holding this event. But it's really important to us that as much of the money raised as possible goes towards our fundraising target and towards fighting for the lives of people battling cancer, which is why we need your help. 
Contributors to this project will be saving lives, and changing mine. Growing up without either of my parents has meant that a huge part of me will always be missing. But I had fourteen incredible years of having a family - and I have a responsibility to fight for more moments and more tomorrows for other people facing cancer as a thank you for those unforgettable adventures. 

Thank you for believing in more adventures too. 

PS:
Don't forget: there are other ways you can help us if you can't spare any pennies at the moment. Please share our campaign using the social media tools on this page, and help us reach more people and save more lives. 
Thank you for helping us to save lives, and for helping me to keep my promise.

story:
* Pray for Nepal, we are going to donate 10% (or minimum $1; whichever is greater) of contributions to the relief fund for Nepal earthquake. So, if you support us with $2 perks, we will pay $1 for the relief of Nepal victims.


Spectee - The smart and intelligent social travel guide with nearby SNS for visitors to Japan 

Spectee is a location-based information distribution platform that curates and analyzes tweets and Instagram posts in real time. The platform collects every contribution from Twitter and Instagram, posted by people in your location, and sorts it based on geotags, keywords, our knowledge database and machine learning, that enables you to find nearby local information, local cool stuff, nice restaurants and happenings as you move around.


Why we develop

Because locals are changing over time, local guidebooks and even the internet information soon get obsolete. But nowadays, people who find great restaurants, encounter eye-opening happenings or experience something different from usual, they take those pictures or movies and post those to the social media. So, if we follow the social media, we get real time information updating with durations. However in the current social media system, the information usually comes from your following friends. It is difficult to reach suitable and nearby information you need. Therefore, to solve the problem, our invented system extracts and analyzes all social media posts in real time and notify you what is happing or what is interesting in your area.


Compatibility with smart wearable devices

The app is also compatible with smart wearable devices, watches, glasses, etc.


Why we need your support and What you get

The Japanese version has already been released and promotionally tied up with Sony. And it has been accessing to more than 7 million users. Now, we are planning to develop an English version that is specially customized to foreign visitors to Japan. The new English version will especially focus on collecting the local information that is not listed in travel guidebooks and connecting and communicating with local people who speak English.


Why it is attractive

Tokyo is going to host the 2020 Olympic Game. So, now Japan is continuously upgrading to be a foreign visitor friendly country. Japan is also listed as one of the top tourism countries by many tourism organizations in the world. Next five years up to 2020, foreign visitors to Japan will be enormously growing.


Visit Japan with Spectee

With the new English version, you can discover enjoyable things outside your experience while visiting Japan; those cannot be found in travel guidebooks.


Your support will be much helpful for our development of the new English version. We consider that the app is not only for use of visitors to Japan but also for any areas and locations in the world to connect all the people with locals.


Spectee in the press

Spectee: Japanese app delivers local news faster than newspapers and TV

http://thebridge.jp/en/2014/11/conversation-wit...

story:
Short Summary

Hesed Community Cooperative is a collective of artists, activists, church workers, community healthcare workers, students, volunteers.  

Hesed is a Biblical word that means loyalty, integrity, steadfast love, loving kindness. We are progressive religion in action.  

We are trying to live differently - we are living differently - with simple, sustainable lives, caring for each other, sharing with each other - and we want your help.

Over the past 7 years we estimate we have shared 2,500 meals, housed 350 guests, and scrambled thousands of homegrown eggs. If you've ever shared a meal at our table, rested your head beneath our roof, danced at one of our parties, made a candle with us, or had a friend of a friend who needed somewhere safe to land in Chicago, please consider supporting us now, so we can continue to share our food, pillows, libations, and home with you and yours for many years to come.



What We Need & What You Get

We are asking you to help us make improvements to our home so we can further our mission of living simple, sustainable, hospitable lives. 

By helping us fix our building, You will help us make art, care for others, invest in our community, start small businesses, raise children, plant gardens, tell stories, and make music, all while keep our housing costs very, very affordable.  We do these things already, but your support will help us do them better, and reach more people, and invite others to do the same.  

We are in critical need of masonry work.  Specifically, we need new front steps, a re-built balcony, and some tuckpointing.  Total estimated cost: $27,070.  Round that up to account for the inevitable overruns, and we're looking at $30,000.



The Impact

We are a limited equity housing cooperative, which means, if and when we sell our building, we will only keep 90% of the money, and the rest goes to charity.  In the meantime, we are an affordable, sustainable housing option in an under-served neighborhood.  We have been here for over seven years, so we have a track record of success.  We are going to be here for many years to come, but you can help us be better.

We are also building a community garden in a neighborhood that is lacking green space. We’ve helped pick up trash, and we’ve marched for peace in our streets.  We’ve hosted a traveling, underground film festival, and we started opening our doors to visitors long before AirBNB made it cool.

We’re asking you to help us keep living the life we live, but live it more abundantly, so we can inspire others to live more abundantly.  We think everyone deserves a more abundant life, and sharing can help get us there.  We have more people interested in our community than we have room for, so we also have an eye to further renovations, maybe even buying another building so we can create more sustainable, affordable housing for the artistic and community minded.  

We think everyone should get to share more, love more, and live more.  We hope you will help us.  There are perks to be had, if you want them.  May we recommend picking a non-material perk?  Those perks are easier on us, less clutter for you, and more fun for all.  

Risks & Challenges

The average lifespan of communities like ours is six to twelve months.  We've been here for over seven years.  Our house is old, but every year we make improvements. 

We've dealt with conflict, transitions, unexpected challenges (like a broken water line and termites), and we're still here.  

We're good at this.  Our biggest, ongoing challenge has been maintaining our building.  If we get enough help, we won't have to worry about that any more, and we can focus on building a more abundant community.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't give us money, you can still help by spreading the word.  Tell your friends.  Share this on Facebook, Twitter, and such.  And if you're ever in Chicago, come visit.  We make a mean brunch on Saturdays.

story:
"An elderly Bosniak refugee who returned after the war was ordered to pay compensation to a Serb family who occupied her house in a village near Visegrad and renovated it in her absence.

THIS CAMPAIGN AIMS TO HELP THIS WOMAN PAY FOR BASIC NECESSITIES!

Seventy-one-year-old Muniza Oprasic has appealed for help after the district court in Eastern Sarajevo ordered her to pay 10,000 euro to the Serb family who lived in her house in the village of Okrugla in Bosnia’s Serb-dominated Republika Srpska entity for about seven years until 2003, while she was a refugee.

“I cannot understand how this can happen,” Oprasic told Balkan Insight.

“That was my home. Why did they go into my home at all? They lived there for seven or eight years and now they want me to pay. This is terrible and it is how we returnees to Visegrad are living in Republika Srpska,” she said."

"This old woman's life story starts on a sad note. She was rasied as an orphan during World War II. Her mother was slaughtered by Chetnik forces, an ultra-nationalist Serb militia that stood behind some of the worst atrocities against Bosniaks (Bosnian Muslims) during the Second World War. "And my father was killed by a partisan female fighter. She even stole his watch" Muniza says, referring to the communist "partisans", the other major fighting force in Bosnia and Herzegovina during World War II."**

Oprasic said that she did not have enough money to pay the compensation, so the court decided to take part of her pension.

“I have 320 [Bosnian] marks’ [160 euro] pension and they said they will take half or maybe 100 marks [50 euro]. I can’t handle that.

I need medicine, I have bills. I am asking for help from anyone,” she said." *

It is absolutely terrible what's happening to the 71-year-old Bosniak refugee. Unfortunately, she is not the only one.

Since there is a huge 'lack of response to the court ruling from Bosniak politicians and the international community', and this woman needs help as soon as possible, I have created this fundraiser in order to at least help her provide basic necessities since she is living with an extremely low income, which is now being reduced additionally. 

Some stories are incredibly tragic and sad; and it is often hard for us to imagine that there is an old lady somewhere, living on less than 150 euros per month while having to pay 10.000€ to people who lived in her own house for years, while she was violently kicked out during the war. She needs money to compensate for her monthly loss, in order to be able to meet basic needs and provide life necessities.

Now that you are aware, please DONATE, SHARE AND HELP, because every penny matters when all you have is being taken away.



* Read the full article here: http://www.balkaninsight.com/en/article/bosniak-returnee-forced-to-pay-serb-family

** Find the full article and more information on the topic here: http://www.aljazeera.com/humanrights/2013/08/20...
story_txt: "An elderly Bosniak refugee who returned after the war was ordered to pay compensation to a Serb family who occupied her house in a village near Visegrad and renovated it in her absence.THIS CAMPAIGN AIMS TO HELP THIS WOMAN PAY FOR BASIC NECESSITIES!Seventy-one-year-old Muniza Oprasic has appealed for help after the district court in Eastern Sarajevo ordered her to pay 10,000 euro to the Serb family who lived in her house in the village of Okrugla in Bosnia’s Serb-dominated Republika Srpska entity for about seven years until 2003, while she was a refugee.“I cannot understand how this can happen,” Oprasic told Balkan Insight.“That was my home. Why did they go into my home at all? They lived there for seven or eight years and now they want me to pay. This is terrible and it is how we returnees to Visegrad are living in Republika Srpska,” she said.""This old woman's life story starts on a sad note. She was rasied as an orphan during World War II. Her mother was slaughtered by Chetnik forces, an ultra-nationalist Serb militia that stood behind some of the worst atrocities against Bosniaks (Bosnian Muslims) during the Second World War. "And my father was killed by a partisan female fighter. She even stole his watch" Muniza says, referring to the communist "partisans", the other major fighting force in Bosnia and Herzegovina during World War II."**Oprasic said that she did not have enough money to pay the compensation, so the court decided to take part of her pension.“I have 320 [Bosnian] marks’ [160 euro] pension and they said they will take half or maybe 100 marks [50 euro]. I can’t handle that.I need medicine, I have bills. I am asking for help from anyone,” she said." *It is absolutely terrible what's happening to the 71-year-old Bosniak refugee. Unfortunately, she is not the only one.Since there is a huge 'lack of response to the court ruling from Bosniak politicians and the international community', and this woman needs help as soon as possible, I have created this fundraiser in order to at least help her provide basic necessities since she is living with an extremely low income, which is now being reduced additionally. Some stories are incredibly tragic and sad; and it is often hard for us to imagine that there is an old lady somewhere, living on less than 150 euros per month while having to pay 10.000€ to people who lived in her own house for years, while she was violently kicked out during the war. She needs money to compensate for her monthly loss, in order to be able to meet basic needs and provide life necessities.Now that you are aware, please DONATE, SHARE AND HELP, because every penny matters when all you have is being taken away.* Read the full article here: http://www.balkaninsight.com/en/article/bosniak-returnee-forced-to-pay-serb-family** Find the full article and more information on the topic here: http://www.aljazeera.com/humanrights/2013/08/20...
