story:
Creating a Vessel for Art, Connection, and History

Your contribution will turn a parking space (two spaces actually) into a one-of-a-kind parklet -- a public destination for all ages.   We wanted to go beyond railings and tables, to create a new landmark at the north end of Temescal. The 51st Street Parklet will be located at 510 51st Street in beautiful Oakland, CA and will be a free, public place we can all be proud of.


This Project Can Only Happen with Your Support

We have come up with some fun incentives to help make this worth your while. Contribute and be a part of crafting a beautiful, safe and unique space for our community to be enjoyed for years to come.  


What We Need & What You Get

So, we need at least $29,000 (fingers-crossed!) to build this one-of-a-kind parklet:

  • The funds will go entirely to the cost of building the parklet.  There are a number of structural pieces including a rigid steel frame, shade overhang, and bike parking.  Your contributions fund the materials and builders needed to produce the parklet. The artistic elements add to the beauty and to costs, but we know together we can do this.
  • We have some unique perks as thanks for your donations, including: Temescal and 51st Parklet swag, a cooking class with famed Chef Preeti Mistry, some seriously awesome spice blends and a local farm tour with picnic to boot. And for the big spender - we got you! - your ultimate birthday bash at Juhu Beach Club with 40 of your besties! Check out all these perks and more and help us build this thing!


Help Us Spread the Word!

It's going to take all of us to make this happen. Every dollar counts, and all types of contributions are important. You can help by:

  • Contributing and getting the word out by using the Indiegogo share tools
  • Making some noise about our campaign -- we would be reallllly grateful!

FAQs

What is a Parklet?

A "parklet" is a term used to name a public space that seeks to transform space, often parking spaces, into small public parks. We want to build one in Temescal.

Who is Juhu Beach Club?
JBC is Chef Preeti Mistry's modern Indian restaurant in Temescal, Oakland, California.  Check us out at juhubeachclub.com  and better yet, come visit us at 5179 Telegraph Ave (entrance off 51st Street) in Oakland.  Juhu is the business sponsor for the 51st Street Parklet.

When may I expect to receive my perks?

We will be mailing out the perks in the fall of 2015 after the close of the crowdfunding campaign .  We know you are eager to get your 51st Street Parklet swag and more so we will do  our best to send to you ASAP.

What if I donated and have selected a level with a perk that doesn't get shipped, like the cooking class with Chef Preeti or the Ultimate Birthday Bash? 

Not to worry, we will contact you at the end of the campaign to schedule or if you simply cannot wait please contact us at temescalparklet@gmail (dot) com and we will get the planning in motion.  

What if I have another question that isn't answered here?

Contact the campaign manager and co-owner of Juhu Beach Club, Ann Nadeau at temescalparklet@gmail (dot) com

Thank You!

We can't thank you enough for your contributions and time. It truly takes a village, and we know this project will help increase community interactions in our little village of Temescal.

Hundreds of hours of time, much of it donated, has gone into getting our project this far. Thanks to all of our colleagues, family and friends for help getting it done.

As the business sponsor, we at Juhu Beach Club are grateful for the HUGE support we have received from our community,  and neighboring businesses including Pizzaiolo, La Calaca Loca, MailMax, the City of Oakland's Parklet Program,  Supervisor Dan Kalb, Jeff Norman from Shared Ground, and many many more nearby establishments and humans in Temescal.

None of this would have been possible without our 51st Parklet team and co-sponsors: our Parklet visionary and  Creative Director Sarah Patterson,  Architect Patrick Perez, Architectural Designer Pamela Pascual, Destiny Arts Center, the Temescal BID and Crimson Horticulture Rarities. 

We would also like to thank our video team and participants, including our producers Todd Popple & Sarah Patterson, Joanna Hathaway on sound, and interviewer Joshua McCasland. Thanks to J-Boogie's Dubtronic Science, Aima the Dreamer, and Capitol A for our music track, "Out to the bay."

Thanks again for supporting the 51st Street Parklet dream.  --

Juhu Beach Club Co-Owners, Preeti & Ann
Sarah Patterson, Creative Director & Neighbor

story:
A Crowdsourced And Streamlined Vision To Reduce The Footprint And Evolve An Outdated Shipping Industry.

Purpose:

One day we'll all look back on "snail mail" as a stepping stone to something greater. Much like the beeping of a pager before smart phones redefined the modern world. 

As a result of the progress in telecommunications and eco-friendly automobiles, we've now reinvented the response time in which consumers can interact with the vast world of e-commerce and only use a fraction of the earth's precious resources along the way!

Our Mission: You just purchased an online product. We bring it to your door in 2-12 hours! The arrival time is up to you!

As a childhood dream of being an entrepreneur has stirred with years of experience in the shipping industry, we're now honored to present this unrivaled efficiency to the world! 

We sought crowdfunding as (what we thought to be) the perfect platform to aid in launching something so exciting and personable for every online shopper.

As you read and enjoy...keep in mind that, through this campaign, you have an exclusive opportunity to be part of our journey. Should you choose to contribute, it could be your favorite shoe store, fashion line, family owned business, etc., that we choose to deliver for next! 

The sole purpose of your pledge is to launch this brand new venture and support these evolved services! 

(Above) "Understanding The Law" podcast host Peter J. Lamont, esq. (a top rated and nationally recognized business and personal law attorney) conveyed the excitement and innovation of 12 Hour Express on April 21st, when we became a sponsor of the show. Thank you Mr. Lamont! We were very happy to be a part of your show! (Check them out at www.utlradio.com)

(Above) After being approved and cited, 12 Hour Express has acquired legal rights to show the logos. Check out the"gallery" photos for more info.

Operations At A Glance:

With their overhead, they won't stand a chance against us! 

Signing up: All customers will initially create an account with us and be required to have a verified form of payment on file before placing a delivery. With this, we can go to any store for you, make a purchase, then bring it right to you. 

Service Options & Procedures:

1.) #BuyAndZipBy Service
When you get to the shipping part of an online purchase, you'll see the 12 Hour Express option (and price) beside our competitors. [After having a laugh at what the others are charging to make you wait for days] You'll select from a list of 2 hour delivery windows, telling us when you'd like it delivered. You can request delivery as soon as possible or, if you're not at the shipping address yet, you can have it delivered later.

2.) Standard Pickup And Delivery Service 

Let's say you're at work and you need a delivery to be picked up from your mother's house and dropped of to you at your place of work... 

This would start on our app or website by you keying in the pickup and delivery addresses. Once you do that, it'll notify all of our drivers within a 10 mile radius. (at this point, you'll have the option to view each driver's profile. Easily seeing their personal photo, their vehicle photo, service rating, customer reviews, etc.). Shortly thereafter (within seconds), you'll start getting responses from drivers who can fulfill the delivery within the time frame that you require. Based on what you've read, you'll select the driver that best meets your satisfaction. 

(If the driver is picking up an item that needs to be bought, you'll be required to accept our terms of agreement before the order is competed.)

Once the delivery is placed and accepted by a driver, you can contact and track them the while in route, until you've received a delivery confirmation email (showing the picture of the location or the signature of the person it was left with). 

3.) Boomerang Service (send and receive)

The details in this delivery are the same as the standard delivery plus two (very convenient) additions.

1) You have the option to add a 3rd delivery point 

2) You can add special instructions to have done before leaving each one of them.

For example: You have a document that needs to be signed... 

Our driver comes to pick it up, delivers it to the signers location, waits until all documents are signed, then returns back to you once they're filled out. 

Driver Requirements:

  • Electric, hybrid, or 4 cylinder vehicles only
  • LiveScan background check
  • 18-Point vehicle inspection
  • Smart phone with G.P.S.
  • An up-to-date profile for all customers to see
  • Only deliver in the area that they live
  • 10 year D.M.V. printout

This is a brand new form of digital logistics for the shipping along with an unrivaled reduction in overhead! Your delivery is always taken care of on the day you want it to be.

Want more examples of our service? Check the "updates" for real life scenarios of our service, we like to call 12 Hour "Expressions"


The Impact:

Our #BuyAndZipBy service gives local businesses a direct and unique connection with their customers. We'll be showing you who we're partnered with on our site so you go directly to their online store.

Furthermore, could you imagine if the vast majority of those 10s (or 100s) of thousands of Fedex and UPS trucks were replaced with an electric, hybrid, or 4 cylinder vehicle?? 

Also, check our "gallery" to watch a short documentary on the effects of Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy for P.T.S.D. See what the $1 from every pledge will be going towards!

F.A.Q:

Why haven't they thought of this? Or done this?

While we won't lie and say we're not afraid of this catching on or seeing big courier companies reform, we also know that we have a huge head start (and a unique logistics strategy). These multimillion and billion dollar companies have built an empire on the logistics and tools they're already using. We couldn't imagine what their costs would be to completely re-do their whole operation. 12 Hour Express is starting with technology and expanding upon it.

With so many pieces of mail delivered everyday, how will they all get there on the same day they're shipped?

After working for years in the courier industry, Jonathan's very savvy about how much one driver can handle within certain time frames. The more deliveries = more drivers.  

Thank you so much for taking the time to read this and allowing us to share our vision with you! 

All social media links are listed below:

Facebook: www.facebook.com/12hourexpress

Twitter: www.twitter.com/12hourexpress

Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/12hourexpress

Yelp: http://www.yelp.com/biz/12-hour-express-courier...

This evolution in shipping will not be possible without you!! 

Sponsor the 12 Hour Experience today and receive one of the diverse perks we're honored to share with you!

story:
Motivation

Why are you doing this? should not be more than 2 or 3 points

groom the next generation of successful cartographers and Maps experts on the African continent improve the places that people know and love on Maps by using Map Maker focus on the map of a neighborhood, region, or even for a particular feature such as hiking trails or cycling routes teach new mappers, bring together experienced mappers, and everything in between.

Objectives

What do you want to achieve?

Reach 10,000 cartographers across Africa
Increase the quality of maps written by enthusiasts mapping African Increase the quantity of video content on Youtube and Google+ illustrating ambitions and aspirations of African cartographers consolidate African contributors finalists and passionate people mapping.

Key Results

How do we know that you have achieved it? These should be numerical / measurable

300 submissions of maps per person to compete (at least one category mapped)
90% submission acceptance rate
10,000 cartographers participating on Maps Challenge events across Africa
500 of YouTube Videos submitted by Cartographers, 250K views for these videos, 2K posts/+1s/comments on #mac2015 hashtag by 1 week after the end of the contest.

Geographical Regions

Where is this happening ? How are you categorizing the submissions Geographically Either countries or sub regions

Submissions are per country in Africa and a few countries in the middle east as follows:
Sub-Saharan Africa
North Africa
Middle East Africa

Key Dates


Round 1 :
July 11, 2015 - Beginning the tour two members of the pilot team in the 15 participating countries to announce the contest and local event
July 13, 2015 - End of the African tour
July 13, 2015 - Beginning of the competition for the best video presentation of MAC with lots of views on Youtube and +1 on social networks
July 21, 2015 - Beginning presets
August 23, 2015 - End of pre-selection and qualification of the top 50 countries to compete by cartographers
August 23, 2015 - End of the competition for the best video

Round 2 :
Aug 25th - Submission site opens
Nov 10th - Deadline for submission of at least 50 maps either in the country where the cartographer or another African country
Nov 16th - End of first-round - Judges announces Semi-Finalists
Nov 16th - Shipping Android Phones and Tablets to the winners (semi-finalists)
Nov 16th to Nov 30th : Frame to organize Barcamp sync events to celebrate the winners.

Round 3 :
Nov 16th : Re-submission opens
Dec 14th : Deadline for resubmitting more maps
Dec 14th : End of the second round - Judges announce the winners
Dec 20th : The team announces the destination for the winners
The winner will win an Android Tablet

Overview

Commences in July 2015
Ends in December 2015
16 categories per country, minimum  of 300 submission of maps per category person (i.e. minimum 1500 submission of maps per category per country) . For countries who do not meet the minimum, the submissions go into a common pool. There will be two catch-all pools (one for each category)
16 Categories:
Hotels, residences, hostel
Education : public school, private school, library, bookstore
Religious buildings : church, mosque
Service Stations
Safety: Police, security, firefighter
Health: Hospitals, optics, surgery, pharmacy, clinic, health center
Beauty: hair, nail, massage
Transport: bus, train, transport company, airport
Restaurant, ice cream and pastry, gourmet space
Bar, nightclub, event space
Embassy
Banking, Finance
Malls: supermarket, shop, supermarket, hypermarket
Company
Administration: hall, prefecture, prefecture in
Road, trails.

Round 2 : Two Semi-Finalist per Country (i.e. 15 x 2 = 30 Semi-finalists):
 This means that each country should produce two semi finalists (one per category)

Round 2 : One winner per category across all regions (all the semi-finalists will compete against each other) (i.e. 1 x 2 = 2 Winners)
The competition will be officially run in English (regions can localize communications such as blog posts and G+ posts as they see fit)
Two rounds
No maximum per team
We have one Android device per team (VERY IMPORTANT to state this clearly)
Semi-Finalists get :
only 2 winners per country mapped the largest category : Android Tablet for the 1rst winner and Android Smartphone for the 2nd
2 Winners of all category among semi-finalists get :
[1rst in Africa : Tablet Android
[2nd in Africa : Chromebook
Extra rewards : the winner of the best video presentation of MAC win a Android Tablet, the 3 most involved win Android Smartphone

Judging criteria:
The Judges will evaluate each entry and give it a score from one (1) to five (5) according to specific criterias. The entry with the highest score will receive the first prize;
In the event of a tie between any eligible entries, an additional judge will break the tie based on the criteria outlined below
The team will create a pool of countries with less than 3 submissions
Criteria :
Accuracy of the information mapped
Submission method:
How will the cartographers submit their maps ?

Eligibility:
Who is eligible and who is not? What kind of cartographer are eligible? e.g. you may want to exclude maps built before a certain date

Anyone who signs up to challenge before deadline
Anyone who submits maps before deadline
All participants who respect the development guidelines of the competition
All maps that have been created by the person proposing the maps in question to the challenge
[Explore possibility of accepting older maps on the condition that they have points deducted] An map (not more than 1 year) that was submitted by a specific participant in previous MAC 2015 can be submitted with improvement during MAC 2015 only if the participant discloses in writing to the Organizers of MAC the fact that the map has already been submitted. The resubmitted map will be judge solely on the basis of its improvement since its previous submission.

Focus countries for the contest (Where will you focus most of your marketing efforts?)

Algeria
Benin
Burkina Faso
Cameroon
DR Congo
Ivory Coast
Egypt
Ghana
Kenya
Morocco
Nigeria
Senegal
South Africa
Tunisia
Uganda

story:
Our mission at Dynasty Performance Labs is to provide personalized training programs to anyone with access to the internet. Athletes and teams of all ages across the nation are left without guidance on how to train for their sport. This is the program to help you dominate your competition.


Click here to learn more about Performance Strength Training Programs


Click here to learn more about Performance Conditioning Programs

Click here to learn more about Performance Nutrition Plans

You'll fill out a series of enrollment questionnaires to help us learn about you.

Tell us what your goals are. Your goals are our goals!

How much time do you have? What do you have access to? We take this information and design the program for you!

A Dynasty Performance Labs coach will contact you when your program is ready. They will answer your questions and prepare you for the journey ahead!

You will be able to track every workout you complete during your program. Your Dynasty coach will be following your progress and ensure you receive the best results!

Preview of Performance Strength Training Program

Preview of Performance Conditioning Program

This is a sample video from our exercise library we have prepared for when you join Dynasty Performance Labs! We have over 15 videos and detailed over 30 exercises in those videos.


Our professionals regularly add client success stories, general training advice, news on recent health & human performance research and educational information to our Performance Lab Report. Learn about sports performance and healthy living with us!

Click here to learn more about Our Team

To hit our goal of $10,000 will enable us to complete our web-based personalized training program tool. The funding will also take care of the website operation costs for the rest of 2015. This will allow us to continue developing new and effective tools for you!

We want to provide you with the powerful and functional sports performance tools to improve your performance where ever you are. While $10,000 will let us get the website up and running for you, we want to give you more!

At $25,000, we will be able to work with NS Performance: Washington Sports Academy to build a sports rehabilitation clinic this spring. The funding would allow us to pay for the equipment to begin exercise physiology testing and provide sports performance treatment to local athletes. 

When you help us reach $75,000, we will be able to fund the development of the Dynasty Mobile App. This will allow you to access your programs and workout tracking on the go. We plan to develop this in the future, but hitting this reach funding goal would guarantee release of the Dynasty Mobile App in Fall 2015.

Our top funding goal is $150,000 in order to film more exercise videos for those registered on our website. We want to provide as much quality instruction through our user interface as possible. Let us be your online source for exercise demonstration and education.


Risks and Challenges

One major obstacle that we may face is having an extremely large demand where we would have too many programs to design and manage for our staff. This would require us to hire more professionals to work on our team and delay the amount of programs we can provide from the start. We are preparing a training program and hiring process for new Dynasty Performance Labs professionals to account for this.

Another major obstacle could be an issue in the programming of our user portal. Should an issue arise that would result in a delay of product availability, we will communicate with you and provide an updated timeline.

We have managed to put together this initial offering of exercise videos and online training tools with minimal resources, however we have a much larger vision in mind. With proper funding, we can begin developing a user friendly mobile app and add more sophisticated tools to further enrich your training experience with us.

story:
Help Us Put Fudge in Uranus!  

  Join us in a campaign to open the Uranus Fudge Factory and General Store on Historic Route 66

  You will be part of creating the most outrageous (and the most fun) Candy Factory and Retail Store in the country.

We are close to being ready to open, but we really need your help to make it awesome. 


How your contribution will help..........

  • We have already invested a significant amount of money, but like any small business start-up, we need a little more to fill our store with awesome products
  • This project will create 5 full time and 3 part-time jobs when we open (and more in the future) 
       Plus, it will also help the other small businesses who are supplying us with products. That means that Fudge from Uranus isn't just Tasty, It's good for America!
  • We are trying to create a Historic Route 66 Destination for friends and family to stop and visit and leave with a funny tee-shirt, some tasty fudge and a belly full of laughs.


....and the cool stuff you will get as our THANKS! 

       We know how hard it is to come by money, so we aren't asking for any handouts, we are offering our contributors some awesome perks  for their contribution.

     From one-of-a-kind, limited edition tee-shirts and hoodies to your name in tile on our entrance foyer wall....and of course, our tasty fudge from Uranus.


Once in a Lifetime Opportunities in Uranus.

    We are offering some really cool perks that will only be offered for the next 31 days of this Campaign.  Once the campaign ends, they will be gone forever. For example. the 2 limited Edition T-shirts, or the "Name a Fudge" perk.

Limited Edition Designs

See the other 3 t-shirt/hoodie designs and the rest of our awesome Perks at the end of the page!

Where the Money Is Going in Uranus!

We are trying to raise $60,000 with your help.  We have already invested a LOT more than that in remodeling, fixtures and some of the inventory, but we need about $40,000 more to finish the project 

(all costs are rounded for lisiting ease)

$16,000 The fudge and candy making equipment

$4,000 Supplies like, Chocolate, Cream, Butter, and Packaging etc, to make our candy and fudge.

 $3,500 Signage and Exterior lighting 

.$3,500 Funky Stuff for Uranus (cool decor)

 $13,000 Merchandise for sale.  ie. T-shirts, Mugs, Sodas, Hard Candy 

 $15,500 Rewards/Product Fulfillment  

 $4,500 Campaign/Payment Services Fees

Any extra money we raise from our campaign, we will use for more inventory and cool decor for the store. 


Bumper Stickers

Our Tasty Fudge!


We will be offering your Choice of 10 Flavors that we will start with
  1. Chocolate
  2. Chocolate w/walnuts
  3. Rocky Road
  4. Chocolate/Peanut Butter
  5. Peanut Butter
  6. Maple
  7. Maple With Nuts
  8. Vanilla
  9. Sucrose Free Chocolate
  10. Sucrose Free Vanilla

Get a Tile with your name and Message

These will go on the wall in our entrance foyer

4″×8″ Up to 20 spaces, 3 lines

8″×8″ Up to 20 spaces, 6 lines

If you include a Logo, up to 5 lines

12″×12″ Up to 20 spaces, 8 lines

If you include a Logo, up to 7 lines

18″×18″ Up to 30 spaces, 12 lines

If you include a logo, up to 11 lines

Here is an example of how this will look

The Other 3 

Tee Shirts and Hoodie Designs


WHEN YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR PERK!

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Is this a Joke or is it "For Real"?
    It's "For Real".  We have a saying here about our fudge "You buy it the 1st time as a joke, but the 2nd time because it tastes so darned good"
      We are creating a real business that will create several new jobs in our area. This Campaign isn't just about the Fudge (even though it is really awesome too)


  • Is Uranus Missouri really a town?
    Not yet, but the people involved in the Uranus Missouri project actually have the ability in the future to make it into a legally recognized "VIllage". However, over the next several years, the main focus is to build a "destination" that brings in visitors and revenue from outside the area, 


  • What exactly is Uranus Missouri on Historic Route 66 trying to accomplish?
     Uranus is located in a very unique place. On Historic Route 66, On Interstate-44 (between St. Louis and Springfield, Missouri) and adjacent to a U.S. Military Base, Uranus is positioned to be able to create a one-of-a-kind destination
        However, it is sometimes tough being in a community that relies almost entirely on the local Military Base (Fort Leonard Wood) for our revenue stream.
         This means that the local area is subject to the whims of the people in Washington D.C. (ie. Congress) and how they decide to spend their budgets.
      Because of the downsizing of the Military over the past several years and possibly in the future and of course, nonsense like the government shutdowns and sequesters, we have seen huge swings in the unemployment rates, multiple small business closures, especially the ones that relied almost solely on base traffic and area sales tax revenues in the area drop several % points.
       Don't get me wrong, it is wonderful to know that no matter what, we will have the "nearness" of the military base to help our business grow and sustain itself, but by creating a destination that appeals to people all over the country (and the world) the folks in Uranus hope to create a more stable business model for the area.
  •  Can other people put businesses in Uranus?
      Yes, and in fact, Uranus is setting up a way for people to raise money through crowdfunding on Indiegogo to Launch their own business in Uranus
    http://uranusmissouri.com/startup-uranus/

  • Where are you located exactly?

story:
It's Something Truly Special

We’ve worked hard beginning to create an environment where families can enjoy quality, yummy, locally sourced meals and amazing regional, craft beverages in an engaging, welcoming atmosphere all while distributing 10% of revenues into the causes that mean the most to our customers

This whole concept is a “test kitchen” for our full-scale vision.

  •  Think an acre outdoors, with sprawling areas for kids to run and play
  • Families at picnic tables, amazing food, live music, someone there to lead the kids in fun activities. 
  • Grown ups, chatting, having a frosty cold beverage all while knowing the kids are having the time of their lives

And we’re eating GOOD food, not just starchy, cheesy pizza. Don’t get me wrong I love pizza, but why is it the only place you can have a quality craft beer while the kids run around, and why does it cost you $20 bucks in quarters on top of it to make it happen. It’s just wrong, give us real food and beer and keep that crappy vending machine stuff out of our house, let the kids play, let the kids run!

What We Need & What You Get

Funding to test the concept further and a great time for you!

  • The funds raised will go towards food equipment costs. This is a "cateraunt" (a commercial space run as a restaurant without an actual kitchen). That means food is prepared and transported in from a nearby commercial kitchen and must be kept under temperature control. We need equipment to do that.
  • We also need equipment to keep and serve frosty beverages on site
  • Funds are needed for guaranteed space at the commercial kitchen and to obtain our catering liquor license.
  • Your funds mean you get to hang out at The Treehouse and enjoy a great tasty time with us and your family!

The Impact

It’s our mission to DO SOMETHING! in our community, not only with 10% of every meal going to YOUR causes, but also by volunteering our time and talents in the community. Join us, and be the change in the world you want to see!

  • Your approved non-profit will get 10% every time you spend any money with us!
  • We'll open our space to those in need for a much needed break. One of our first projects will be bringing in moms/kids from a local shelter for a night of fun.
  • We know how to engage kids! If goofy, giggly six, eight and eight year olds weren’t enough of a testimony we’ve been making 1st – 3rd graders crack up for what seems like ages at the kids ministry at the Rock Church North County. We love the imagination, spirt and simplicit smarts of kids these days and we want to engage with them!

Risks & Challenges

We're starting this while keeping our full-time jobs and raising our family, and while I've worked inside the front of the house in hospitality part-time from age 14-27 we don't have back of the house experience in the restaurant world. Finding the perfect location will also be a challenge and working with the city to truly get our vision approved may be time-consuming as a concept like this doesn't truly exist yet.  

  • We have a proven track record for success in business across extremely varied industries
  • Jackie is a successful business builder, presently heading up the marketing department of a $30+ million company. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us just Do Something! even if you can't contribute.

  • Join us the fourth Tuesday of every month at Bread of Life in Oceanside. It's a ministry dedicated to helping the down and out and homeless. We feed from 75 to 100+ people there each month.
  • Tijuana orphanage. There is an orphanage in Tijuana who desperately needs our help. Our church goes monthly and there's always a list of needs for these amazing children. 

Pleas reach out to us for more information on any of the above!

story:
In short

I need funds to start my business, can't get a loan due to bad credit and I don't have a huge friend and family circle to go to for help although I have received wishlist donations from a friend through Amazon, that being said, I still can't start. My Mum is on the sick caring for my Grandma after we lost Grandad last year and I quit my job due to stress being a carer myself for 3 years. I now help 2 afternoons but need to start my sole trader business asap as I only get £65 a week for another few weeks then it drops to £33 I am claiming working tax credits but this is all going on bills and not business start up.

What the money will do

I need a regular market stall as I can't afford a shop premises (personally I'd love to start with the big dream of owning and fitting out my own shop but a shop can cost £350,000 alone and I don't think the public would be that generous lol), I need art stock and travel money to get to and from Nuneaton, Bedworth and Hinckley, I need banners and flyers and other promotional material. I'd like to get some costume mascots for children's parties, face paints and crafts for the market stall. It would be nice to have a laptop and printer to do my own accounting and customer loyalty system plus continue writing my book about caring for change in the care sector. I'd love to learn to drive so I can become my own mobile boss rather than rely on transport and be caged to local areas.

This is the future dream I am aiming for The Shop!

What I aim to do is provide a community creative environment for all creative people to sell their unique works through my business as an outlet. To help provide students with workshops and work experience in a creative environment to encourage and enable them in their creative future. To inspire more people in becoming self employed and create more jobs for the future and for many generations to come. I will offer voluntary work positions for those who need something to put on their C.V

I aim to have a retail space in order to provide studio's for Recording, Video and photography, a separate space for children's parties and have a main shop floor to sell my own and others creative works such as, fashion, paintings, interior design, decorating and much more. Imagine everything all in one place 'Creativity is your oyster'.

I have relaunched with a more realistic goal, it will allow for my business to atleast begin rather than remain on the side lines. This will not get me a shop, but it will allow for me to get stock needed from my Amazon wishlist, pay for my online shop, transport and a regular market stall, market myself and begin basically. I launched twice on kickstarter and didnt have much luck, third time lucky I hope, Thankyou for reading.

story:
Bref résumé

Les contributeurs financent des idées qui leur plaisent et des personnes en qui ils ont confiance. Voici quelques pistes à suivre dans cette section :

  • Présentez-vous et parlez de votre parcours.
  • Décrivez brièvement votre projet et pourquoi il est important à vos yeux.
  • Expliquez l'importance du projet auquel les contributeurs vont participer.

N'oubliez pas, restez concis mais original. Demandez-vous : si quelqu'un s'arrêtait de lire à cet endroit, serait-il prêt à faire une contribution ?

Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

Fournissez plus de détails aux gens :

  • Expliquez le montant du financement dont vous avez besoin et à quoi il va servir. Soyez clair et précis : les contributeurs ont besoin de vous faire confiance pour vous aider.
  • Parlez de vos contreparties uniques. Suscitez l'intérêt de vos visiteurs !
  • Décrivez où les fonds iront si vous n'atteignez pas complètement votre objectif.

L'impact

N'hésitez pas à expliquer votre projet plus en détail et indiquez aux visiteurs en quoi leur contribution fera la différence :

  • Expliquez pourquoi votre projet est précieux pour le contributeur et pour le monde.
  • Mettez en avant vos expériences réussies sur des projets tels que celui-ci (si vous en avez).
  • Rendez votre projet concret aux yeux des visiteurs et suscitez la confiance.

Risques et défis

Les gens apprécieront la transparence de vos propos. Soyez ouvert et démarquez-vous en exposant les risques et les obstacles auxquels vous allez peut-être faire face pour atteindre votre objectif.

  • Expliquez pourquoi vous pensez être en mesure de relever ces défis.
  • Décrivez comment vous comptez résoudre ces éventuels problèmes.

D'autres façons d'aider

Certaines personnes ne peuvent pas contribuer mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider :

  • Demandez aux gens de passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour de votre projet.
  • Rappelez-leur d'utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo !

Et le tour est joué.
