story:
Hello and welcome to Precious Metals Bullion and Vault, LLC, a premier gold, silver, platinum and palladium precious metals dealer. My name is Dale Olmstead, manager of PMB&V, located in the beautiful Pacific Northwest of the United States of America. In this campaign, I am excited to introduce a new concept in spending:  using precious metals as money! 


    Gold and silver have been around since the beginnings of money and trade, consistently retaining their purchasing power. Commonly used as money in early America, it is  clearly stated in the U.S. Constitution that, ( Article 1, section 10) "only gold and silver are to be used as money"! But of course, no one actually goes to the grocery store or buys shoes with silver and gold anymore! No store is prepared to handle the exchange of precious metals as money. We are excited at PMB&V to announce that we have developed a way to do just that, harnessing the purchasing power of gold and silver through a Precious Metals Access Card (PMAC)! A precious metals backed debit card that can be used to purchase products and services wherever Visa is accepted, allowing the easy use of precious metals as money.

OUR STORY

    Let me give you a bit of my personal history. I have worked in the fine jewelry industry for 35 years as a journeyman jeweler. In 1985, I established my own business, Olmstead's Fine Jewelry, (which later evolved into XS Wholesale Jewelers) and have enjoyed the trade and our customer relationships very much. This experience has laid the foundation for me to now manage Precious Metals Bullion & Vault.

    In 2001-2002, I began to notice the value of gold starting on an upward price move, doubling in value from $250 to $500! I asked myself, "If my product price just doubled, why did my income not?" This thought stirred a new interest in the precious metals market for me and I quickly became a student of the exciting history of precious metals. What I discovered was very clear, precious metals do hold their purchasing power. In 1964, a 90% silver quarter could purchase a gallon of gasoline. Interestingly, at today's precious metals values, PMB&V can liquidate that same 90% constitutional coin for fiat dollars and a gallon of gas can still be purchased for that same twenty five cent coin of constitutional money! We can go even further back to biblical times and see that, at that time, an ounce of gold would clothe a man nicely-again, at today's gold prices, an ounce of gold would still clothe a man very nicely! History FACT has proven time and time again that precious metals hold their purchasing power over fiat paper / digital currency.

    In 2005, a few of my clients began asking about buying precious metals, looking for ways to protect their hard earned monies through wealth preservation. As I listened to their concerns regarding the debt dollar paradigm pendulum correcting itself back to center,  and the very real concern of the purchasing power of the dollar dropping to zero (Fact: like all other fiat currencies in history before it), I began to see that the only true, constant and secure wealth remains in precious metals. I had always been buying precious metals for my jewelry trade but not with the understanding of the monetary aspects in the actual value of owning precious metals. I began accumulating precious metals at that time, closely watching the markets and studying other successful individuals in the precious metals community. When asked by clients, "How can I buy silver or gold?", I realized that I myself could begin to provide this added service (instead of sending them to a local coin shop) and I became a precious metals dealer, helping others to preserve and protect their wealth. 

      

    Something I learned long ago in my early business years is that service above and beyond your competition generates great success and good referrals. I practice this today in managing Precious Metals Bullion & Vault and have developed a very successful business model.

    In addition to helping people with their wealth preservation through the purchasing of precious metals, it became clear that at some point, people would want and need to access their wealth to use their metals as money.  The traditional way to exchange metal for money is to go to your secure location, estimate what you are going to need to exchange for currency, find a dealer who will be willing to make the exchange and finally deposit the funds in the bank in order to have access to your wealth. I used this same service with my clients wishing there was an easier,faster way.

    As I committed myself to becoming the best student possible of the precious metals industry, I attended the Silver Summit 2011, held right here in my hometown of Spokane Washington. The speakers included some highly successful and widely renowned experts in the industry including Eric Sprott and David Morgan. This very topic of accessing metals was being discussed by one of the keynote speakers, David Morgan (who is now a good friend and colleague and a PMAC system client). He addressed from stage stating, "Some day someone is going to offer you a debit card and when you purchase something, it will account for selling just enough silver to pay for that debit". I thought to myself, "This is the 'added service' I need to go above and beyond my competition to provide the best possible service to my clients!" As he finished his talk, I jumped up on stage to meet him asking, "Where do I get some of these cards? Who has done this and how do I get in touch with him?" His response was, "Let me get out from behind the podium, they need to introduce the next speaker! Meet me at my table and I'll answer all your questions!" Once outside, David informed me,"I don't know of anyone who has done it! I have tried and many others have also, but no one has been able to succeed!" That was the beginning of many sleepless nights, (like the one now, as I type this out for my campaign!) I began writing out ideas, interviewing with bankers, searching the Internet for like products and services to no avail, I found no successful program available, anywhere.

    The very next week, I contacted the three local banks with whom  I was doing business and then some of the larger institutions in town. It was slow and difficult for them to grasp the concept of how to incorporate this idea to work within their current systems. I was disappointed with how long it would take (4-6 weeks!) to process a single account! During this process, I randomly received a flyer in the mail from Mountain West Bank, who had recently established a branch near my place of business. I attended a meet and greet with the branch manager at the time, who introduced me to the business accounts manager, and in an hours time, I left carrying with me my first precious metals debit cards!

    After about six months of beta testing and developing the metal tracking software, we launched the PMB&V, LLC in February of 2012. This is why we believe that we are the original, first to market, and still the only working precious metals debit card system, able to be used wherever Visa is accepted. We call this the PMAC (Precious Metals Access Card) system allowing instant access to the purchasing power of your precious metals through the Visa network world wide. 


  

    We believe that our clients should be in control of their money and wealth. Precious Metals Bullion & Vault would like to help you:

  • Secure goods and services in the future for yesterdays and today's values.
  • Preserve what is yours.
  • Protect your wealth for future generations.
  • Defend our CONSTITUTIONAL money.
  • Promote what we believe; that precious metals, in this unstable world, are the most sound and reliable place to secure your resources, and with your PMAC (Precious Metals Access Card) you can now access your wealth anytime and anywhere Visa is accepted!

HOW IT WORKS

    With our system of precious metals holding accounts, one can virtually buy, pay and/or settle any debt, public or private with precious metals. It works like this: 

1. To Sign Up and open any one of the four types of precious metals holding accounts download the application from our web site and send it in: PreciousMetalsAccessCard.com

  • Silver (our most popular)
  • Gold
  • Platinum
  • Palladium

2. Fund your new precious metals holding account with purchased metals from
PMB&V, fiat currency (cash) or your personal precious metals (subject to approval).

3. You then will be issued a PMAC that can be used where ever Visa is accepted.

    A Precious Metals Holding account with PMB&V is very unique. You actually have a precious metals holding with cash availability all in one account. In your dual purpose holding account, your currency will always be used first to settle debits. Your precious metals act as an overdraft protection and/or savings account. When the currency in the holding account is depleted, then, and only then, will PMB&V sell just enough precious metal from your holdings to settle any debits. Because of market volatility PMB&V reserves the right to adjust it's premiums to buy and sell  into the physical market not just using the managed COMEX spot cash price of the day.

    Your precious metal holding account is Protected:

  • No commingling of funds from other holding accounts is ever allowed, meaning  your cash is segregated and never mixed with any other holding accounts.
  • Your precious metals are fully insured while in PMB&V's custody, meaning, if there is a loss it will be replaced with like kind at time of loss.
  • Also, for transparency, we have a monthly independent audit to confirm that the precious metals inventory equals or is greater than all of the account holders precious metals inventories. The results of this audit are sent out with your monthly statement.

OUR CAMPAIGN

    Up until now PMB&V and XS Wholesale Jewelers have been sharing a retail office space of only 500 square feet. We are, to say the least, literally tripping over each other at times and it has become necessary to find other accommodations for PMB&V! Our consistent rate of growth and increased need for secured storage and office space is pushing us to expand! We have found the ideal location to take Precious Metals Bullion & Vault to the next level! After much searching, we have found a wonderful location to remedy these dilemmas and provide the ideal place for PMB&V's growth and expansion! This location previously housed a large,  privately owned security firm. There are two fully secured, walk in vaults and plenty of room for more, as well as ample office space. The asking price of the building is below taxed assess value and exceeds every need we can see for the future. We believe it is the building we have been searching for.
     We desire to practice sound money disciplines in not only our business concept and conduct, but in the funding of our growth as we want to provide consistency in honest and sound money principles, both personally and in business.


    Our campaign therefore, is to help us avoid using the 'debt dollar' system (getting a loan from a large financial institution) and help us to purchase the location that we need to continue promoting sound money principles through precious metals and the use of the PMAC system. 
    We would like to go ahead with the purchase of this property but do not want to assist in the debt paradigm that is causing a lot, if not all, of our economical woes. Because of the fast growth and low profit margins, we have not had the time to accumulate enough profit to purchase this new building outright. This exciting campaign allows us the opportunity to raise the necessary funds to continue operating outside the debt paradigm. As previously stated, we believe in what our Republic of the United States of America was founded on, sound money principles, 'using gold and silver as money'. The world never left the gold standard and the Republic should not have done so in 1971 when Richard Nixon closed that window. I realize there is a lot of debate on if a gold standard is even feasible or not, I do not know the full answer to that. What I do believe in, is the divine guidance our Founding Fathers had when constructing the Republic's Constitution as undeniably the best form of governing ever written; "We the People" have liberties of free enterprise and a system that rewards innovative ideas to all people equally! At PMB&V, we are offering a new and exciting option for anyone who would like to participate in honoring the original constitutional gold and silver as money through the simple swipe of a card!

HOW YOU CAN HELP
     Our campaign offers several ways to participate, including some exciting incentives to join us in using precious metals for money! First and foremost, we encourage you to purchase precious metals for your own wealth preservation (with free shipping from PMB&V!) If you have not yet started a precious metals position of your own in physical metals, we highly urge you to do so, whether from PMB&V or someone else, as we truly believe it is the best vehicle in all of recorded history, to provide insurance against fiat currency calamities. And, of course, we want you to contribute to this exciting campaign! Any and all contributions are welcome and do not require signing up for a Precious Metals Access Card, however, we would be thrilled to service you in this way too!

Entry level 1

    For a $50 donation, we will waive the initial $50 deposit (required by the bank) and issue you your own Precious Metals Access Card. In addition, the first 100 newly successful live PMAC holding accounts will receive one troy ounce of silver credited to their account! 

Entry level 2

    For a $100 donation, we will waive the $50 deposit, issue you your own PMAC account, and you will receive a $25 credit, deposited directly into your new account to use as you will! The first 100 contributors at the $100 level of newly successful live PMAC holding accounts will also receive a  one troy ounce silver round credited to their account (or delivered)!

Entry level 3

    For a $500 donation, we will waive the $50 deposit, issue you your own PMAC account, and you will receive a ten troy ounce silver bar, directly deposited into your account (or delivered)! 

Entry level 4

    For a $1000 donation, we will waive the $50 deposit, issue you your own PMAC account, and you will receive 10 one troy ounce American Silver Eagle coins, directly deposited into your account (or delivered)! 

Entry level 5

    For a $10,000 donation, we will waive the $50 deposit, issue you your own PMAC account, and you will receive a one troy ounce American Gold Eagle coin, deposited into your account (or delivered)!  

                                  

    Greater commitment follows greater understanding. If you believe, as I do, that something is terribly wrong with our existing currency systems and you are looking for alternative avenues to protect your wealth and preserve your purchasing power, we are offering contributors at the $10,000 level, not only the one troy ounce American Gold Eagle coin, but are excited to include ALL the previous entry level rewards as well!

  • One troy ounce of silver credit on your PMAC
  • $25 deposit and one troy ounce silver round
  • One 10 troy ounce silver bar
  • Ten one troy ounce American Silver Eagle Coins
  • And your one troy ounce American Gold Eagle Coin

    No matter what you are able to contribute, we are grateful and excited to continue moving forward with this innovative and user friendly PMAC system! All funds will go directly toward servicing our new property and business expansions to keep our overhead as low as possible, to provide the lowest prices and superior services to the free market. This will allow us to continue being the leader in the precious metals access card industry and maybe, just maybe, be the instigator to get our nation back on track to a more sound and fair monetary system as intended by our Founding Fathers. We are excited to share the PMAC system through this campaign and are looking forward to establishing a new, secure, home base location from which to run our business even more efficiently! We welcome any level of participation and thank you for your support. In this valued partnership, we hope that our campaign will become your campaign as well!
story_txt:
Hello and welcome
 to Precious Metals Bullion and Vault, LLC, a premier gold, silver, 
platinum and palladium precious metals dealer. My name is Dale Olmstead,
 manager of PMB&V, located in the beautiful Pacific Northwest of the
 United States of America. In this campaign, I am excited to introduce a
 new concept in spending:  using precious metals as money!     Gold and silver have been around since the beginnings of money 
and trade, consistently retaining their purchasing power. Commonly used as money in early America, it is  clearly stated in the U.S. Constitution that, ( Article 
1, section 10) "only gold and silver are to be used as money"! But of 
course, no one actually goes to the grocery store or buys shoes with 
silver and gold anymore! No store is prepared to handle the exchange of precious
 metals as money. We are excited at PMB&V to announce that we have developed a way to do just that, harnessing the purchasing power of gold and silver through a 
Precious Metals Access Card (PMAC)! A precious metals backed debit card that can be used to purchase 
products and services wherever Visa is accepted, allowing the easy use 
of precious metals as money.OUR STORY    Let me give you a
 bit of my personal history. I have worked in the fine jewelry industry 
for 35 years as a journeyman jeweler. In 1985, I established my own 
business, Olmstead's Fine Jewelry, (which later evolved into XS 
Wholesale Jewelers) and have enjoyed the trade and our customer 
relationships very much. This experience has laid the foundation for me 
to now manage Precious Metals Bullion & Vault.     In 2001-2002, I 
began to notice the value of gold starting on an upward price move, 
doubling in value from $250 to $500! I asked myself, "If my product 
price just doubled, why did my income not?" This thought stirred a new 
interest in the precious metals market for me and I quickly became a 
student of the
 exciting history of precious metals. What I discovered was very clear, 
precious metals do hold their purchasing power. In 1964, a 90% silver quarter could
 purchase a gallon of gasoline. Interestingly, at today's precious 
metals values, PMB&V can liquidate that same 90% constitutional coin
 for fiat dollars and a gallon of gas can still be purchased for that 
same twenty five cent coin of constitutional money! We can go even 
further back to biblical times and see that, at that time, an ounce of 
gold would clothe a man nicely-again, at today's gold prices, an 
ounce of gold would still clothe a man very nicely! History FACT has proven 
time and time again that precious metals hold their purchasing power over fiat 
paper / digital currency.     In 2005, a few of
 my clients began asking about buying precious metals, 
looking for ways to protect their hard earned monies through wealth preservation. As I listened to their concerns regarding the debt dollar 
paradigm pendulum correcting itself back to center,  and the very real 
concern of the purchasing power of the dollar dropping to zero (Fact: like all other 
fiat currencies in history before it), I began to see that the only 
true, constant and secure wealth remains in precious metals. I had 
always been buying precious metals for my jewelry trade but not with the
 understanding of the monetary aspects in the actual value of owning 
precious metals. I began accumulating precious metals at that time, 
closely watching the markets and studying other successful individuals 
in the precious metals community. When asked by clients, "How can I buy 
silver or gold?", I realized that I myself could begin to provide this 
added service (instead of sending them to a local coin shop) and I 
became a precious metals dealer, helping others to preserve and protect 
their wealth.             Something I 
learned long ago in my early business years is that service above and 
beyond your competition generates great success and good referrals. I practice this today in managing Precious Metals Bullion & Vault and have developed a very 
successful business model.     In addition to helping people with their 
wealth preservation through the purchasing of precious metals, it became
 clear that at some point, people would want and need to 
access their wealth to use their metals as money.  The traditional 
way to exchange metal for money is to go to your secure location, 
estimate what you are going to need to exchange for currency, find a 
dealer who will be willing to make the exchange and finally deposit the 
funds in the bank in order to have access to your wealth. I used this same service with my clients wishing there was an easier,faster way.     As I committed myself to becoming the best student possible of the precious metals industry, I attended the Silver Summit 2011, held right here in my hometown of Spokane Washington. The speakers included some highly successful and widely renowned experts in the industry including Eric Sprott and David Morgan. This very topic of accessing metals was being discussed by one of the keynote speakers,  David Morgan (who is now a good friend and colleague and a PMAC system client). He addressed from stage stating, "Some day someone is going to offer you a debit 
card and when you purchase something, it will account for selling just 
enough silver to pay for that debit". I thought to myself, "This is the 'added service' I need to go above and beyond my 
competition to provide the best possible service to my clients!" As he 
finished his talk, I jumped up on stage to 
meet him asking, "Where do I get some of these cards? Who has done this 
and how do I get in touch with
 him?" His response was, "Let me get out from behind the podium, 
they need to introduce the next speaker! Meet me at my table and I'll 
answer all your questions!" Once outside, David informed me,"I don't 
know of anyone who has done it! I have tried and many others have also, 
but no one has been able to succeed!" That was the beginning of many 
sleepless nights, (like the one now, as I type this out for my 
campaign!) I began writing out ideas, interviewing with bankers, 
searching the Internet for like products and services to no avail, I found no successful program available, anywhere.     The very next week, I contacted the 
three local banks with whom  I was doing business and then some of 
the larger institutions in town. It was slow and difficult for them to 
grasp the concept of how to incorporate this idea to work within their 
current systems. I was disappointed with how long it would take (4-6 
weeks!) to process a single account! During this process, I randomly received a flyer in the mail from Mountain West Bank, who had recently established a branch near my place of business. I attended a meet and greet with the branch manager at the time, who 
introduced me to the business accounts manager, and in an hours time, I left carrying with me my first precious metals debit cards!    After about six months of beta testing and 
developing the metal tracking software, we launched the PMB&V, LLC in February of 2012. This
 is why we believe that we are the original, first to market, and still the only working precious 
metals debit card system, able to be used wherever Visa is accepted. We 
call this the PMAC (Precious Metals Access Card) system allowing instant
 access to the purchasing power of your precious metals through the Visa network 
world wide.        We believe that 
our clients should be in control of their money and wealth. Precious 
Metals Bullion & Vault would like to help you:

Secure goods and services in the future for yesterdays and today's values. 

Preserve
 what is yours.

Protect your wealth for future generations.

Defend our CONSTITUTIONAL money. 


Promote
 what we believe; that precious metals, in this unstable world, are the 
most sound and reliable place to secure your resources, and with your 
PMAC (Precious Metals Access Card) you can now access your wealth 
anytime and anywhere Visa is accepted!

HOW IT WORKS    With our system of precious metals holding accounts, one can virtually buy, pay and/or settle any debt, public or private with precious metals. It works like this: 1. To Sign Up and open any one of the four types of precious metals holding accounts download the application from our web site and send it in: PreciousMetalsAccessCard.com 

Silver (our most popular) 


Gold 

Platinum 

Palladium
2. Fund your new precious metals holding account with purchased metals fromPMB&V, fiat currency (cash) or your personal precious metals (subject to approval).3. You then will be issued a PMAC that can be used where ever Visa is accepted.    A Precious Metals Holding account with PMB&V is very unique. You actually have a precious metals holding with cash availability all in one account. In your dual purpose holding account, your currency will always be used first to settle debits. Your precious metals act as an overdraft protection and/or savings account. When the currency in the holding account is depleted, then, and only then, will PMB&V sell just enough precious metal from your holdings to settle any debits. Because of market volatility PMB&V reserves the right to adjust it's premiums to buy and sell  into the physical market not just using the managed COMEX spot cash price of the day.    Your precious metal holding account is Protected:
No commingling of funds from other holding accounts is ever allowed, meaning  your cash is segregated and never mixed with any other holding accounts. 
Your precious metals are fully insured while in PMB&V's custody, meaning, if there is a loss it will be replaced with like kind at time of loss. 
Also, for transparency, we have a monthly independent audit to confirm that the precious metals inventory equals or is greater than all of the account holders precious metals inventories. The results of this audit are sent out with your monthly statement.
OUR CAMPAIGN    Up
 until now PMB&V and XS Wholesale Jewelers have been sharing a 
retail office space of only 500 square feet. We are, to say the least, 
literally tripping over each other at times and it has become necessary 
to find other accommodations for PMB&V! Our consistent rate of growth and increased need for
 secured storage and office space is pushing us to expand! We have found the ideal location to take Precious Metals Bullion & Vault to the next level! After much 
searching, we have found a wonderful location to remedy these dilemmas 
and provide the ideal place for PMB&V's growth and expansion! This location previously housed a large,  privately owned security firm. There are two fully secured, walk in vaults and plenty of room for more, as 
well as ample office space. The asking price of the building
 is below taxed assess value and exceeds every need we can see for the 
future. We believe it is the building we have been searching for.     We 
desire to practice sound money disciplines in not only our business 
concept and conduct, but in the funding of our growth as we want to 
provide consistency in honest and sound money principles, both 
personally and in business.




    Our
 campaign therefore, is to help us avoid using the 'debt dollar' system 
(getting a loan from a large financial institution) and help us to 
purchase the location that we need to continue promoting sound money 
principles through precious metals and the use of the PMAC system.     We
 would like to go ahead with the purchase of this property but do not 
want to assist in the debt paradigm that is causing a lot, if not all, 
of our economical woes. Because of the fast growth and low profit 
margins, we have not had the time to accumulate enough profit to 
purchase this new building outright. This exciting campaign allows us 
the opportunity to raise the necessary funds to continue operating 
outside the debt paradigm. As previously stated, we believe in what our 
Republic of the United States of America was founded on, sound money 
principles, 'using gold and silver as money'. The world never left the 
gold standard and the Republic should not have done so in 1971 when 
Richard Nixon closed that window. I realize there is a lot of debate on 
if a gold standard is even feasible or not, I do not know the full 
answer to that. What I do believe in, is the divine guidance our Founding Fathers had when constructing the Republic's Constitution as 
undeniably the best form of governing ever written; "We the People" have
 liberties of free enterprise and a system that rewards innovative ideas
 to all people equally! At PMB&V, we are offering a new and exciting
 option for anyone who would like to participate in honoring the 
original constitutional gold and silver as money through the simple swipe of a 
card! 
HOW YOU CAN HELP
     Our
 campaign offers several ways to participate, including some exciting 
incentives to join us in using precious metals for money! First and 
foremost, we encourage you to purchase precious metals for your own 
wealth preservation (with free shipping from PMB&V!) If you have not
 yet started a precious metals position of your own in physical metals, 
we highly urge you to do so, whether from PMB&V or someone else, as 
we truly believe it is the best vehicle in all of recorded history, to 
provide insurance against fiat currency calamities. And, of course, we 
want you to contribute to this exciting campaign! Any and all 
contributions are welcome and do not require signing up for a Precious 
Metals Access Card, however, we would be thrilled to service you in this
 way too!Entry level 1    For
 a $50 donation, we will waive the initial $50 deposit (required by the 
bank) and issue you your own Precious Metals Access Card. In addition, 
the first 100 newly successful live PMAC holding accounts will receive one troy ounce of silver credited to their account! Entry level 2    For a $100
 donation, we will waive the $50 deposit, issue you your own PMAC 
account, and you will receive a $25 credit, deposited directly into your
 new account to use as you will! The first 100 contributors at the $100 
level of newly successful live PMAC holding accounts will also receive a 
 one troy ounce silver round credited to their account (or delivered)!Entry level 3    For
 a $500 donation, we will waive the $50 deposit, issue you your own PMAC
 account, and you will receive a ten troy ounce silver bar, directly 
deposited into your account (or delivered)! Entry level 4    For
 a $1000 donation, we will waive the $50 deposit, issue you your own 
PMAC account, and you will receive 10 one troy ounce American Silver 
Eagle coins, directly deposited into your account (or delivered)! Entry level 5    For
 a $10,000 donation, we will waive the $50 deposit, issue you your own 
PMAC account, and you will receive a one troy ounce American Gold Eagle 
coin, deposited into your account (or delivered)!                                          Greater commitment follows greater understanding. If you 
believe, as I do, that something is terribly wrong with our existing 
currency systems and you are looking for alternative avenues to protect your wealth and preserve your purchasing power, we are offering contributors at the $10,000 level, not only the one 
troy ounce American Gold Eagle coin, but are excited to include ALL the 
previous entry level rewards as well!

One troy ounce of silver credit on your PMAC 


$25 deposit and one troy ounce silver round 


One 10 troy ounce silver bar 


Ten one troy ounce American Silver Eagle Coins 

And your one troy ounce American Gold Eagle Coin
    No
 matter what you are able to contribute, we are grateful and excited to continue moving forward with this innovative and user friendly PMAC system! All 
funds will go directly toward servicing our new property and business 
expansions to keep our overhead as low as possible, to provide the 
lowest prices and superior services to the free market. This will allow 
us to continue being the leader in the precious metals access card 
industry and maybe, just maybe, be the instigator to get our nation back
 on track to a more sound and fair monetary system as intended by our Founding Fathers. We

which to run our business even more efficiently! We welcome any level of

story:
Hi, my name is Tracey and I currently live in a Town House in Brisbane, Australia.  I was a Cable Technician for nearly 10 years and I loved my job, however the company I worked for went into liquidation and was closed down in January 2014. I have always loved and been good at making things with my hands, I have tried other jobs since my technician job to make money to invest in my business, which has got my this far, but now I would like to strive for more and I have some great ideas I would love to bring to reality, I just need some help with funding.  I started my small candle business -SoyfortheSoul Candles - nearly two years ago and am still very passionate about it.  I have a great following and customer base online and on facebook and continually try to amaze my customers with unique soy or palm wax candle creations, and I would love to expand my presence .

This campaign is important to me as is the success of bringing my dreams closer to reality.  With this funding I would be able to purchase the tools I need to be a unique presence in  market places and online, such as buying market tables, acceptable waterproof overhead coverings, and shelving.  I have also previously had my candles in handmade gift stores - and would also like to invest in being able to provide my own shop displays with my products.  This funding would also help in the upgrade of my website, which is important when approaching the online shopping community. But the most important investment would be in creating an addition to my range - Wood Wick candles and Candles with Crystals - You may say, "this has been done before", BUT not the creative way I can make them, my prices are most definitely affordable and my fragrances are unforgettable, which is attractive to a candle buyer.

My Candles are Soy and/or Palm Wax (certified) candles that provide unforgettable fragrances to fill your home for any mood/environment.  Perfect for relaxation/meditation or for a unique and cosy home décor with many creative styles of candles to choose from, including assorted jar sizes, assorted pillars sizes, custom made candles, CHAKRA candles just to name a few.

I have worked hard on this small business of mine and want to expand, to expand I need some help with funding.  I want to give this everything I can, because I know I have fantastic ideas and great motivation to succeed. Of course as a contributor helping me achieve my goal, you wont go unnoticed, I will be most grateful for any consideration you have for my ideas.

What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for $5000 in funding for the following tools

  • $2000 on stock, example - wax, Jars, wicks, fragrance, dyes, melting pots, packaging and labelling..
  • $2000 for Market Place tools, such as tables, storage, shelving, undercover protection
  • $1000 on my new products - Wood Wick Candles and Candles with Crystals!!
  • I do have perks involved for contributing!

If I don't reach my goal I would still like to put the funds into my website and creating my new wood wick and Crystal candles, so I can provide my customers and candle lovers with more ways to relax after that long day.

Risks & Challenges

 I know there are risks involved in trying to expand this candle business, as there is competition out there.  However, I am confident I can rise to be one of, if not the best small candle business, because I am creative and fresh, I have great unique ideas and people who buy from me say they have never seen or been able to buy candles like them.  I am also flexible with my customers and offer them custom make option and refill options of a custom kind.

  • Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help me to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign PLEASE!.
  • You can use the use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you again for any consideration you may have to helping my dreams and ideas become reality :).

story:
Short Summary


  • I am an active volunteer at Aura Ion Foundation in UK and Romania. I am a clinical psychologist working with newborns, infants and children in the morning and a fundraiser in the afternoon for Aura Ion Foundation. 
  • I spent each minute of my student time studying neuropsychology on my own because in Romania it doesn't exist. Every day I try to make the lives of many children diagnosed with brain tumors a little better, but I can't due to no financial resources.
  • You will change the life of many children diagnosed with cancer and brain tumors that have no access to neuropsychological services.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need about £ 50 000 to open this center.
  • Money goes to supplies, psychological tests needed, rent for the place and other facilities invoices. Because this project will run in Romania, unfortunately, we can't approach companies that produce psychological tests worldwide like Pearson, PAR because they have these tests mostly in English and we need them in Romanian. We've reached local companies that have translated and adapted those tests on Romanian population and are willing to offer discounts so each penny is important to keep the center alive!
  • We will open this center even if we don't reach this goal. We will use every penny to make better many children with cancer. We hope to raise as much as we can to keep it open for the longest time possible. 

Neuropsychological evaluation objective:

Assessing competencies and different areas of cognition and their possible impairments in areas like memory, attention, language, visualization function, executive function (decision-making, behavior, planning skills).

Such psychometric testing methods allow accurate assessment of cognitive disorders, a qualitative and quantitative assessment of the current cognitive and affective state. Unlike imaging techniques, test results also provide information about the extent and nature of the deficiency, identify neuropsychological issues associated with neurological disorders, effects of chemotherapy and radiation on the brain.


The Impact

Psychological services are very expensive in Romania. On private practices, one hour of psychotherapy starts from  € 25 when the majority of people have salaries between €200-300. The National State Insurance doesn’t want to reimburse directly psychologists for their services offered, even though the individual is paying a monthly fee to the state insurance. Each psychologist must close contracts with doctors that get reimbursed for their psychological services. In this case, the patient is unable to choose his psychologist. The patient is forced to go to the psychologist contracted by his doctor, even though this means a violation of his right to choose the psychologist. The extreme low budgets offered for the health system also caused a lack of psychologists in hospitals. Therefore, the patient diagnosed with cancer, with extremely limited financial resources, spent mostly on medication and medical supplies, is unable to find support, remains with cognitive deficits after chemotherapy and radiation and barely have a neuropsychological treatment available. 

Inexistent services

Neuropsychological services are almost unavailable in Romania. They are provided by one of our members on the Neurological Ward at Marie Curie Hospital in Bucharest.

Unfortunately, that ward is dedicated to children with neurological problems that require surgery. Therefore, many other children with cancer not related to nervous system are left without those services

Chemo brain

People that go through the cancer treatment notice a mental cloudiness. Doctors have known for years that radiation treatment to the brain can cause thinking and memory problems. Recently, they have found that chemotherapy is linked to some of the same kinds of problems. Though the brain usually recovers over time, the sometimes vague yet distressing mental changes cancer patients notice, are real, not imagined. They might last a short time, or they might go on for years. These changes can make people unable to go back to their school, to work, or social activities, or make it so that it takes a lot of mental effort to do so. Chemo brain affects everyday life for many people, and more research is needed to help prevent and cope with it.


Be a doctor for one day! 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help! Please share this campaign to all your family members, friends, social media followers to help us save the lives of many children diagnosed with cancer.

The more money we will raise, the longer will be the time we will provide free neuropsychological services for children with cancer.

Aura Ion Foundation" is a non-profit private company limited by guarantee registered at companies House, Company Number: 9544768.
43 Broomfield Road, CM1 1SY Chelmsford, Essex
+44 (0)7772 948903

Each psychologist must close contracts with doctors that get reimbursed for their psychological services. In this case, the patient is unable to choose his psychologist. The patient is forced to go to the psychologist contracted by his doctor, even though this means a violation of his right to choose the psychologist. The extreme low budgets offered for the health system also caused a lack of psychologists in hospitals. Therefore, the patient diagnosed with cancer, with extremely limited financial resources, spent mostly on medication and medical supplies, is unable to find support, remains with cognitive deficits after chemotherapy and radiation and barely have a neuropsychological treatment available.   
Inexistent services


Neuropsychological services are almost unavailable in Romania. They are provided by one of our members on the Neurological Ward at Marie Curie Hospital in Bucharest.
Unfortunately, that ward is dedicated to children with neurological problems that require surgery. Therefore, many other children with cancer not related to nervous system are left without those services


Chemo brain

People that go through the cancer treatment notice a mental cloudiness. Doctors have known for years that radiation treatment to the brain can cause thinking and memory problems. Recently, they have found that chemotherapy is linked to some of the same kinds of problems. Though the brain usually recovers over time, the sometimes vague yet distressing mental changes cancer patients notice, are real, not imagined. They might last a short time, or they might go on for years. These changes can make people unable to go back to their school, to work, or social activities, or make it so that it takes a lot of mental effort to do so. Chemo brain affects everyday life for many people, and more research is needed to help prevent and cope with it.


    
Be a doctor for one day! 


Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help! Please share this campaign to all your family members, friends, social media followers to help us save the lives of many children diagnosed with cancer.

The more money we will raise, the longer will be the time we will provide free neuropsychological services for children with cancer.

Aura Ion Foundation" is a non-profit private company limited by guarantee registered at companies House, Company Number: 9544768.
43 Broomfield Road, CM1 1SY Chelmsford, Essex
+44 (0)7772 948903

story:
Deutsche Version Below

Welcome to FARBO Café

The Best Quality Café in the Coffee Capital of the World

                                                                                   It’s something else.                                                                                                                                You’ve never tasted anything like this! 

          FARBO Café has an exceptional menu. With unforgettable ice-cream, specialty bakery & desserts, and great coffee and tea, there is something for everyone. At FARBO Café, exceptional means the very finest quality. Everything we make is produced from the highest quality ingredients, grown and produced organically.

          FARBO Café has the highest standards of excellence in the café business. Quality ingredients, careful qualified production, and world-class service. Our Mantra is:

“Quality in, Quality out!”

          FARBO Café is not simply another cafe – it`s the New Standard for Quality in Vienna - the unofficial coffee capital of the world.

           We are ready to bring FARBO Café to the people of Austria,                               and we need your help to make it happen!


Support this project by buying a “Pre-Order” Perk. You can use it in FARBO Café anytime you like in future,

Or receive our best Coffee Beans or Tea Leaves sent directly to your home (see more below),

Or choose anything else you like from our Perks listed to the right. →




Our top quality offerings:

          At Farbo Café we offer many quality products for our guests.  A small sampling of these products are described below:


FARBO 

Quality Offering #1 - Ice Cream

          Natural Handmade Ice Cream from an amazing original recipe and process. This is something completely different from your current concept of “Ice-Cream”. When people try it, they often say they feel like they are discovering ice cream for the first time! The base of this ice cream has its own intensive and delicious taste. It is made from all-natural creams without any stabilizer, chemical flavoring or coloring. With only natural nuts and fruits, it is an absolutely unforgettable experience. People rave about two flavors in particular, “Salty Sailor” and (yes, you read it right) “Cheese Please”.


FARBO

Quality Offering #2 – Pastry “Small Pockets”

          My famous Cherry “Small Pockets” are derived from traditional Finish cuisine. Once while in Finland, I sampled some Finish bakery with cherry. It was good, but as is my habit, I immediately began to imagine ways make the taste bolder and more intense. After extensive experimentation, this traditional dish was transformed into my famous Cherry “Small Pockets” made with (among other things) cherry juice instead of water. Once I'd found the perfect balance, people loved it.


FARBO

Quality Offering #3 – Coffee Specialty Beans

          FARBO’s coffee (Third Wave) is brewed from beans which come from farmers who only collect ripe coffee cherries on organic plantations, which they work lovingly by hand. Business with them is conducted under the direct Fair Trade model recognized across the world. The result is simply the BEST coffee beans from roasters who refuse to sell beans that are not of the highest roasting quality.


FARBO

Quality Offering #4 – Green and Black Tea Leaves

          As with our coffee, our Tea Leaves come from best organic plantations in China and Sri Lanka with only the highest handpicked quality selection making its way into our customer's cups. We offer real Green and Black (Red) Tea without dust and coloring. Pu-erh, Oolong, Longjing and also rich choice of flower teas from all over the world. Only the best authentic Tea, something that these days is more and more rare!

Additionally we are happy to offer you different Natural Flower Teas, which are also wonderful.


Who am I and what is FARBO Café?

                                                 

My name is Taras, and ever since I can remember, I've been fascinated with cooking. As a toddler I pulled pots and pans out of the cupboard and pretended to cook. By the age of 8, I was already pestering my mother in the kitchen, peering between her oven mitts. Once I even tried to grab a hot tray! Under her watchful eye, I began to cook. First following her instructions carefully, and then experimenting on my own.

          While other kids played war games and pretended to kill each other, I wanted nothing more than to bake and cook. I soon began to experiment with my own creations. These early experiments in cuisine enjoyed varying degrees of success.  Some were popular with my family, while in fairness, others became more notorious than anything else.

          After high school, I went to culinary college and finished my full 3-year studies within 2 years with distinction. I became a trained Chef and continued my experiments on a new level as a professional.

          An area of interest and recurring theme that arose during my evolution as a chef, are what I call “resurrected recipes”. I love to find old recipes that have fallen out of favor, and make them au courant. They say that everything comes around again. As with fashion, some rediscovered recipes should really be left right where they are found, banned to the annals of “bad idea to begin with”. However, occasionally, even stunningly, others are real gems have somehow been mysteriously lost through no fault of their own. In the case of my more successful dishes of this sort, only Father Time knows why they were lost through the generations.

          Finding a hidden gem like this has become my passion. Every chef has some “go-to” favorites that they know they can rely on to elicit the magic the requisite moment requires, and these quality offerings through FARBO Café, are mine.

          One of the other guiding stars I've realized through years of experimentation and experience is that food must be made from natural products. It is critical to prepare everything with only the best and most natural products available. In all areas of gastronomy, the whole really can be greater than the sum-of-the parts IF you begin with the very finest ingredients and apply some magic and craft but if you don't start correctly with the best ingredients, no spell or trick you can conjure in the kitchen will change the reality of “garbage in, garbage out”.

          As such, I strive to create food that is perfectly balanced and healthy, in addition to being delicious. Even good baked items, if made with an eye for balance, can be part of a balanced diet that won’t pile on the pounds AND delicious. Unfortunately we now live in an industrialized and myopic food culture from GMO to the ridiculous amounts of preservatives we ingest each year, where cheap tricks reign -such as simply piling on the sugar in the form of cheap but unhealthy corn syrup, for example, or ridiculous amounts of sodium and other preservatives while skimping on the more satisfying and delicious natural sugars and tastes available only in fruits and other quality natural ingredients.

          What gives my passion for cuisine true meaning, is sharing it with other people. Only then does it take on ultimate value for me. I want to create my own café to share the results of my long research and bring new ideas and great tastes to people around me.

          My direct experience has taught me the importance of a focus on quality for not only food, but every aspect of life. New experiences are like splashes of color in an otherwise faded world. New experiences bring color to our life. That why I am creating FARBO Café.


                                    FARBO Café -                                         A place where your experiences brings new                                           colors to life!





         What I Need & What You Get

          To create FARBO Café I need 68.000 euro. I’m working hard to develop my own funds for this project, but it will take me many years if I do it on my own. I believe that with your help I can reach my goal faster and without any question do much more good in the world than simply getting a loan from the bank. In addition to bringing my delicious and healthy products to the world, I will be able to help educate and feed people who really need it rather than feeding other greedy and mythical “animals” like Angels, Dragons and fat-cat bankers!

          Here on Indiegogo, as well as on Facebook, Twitter and YouTube my supporters will get up-to-date pictures, a newsletter, and updates regarding FARBO Café projects, so you can see first-hand how your contribution is making a difference!

          Also, please check out FARBO Café's nice Perks for you if you decide to take part in campaign.


         FARBO Café Specialty Perks

          Below there are Perks for people who will not be able to visit FARBO Café and enjoy it personally. However, I believe that people should not be left without our great products, not in our modern world! Everybody should experience Farbo!  So, here are FARBO Café Specialty Perks which will deliver FARBO’s high quality products along with FARBO’s cool step-by-step recipe to your home.

             Farbo Specialty Beans (Third Wave)*

          With this Perk you will receive FARBO’s best quality fresh roasted coffee beans with greetings from our farmers and roasters.

We offer 3 different package volumes:

FarboSpecialty Beans    250 g.

Farbo Specialty Beans   500 g.

Farbo Specialty Beans   1000 g.

Choose the one suits you best.


                            Farbo Specialty Tea*

          If you are more of a Tea person, than Farbo’s Tea Specialty Perks is right for you. You will be the only one to receive finest FARBO Tea Leaves with greeting from our partner farmers.

We offer 3 different volume of packages:

Farbo Specialty Tea    250 g.

FarboSpecialty Tea    500 g.

Farbo Specialty Tea  1000 g.

Choose the one is best for you.


           SEE YOU IN FARBO CAFÉ!





Deutsche Version

   Willkommen im FARBO Café

          DEM Qualitäts – Café in der Welt- Kaffeehauptstadt

                                                                                     Etwas anderes.                                                                                                                                        Ein neues Geschmackserlebnis.


       FARBO Café hat ein außergewöhnliches Warenangebot. Bestehend aus unvergesslichem Eis, einzigartigen Backspezialitäten und Dessertkreationen, fabelhaftem Kaffee sowie ausgezeichnetem Tee. Hier gibt es für jeden Geschmack etwas zu entdecken. In der FARBO-Cafe-Welt ist das Wort `Besonders` gleichgesetzt mit feinster Qualität. Für all unsere Produkte verwenden wir ausschließlich hochwertige Zutaten aus kontrolliert biologischem Anbau.

       FARBO Café hat sich den höchsten Qualitätstandards in der Gastronomiebrancheverschrieben: Erlesene Zutaten, schonende Herstellung, erstklassiges Service.

Unser Mantralautet:
                                          „Qualität rein, Qualität raus!“
       FARBO Café ist nicht nur ein Café – es ist ein neuer Standard für Qualität in Wien – der Welt- Kaffeehauptstadt.

     Unser Wunsch ist es das FARBO Café nach Österreich zu bringen.                               Das geht aber nur mit Eurer Hilfe!


Unterstützt dieses Projekt… 

mit dem Kauf eines "Pre-Order" - Gutscheins. Den Gutschein könnt Ihr bei uns im FARBO Café einlösen.

Oder entscheidet Euch für eine Packung unserer besten Kaffeebohnen bzw Teeblätter diese schicken wir Euch dann umgehend direkt nach Hause (mehr Infos dazu siehe unten).

Oder sucht Euch einfach etwas anderes aus unserem Perks aus. →




Unsere Top-Qualitätsangebote:

          Im Farbo Café bieten wir unseren Gästen viele qualitativ hochwertigen Erzeugnisse. Hier ein kleiner Auszug aus unserer Produktpalette:


FARBO 

Quality Offering #1 - Eiscreme

          Natürliches handgemachtes Eis schonend hergestellt nach einem großartigen Originalrezept. Wenn Ihr denkt Eis zu kennen dann habt Ihr unseres noch nicht probiert! Viele die in den Genuss gekommen sind es zu kosten, sagten es war „ein neues Geschmackserlebnis“, „als hätten sie zum ersten Mal Eis gegessen“… Das liegt vor allem an der Basis, den Ingredienzien, unserer köstlichen aromatischen Eiscreme. Sie wird ausschließlich aus natürlichen Zutaten hergestellt, enthält keine Stabilisatoren, chemischen Aroma- oder Farbstoffe. Verfeinert mit knackigen Nüssen und frischen Früchten ist unser Eis ein absolut unvergessliches Erlebnis. Unsere Gäste schwärmen vor allem von zwei Geschmacksrichtungen “Salty Sailor” und “Cheese Please”.


FARBO

Quality Offering #2 – Backwaren "Mini- Täschchen"

          Meine berühmten "Kirschtäschchen" entstammen der traditionellen finnischen Küche. Während einer Finnlandreise habe ich diverse finnische Kirsch-Backwaren probiert. Ich fand sie gut, doch etwas fehlte. Da kulinarisches Tüfteln zu meinem Naturell gehört überlegte ich mir gleich wie man den Geschmack intensivieren und abrunden könnte. Nach einer langen Versuchsreihe kreierte ich aus den traditionellen finnischen Kirsch-Backwaren etwas Neues: meine berühmten „Kirschtäschchen“, die u.A. mit Kirschsaft statt Wasser zubereitet werden. Einmal die richtige Geschmacksbalance gefunden, begannen die Leute sie zu lieben.


FARBO

Quality Offering #3 – Kaffeespezialitäten–Bohnen

          FARBO Kaffee (Third Wave) wird aus Bohnen gewonnen, die aus biologischem Anbau stammen und liebevoll von Hand geerntet werden. Die Bohnen werden unter Fair Trade-Bedingungen angebaut, geerntet und verarbeitet. Ergebnis der Fair Trade- geprüften Produktion sind beste Kaffeebohnen von Röstern die ausschließlich Qualitätsware verwenden.


FARBO

Quality Offering #4 – Grüne und schwarze Teeblätter

          Wie unser Kaffee stammen auch die Teeblätter von Bio-Plantagen in China und Sri Lanka. Die Blätter werden ausschließlich handverlesen. Am Ende sind es nur die qualitativ hochwertigsten Blätter, die ihren Weg in die Tassen unserer Kunden finden. Wir bieten echte Grün- und Schwarztees, ohne Staub oder Farbstoffe, an. Aber auch Pu-Erh, Oolong, Longjing und viele weitere Sorten stehen in unseren Regalen. Nur die besten und authentischsten Tees, schaffen es in unser Sortiment. Und das ist heutzutage keine Selbstverständlichkeit!

Darüber hinaus freuen wir uns, Ihnen verschiedene natürlich Blumen-Tees, die auch wunderbar sind.


Wer bin ich und was ist FARBO Café?

                                                 

Mein Name ist Taras. Seit ich denken kann übt Kochen eine besondere Faszination auf mich aus. Als Kleinkind zog ich Töpfe und Pfannen aus dem Schrank und habe so getan als ob ich kochen würde. Im Alter von 8, nervte ich meine Mutter in der Küche und spielte mit allen möglichen Küchenutensilien. Einmal habe ich sogar versucht ein heißes Backbleck anzufassen! Unter ihren wachsamen Augen fing ich langsam an zu kochen. Zuerst befolgte ich genau ihre Anweisungen, doch im Laufe der Zeit begann ich selbst zu experimentieren.

          Während andere Kinder Kriegsspiele spielten und vorgaben sich gegenseitig zu töten, wollte ich nichts weiter als backen und kochen. Bald wagte ich mich an eigene Kreationen heran. Diese frühen kulinarischen Versuchsreihen waren von unterschiedlichen Erfolgen gekrönt. Einige kamen nur sehr gut bei meiner Familie an, während andere auch außerhalb der eigenen vier Wände berühmt- berüchtigt wurden.

          Nach meinem Schulabschluss besuchte ich eine 3- jährige kulinarische Hochschule und schloss diese bereits nach 2 Jahren ab. Danach konnte ich, als offiziell anerkannter Profi, meine experimentellen Versuche auf einem wesentlich höheren Niveau fortsetzten.

          Ein Thema, das immer wieder eine Rolle in meinem Arbeitsleben spielt und während meiner Entwicklung zum Profi dominant wurde, ist jenes das ich „wiederbelebte Rezepte“ nenne. Ich liebe es, alte Rezepte, die in Ungnade gefallen sind auszugraben, und sie zu revitalisieren. Man sagt, dass alles irgendwann wiederkommt. Wie bei der Mode, sollten einige wiederentdeckte Rezepte wirklich genau dort bleiben wo sie hergekommen sind: in der Versenkung. Doch gelegentlich lassen sich unter ihnen echte kulinarische Juwelen entdecken, die lange verloren zu sein schienen, und die, nachdem sie durch meine liebevollen Hände gingen, in neuem Glanz erstrahlten.

          Die Suche nach solch verschollenen Schätzen hat meine Leidenschaft geweckt. Jeder Koch hat seine ganz persönlichen Favoriten, bei welchen er sich darauf verlassen kann, dass sie dem Genussmoment eine einzigartige magische Wirkung verleihen. Auch ich darf solch wundervolle Erzeugnisse mein Eigen nennen und möchte diese nun in Form meines ganz persönlichen Sortiments im FARBO Café anbieten.

          Ich bin im Laufe der Jahre und nach etlichen Experimenten zur Erkenntnis gelangt, dass Lebensmittel ausschließlich aus Naturprodukten hergestellt werden sollten. In diesem Zusammenhang ist eine sorgfältige Auswahl der hochwertigsten Naturprodukte von essentieller Bedeutung. In allen Bereichen der Gastronomie ist das große Ganze bedeutender als die Summe aller Teile, sofern man mit den besten Zutaten beginnt und etwas Magie sowie handwerkliches Geschick hinzufügt. Doch wenn am Anfang minderwertige Zutaten stehen, so kann auch die beste „Zauberformel“ zu keinem guten Ergebnis mehr führen. Ganz nach dem Motto: „garbage in, garbage out“.

          Unter diesem Aspekt strebe ich danach Produkte zu kreieren, die ausgewogen, gesund und darüber hinaus köstlich sind. Selbst Backwaren können, wenn man auf die richtige Balance der Zutaten achtet, Teil einer ausgewogenen, gesunden Ernährung sein und noch dazu hervorragend schmecken. Leider leben wir momentan in einer Welt, die von einer industrialisierten und kurzsichtigen Esskultur dominiert wird. Voller gentechnisch veränderter Lebensmittel, ganz zu schweigen von den Unmengen an Konservierungsstoffen, die wir Jahr für Jahr zu uns nehmen. Eine Welt in der billige Tricks regieren – wie zum Beispiel die Verwendung von minderwertigem Zucker in Form von billigem und ungesundem Maissirup, oder unnötig hohen Mengen an Natrium und anderen Konservierungsstoffen, während mit dem wesentlich gesünderen Fruchtzucker und anderen hochwertigen natürlichen Inhaltsstoffen viel zu sparsam umgegangen wird.

          Was meiner Leidenschaft für die Küche wahre Bedeutung verleiht ist es diese mit anderen Menschen zu teilen. Erst dann stellt sie auch einen Wert für mich dar. Ich möchte mein eigenes Café eröffnen, um die Ergebnisse meiner lang andauernden Forschung unters Volk zu bringen, innovative Kreationen zu liefern und den Menschen neue Geschmackserlebnisse zu bieten.

          Meine unmittelbare Erfahrung hat mir gezeigt, dass der Fokus auf Qualität, nicht nur in Bezug auf Lebensmittel, sondern auch für jeden Aspekt im Leben, von enormer Bedeutung ist. Neue Erfahrungen sind die Farbtupfer in einer sonst so fahlen Welt. Sie bringen Farbe in unser Leben. Der Grund, warum ich FARBO Café ins Leben rufen möchte.


                                    FARBO Café - 

               ein Ort wo neue Erfahrungen Farbe 

                               ins Leben bringen!




    Was ich brauche & was Ihr erhaltet

          Um das FARBO Café gründen zu können benötige ich € 68.000. Ich arbeite hart, um eigene finanzielle Mittel für dieses Projekt aufzubringen, doch es würde mich etliche Jahre kosten, um es aus eigener Kraft zu schaffen. Ich bin sicher, dass ich mit Eurer Hilfe mein Ziel schneller erreichen kann und zweifelsohne mehr in der Welt bewirken kann als einfach nur einen Kredit bei der Bank aufzunehmen. Abgesehen von den köstlichen und gesunden Produkten, die ich in die Welt hinaustrage, werde ich in der Lage sein Menschen zu helfen, sie auszubilden und ausgewogene Nahrungsmittel an den Mann/die Frau zu bringen, anstatt irgendwelche Kredithaie mit horrenden Zinsen zu füttern.

          Hier auf Indiegogo, sowie Facebook, Twitter and YouTube werden alle die mich unterstützen mit up-to-date- Bildern, einem Newsletter und sämtlichen Neuigkeiten rund ums FARBO Café Projekt versorgt. So erfahrt Ihr aus erster Hand welch große Wirkung Euer Beitrag erzielt!

          Solltet Ihr Euch dazu entschließen mich zu unterstützen, dann werft doch mal einen Blick auf die tollen FARBO Café- Gutscheine.



 FARBO Café Spezialitäten-Gutscheine

          Nachfolgend befinden sich Gutscheine für all jene die das FARBO Café nicht besuchen können. Ich bin davon überzeugt, dass jeder in den Genuss unserer tollen Produkte einfach kommen muss, vor allem heutzutage in unserer modernen schnelllebigen Welt. Jeder soll FARBO erleben können! Hier sind die FARBO Café Specialty Perks, die FARBO’s Qualitäts- Kaffeebohnen und Teeblätter portionsweise, mit unserem „step-by-step“- Prinzip Kochrezepte, zu Euch bringen.

             Farbo Specialty Beans (Third Wave)*

          Mit diesem Perk erhaltet Ihr die frisch gerösteten FARBO- Kaffeebohnen bester Qualität mit freundlichen Grüßen unserer Kaffeebauern und Röster.

Wir bieten 3 verschiedene Packungsgrößen:

FarboSpecialty Beans    250 g.

Farbo Specialty Beans   500 g.

Farbo Specialty Beans   1000 g.

Wählt jene, die Euch am besten passt.


                         Farbo Specialty Tea*

         Für alle Teetrinker gibt es einen besonders tollen Farbo’s Tee- Perk. Ihr bekommt die feinsten FARBO Teeblätter von unserem Partner Teebauern.

Wir bieten 3 verschiedene Packungsgrößen:

Farbo Specialty Tea     250 g.

FarboSpecialty Tea     500 g.

Farbo Specialty Tea   1000 g.

Wählt jene, die Euch am besten passt.



    WIR SEHEN UNS IM FARBO CAFÉ!


* Please note, as we are not yet a retail shop and still in the process of creating FARBO Café, we will need more time than usual to process orders for our valued contributors. As a result, at this moment, we are not able to name specific coffee beans or tea leaves that will be sent, as they are subject to change and we wish to avoid misrepresentation. However, I do guarantee that! Be sure you will get “Chef’s best choice” of the very best product we have available at the time of your order.
