Or receive our best Coffee Beans or Tea Leaves sent directly to your home (see more below),
Or choose anything else you like from our Perks listed to the right. →






Our top quality offerings:

          At Farbo Café we offer many quality
products for our guests.  A small
sampling of these products are described below:


FARBO 
Quality Offering #1 - Ice Cream







          Natural Handmade Ice Cream from an amazing
original recipe and process. This is something completely different from your current
concept of “Ice-Cream”. When people try it, they often say they feel like they
are discovering ice cream for the first time! The base of this ice cream has
its own intensive and delicious taste. It is made from all-natural creams
without any stabilizer, chemical flavoring or coloring. With only natural
nuts and fruits, it is an absolutely unforgettable experience. People rave
about two flavors in particular, “Salty Sailor” and (yes, you read it right)
“Cheese Please”.

FARBOQuality Offering #2 – Pastry “Small Pockets”


          My famous Cherry “Small Pockets” are derived from traditional Finish
cuisine. Once while in Finland, I sampled some Finish bakery with cherry. It
was good, but as is my habit, I immediately began to imagine ways make the
taste bolder and more intense. After extensive experimentation, this
traditional dish was transformed into my famous Cherry “Small Pockets” made
with (among other things) cherry juice instead of water. Once I'd found the
perfect balance, people loved it.




FARBOQuality Offering #3 – Coffee Specialty Beans






          FARBO’s coffee (Third Wave) is brewed from beans
which come from farmers who only collect ripe coffee cherries on organic
plantations, which they work lovingly by hand. Business with them is conducted
under the direct Fair Trade model recognized across the world. The result is
simply the BEST coffee beans from roasters who refuse to sell beans that are
not of the highest roasting quality.



FARBOQuality Offering #4 – Green and Black Tea Leaves







          As with our coffee, our Tea Leaves
come from best organic plantations in China and Sri Lanka with only the highest
handpicked quality selection making its way into our customer's cups. We offer
real Green and Black (Red) Tea without dust and coloring. Pu-erh, Oolong, Longjing
and also rich choice of flower teas from all over the world. Only the best authentic Tea, something that these days is more
and more rare!
Additionally we are happy to offer you different Natural Flower Teas, which are also wonderful.


Who am I and what is FARBO Café?
                                                 


My name is Taras, and ever since I can remember, I've been
fascinated with cooking. As a toddler I pulled pots and pans out of the
cupboard and pretended to cook. By the age of 8, I was already pestering my
mother in the kitchen, peering between her oven mitts. Once I even tried to
grab a hot tray! Under her watchful eye, I began to cook. First following her
instructions carefully, and then experimenting on my own.
          While other kids
played war games and pretended to kill each other, I wanted nothing more than
to bake and cook. I soon began to experiment with my own creations. These early
experiments in cuisine enjoyed varying degrees of success.  Some were popular with my family, while in
fairness, others became more notorious than anything else.
          After high school, I went to culinary college and finished my full 3-year studies within 2 years with distinction. I became a trained Chef and continued my experiments on a new level as a professional.
          An area of interest
and recurring theme that arose during my evolution as a chef, are what I call
“resurrected recipes”. I love to find old recipes that have fallen out of favor,
and make them au courant. They say that everything comes around again. As with
fashion, some rediscovered recipes should really be left right where they are
found, banned to the annals of “bad idea to begin with”. However, occasionally,
even stunningly, others are real gems have somehow been mysteriously lost through
no fault of their own. In the case of my more successful dishes of this sort,
only Father Time knows why they were lost through the generations.
          Finding a hidden
gem like this has become my passion. Every chef has some “go-to” favorites that
they know they can rely on to elicit the magic the requisite moment requires,
and these quality offerings through FARBO Café, are mine.


          One of the other guiding stars I've realized
through years of experimentation and experience is that food must be made from
natural products. It is critical to prepare everything with only the best
and most natural products available. In all areas of gastronomy, the whole
really can be greater than the sum-of-the parts IF you begin with the very finest ingredients and apply some magic
and craft but if you don't start correctly with the best ingredients, no spell
or trick you can conjure in the kitchen will change the reality of “garbage in,
garbage out”.
          As such, I strive to create food that is
perfectly balanced and healthy, in addition to being delicious. Even good baked
items, if made with an eye for balance, can be part of a balanced diet that
won’t pile on the pounds AND delicious. Unfortunately we now live in an
industrialized and myopic food culture from GMO to the ridiculous amounts of
preservatives we ingest each year, where cheap tricks reign -such as simply
piling on the sugar in the form of cheap but unhealthy corn syrup, for example,
or ridiculous amounts of sodium and other preservatives while skimping on the
more satisfying and delicious natural sugars and tastes available only in
fruits and other quality natural ingredients.


          What gives my passion for cuisine true meaning,
is sharing it with other people. Only then does it take on ultimate value for
me. I want to create my own café to share the results of my long research and
bring new ideas and great tastes to people around me.
          My direct experience has taught me the
importance of a focus on quality for not only food, but every aspect of life.
New experiences are like splashes of color in an otherwise faded world. New
experiences bring color to our life. That why I am creating FARBO Café.


                                    FARBO Café -                                         A place where your experiences
brings new                                           colors to life!







         What I Need & What You Get

          To create FARBO Café I need 68.000
euro. I’m working hard to develop my own funds for this project, but it will
take me many years if I do it on my own. I believe that with your help I can
reach my goal faster and without any question do much more good in the world
than simply getting a loan from the bank. In addition to bringing my delicious
and healthy products to the world, I will be able to help educate and feed
people who really need it rather than feeding other greedy and mythical “animals”
like Angels, Dragons and fat-cat bankers!
          Here on Indiegogo, as well as on
Facebook, Twitter and YouTube my supporters will get up-to-date pictures, a
newsletter, and updates regarding FARBO Café projects, so you
can see first-hand how your contribution is making a difference!
          Also, please check out FARBO Café's nice Perks for you if you decide to take part in campaign.




         FARBO Café
Specialty Perks
     
    Below there are Perks for people who will not be able to
visit FARBO Café and enjoy it personally. However,
I believe that people should not be left without our great products, not in our
modern world! Everybody should experience Farbo!  So, here are FARBO Café Specialty Perks which will deliver FARBO’s high quality products along with FARBO’s cool step-by-step recipe to your home.
   
         Farbo Specialty Beans (Third
Wave)*          With this Perk you will receive FARBO’s
best quality fresh roasted coffee beans with
greetings from our farmers and roasters.
We offer 3 different
package volumes:
FarboSpecialty Beans    250 g.
Farbo Specialty Beans   500 g.
Farbo Specialty Beans   1000 g.
Choose the one suits you
best.
                            Farbo Specialty Tea*
          If you are more
of a Tea person, than Farbo’s Tea Specialty Perks is right for you. You will be
the only one to receive finest FARBO Tea Leaves with greeting from our partner
farmers.
We offer 3
different volume of packages:
Farbo Specialty Tea    250 g.
FarboSpecialty Tea    500 g.
Farbo Specialty Tea  1000 g.
Choose the one is
best for you.


           SEE YOU IN FARBO CAFÉ!










Deutsche Version



   Willkommen im FARBO Café



          DEM Qualitäts – Café in der Welt- Kaffeehauptstadt
                                                                                     Etwas anderes.                                                                                                                                        Ein neues Geschmackserlebnis.


       FARBO Café hat ein außergewöhnliches Warenangebot. Bestehend aus unvergesslichem Eis, einzigartigen Backspezialitäten und Dessertkreationen, fabelhaftem Kaffee sowie ausgezeichnetem Tee. Hier gibt es für jeden Geschmack etwas zu entdecken.
In  der FARBO-Cafe-Welt ist das Wort `Besonders` gleichgesetzt mit feinster Qualität.
Für all unsere Produkte verwenden wir ausschließlich hochwertige Zutaten aus kontrolliert biologischem Anbau.


       FARBO Café hat sich den höchsten
Qualitätstandards in der
Gastronomiebrancheverschrieben:
Erlesene Zutaten,
schonende Herstellung,
erstklassiges
Service.

Unser
Mantralautet:

                                          „Qualität rein, Qualität raus!“

       FARBO Café ist nicht nur ein Café – es ist ein neuer Standard für Qualität in Wien – der Welt- Kaffeehauptstadt.


     Unser Wunsch ist es das FARBO Café nach Österreich zu bringen.                               Das geht aber nur mit Eurer Hilfe!



Unterstützt dieses Projekt… 
mit dem Kauf eines "Pre-Order" - Gutscheins.
Den Gutschein könnt Ihr bei uns im FARBO Café einlösen.
Oder entscheidet Euch für eine Packung unserer besten Kaffeebohnen bzw Teeblätter diese schicken wir Euch dann umgehend direkt nach Hause (mehr Infos dazu siehe unten).
Oder sucht Euch einfach etwas anderes aus unserem Perks aus. →





Unsere Top-Qualitätsangebote:

          Im Farbo Café bieten wir unseren Gästen viele qualitativ hochwertigen Erzeugnisse. Hier ein kleiner Auszug aus unserer Produktpalette:


FARBO 
Quality Offering #1 - Eiscreme






            Natürliches handgemachtes Eis schonend hergestellt nach einem großartigen Originalrezept. Wenn Ihr denkt Eis zu kennen dann habt Ihr unseres noch nicht probiert! Viele die in den Genuss gekommen sind es zu kosten, sagten es war „ein neues Geschmackserlebnis“, „als hätten sie zum ersten Mal Eis gegessen“… Das liegt vor allem an der Basis, den Ingredienzien, unserer köstlichen aromatischen Eiscreme. Sie wird ausschließlich aus natürlichen Zutaten hergestellt, enthält keine Stabilisatoren, chemischen Aroma- oder Farbstoffe. Verfeinert mit knackigen Nüssen und frischen Früchten ist unser Eis ein absolut unvergessliches Erlebnis. Unsere Gäste schwärmen vor allem von zwei Geschmacksrichtungen “Salty Sailor” und “Cheese Please”.

FARBOQuality Offering #2 – Backwaren "Mini- Täschchen"


          Meine berühmten "Kirschtäschchen" entstammen der traditionellen finnischen Küche. Während einer Finnlandreise habe ich diverse finnische Kirsch-Backwaren probiert. Ich fand sie gut, doch etwas fehlte. Da kulinarisches Tüfteln zu meinem Naturell gehört überlegte ich mir gleich wie man den Geschmack intensivieren und abrunden könnte. Nach einer langen Versuchsreihe kreierte ich aus den traditionellen finnischen Kirsch-Backwaren etwas Neues: meine berühmten „Kirschtäschchen“, die u.A. mit Kirschsaft statt Wasser zubereitet werden. Einmal die richtige Geschmacksbalance gefunden, begannen die Leute sie zu lieben.




FARBOQuality Offering #3 – Kaffeespezialitäten–Bohnen






          FARBO Kaffee (Third Wave) wird aus Bohnen gewonnen, die aus biologischem Anbau stammen und liebevoll von Hand geerntet werden. Die Bohnen werden unter Fair Trade-Bedingungen angebaut, geerntet und verarbeitet. Ergebnis der Fair Trade- geprüften Produktion sind beste Kaffeebohnen von Röstern die ausschließlich Qualitätsware verwenden.



FARBO
Quality Offering #4 – Grüne und schwarze Teeblätter







          Wie unser Kaffee stammen auch die Teeblätter
von Bio-Plantagen in China und Sri Lanka. Die Blätter werden ausschließlich handverlesen. Am Ende sind es nur die qualitativ hochwertigsten Blätter, die ihren Weg in die Tassen unserer Kunden finden. Wir bieten echte Grün- und Schwarztees, ohne Staub oder Farbstoffe, an. Aber auch Pu-Erh, Oolong, Longjing und viele weitere Sorten stehen in unseren Regalen. Nur die besten und authentischsten Tees, schaffen es in unser Sortiment. Und das ist heutzutage keine Selbstverständlichkeit!

Darüber hinaus freuen wir uns, Ihnen verschiedene natürlich Blumen-Tees, die auch wunderbar sind.


Wer bin ich und was ist FARBO Café?
                                                 


Mein Name ist Taras. Seit ich denken kann übt Kochen eine besondere Faszination auf mich aus.
Als Kleinkind zog ich Töpfe und Pfannen aus dem Schrank und habe so getan als ob ich kochen würde. Im Alter von 8, nervte ich meine Mutter in der Küche und spielte mit allen möglichen Küchenutensilien. Einmal habe ich sogar versucht ein heißes Backbleck anzufassen! Unter ihren wachsamen Augen fing ich langsam an zu kochen. Zuerst befolgte ich genau ihre Anweisungen, doch im Laufe der Zeit begann ich selbst zu experimentieren.
          Während andere Kinder Kriegsspiele spielten und vorgaben sich gegenseitig zu töten, wollte ich nichts weiter als backen und kochen. Bald wagte ich mich an eigene Kreationen heran. Diese frühen kulinarischen Versuchsreihen waren von unterschiedlichen Erfolgen gekrönt. Einige kamen nur sehr gut bei meiner Familie an, während andere auch außerhalb der eigenen vier Wände berühmt- berüchtigt wurden.
          Nach meinem Schulabschluss besuchte ich eine 3- jährige kulinarische Hochschule und schloss diese bereits nach 2 Jahren ab. Danach konnte ich, als offiziell anerkannter Profi, meine experimentellen Versuche auf einem wesentlich höheren Niveau fortsetzten.
          Ein Thema, das immer wieder eine Rolle in meinem Arbeitsleben spielt und während meiner Entwicklung zum Profi dominant wurde, ist jenes das ich „wiederbelebte Rezepte“ nenne. Ich liebe es, alte Rezepte, die in Ungnade gefallen sind auszugraben, und sie zu revitalisieren. Man sagt, dass alles irgendwann wiederkommt. Wie bei der Mode, sollten einige wiederentdeckte Rezepte wirklich genau dort bleiben wo sie hergekommen sind: in der Versenkung. Doch gelegentlich lassen sich unter ihnen echte kulinarische Juwelen entdecken, die lange verloren zu sein schienen, und die, nachdem sie durch meine liebevollen Hände gingen, in neuem Glanz erstrahlten.
          Die Suche nach solch verschollenen Schätzen hat meine Leidenschaft geweckt. Jeder Koch hat seine ganz persönlichen Favoriten, bei welchen er sich darauf verlassen kann, dass sie dem Genussmoment eine einzigartige magische Wirkung verleihen. Auch ich darf solch wundervolle Erzeugnisse mein Eigen nennen und möchte diese nun in Form meines ganz persönlichen Sortiments im FARBO Café anbieten.


          Ich bin im Laufe der Jahre und nach etlichen Experimenten zur Erkenntnis gelangt, dass Lebensmittel ausschließlich aus Naturprodukten hergestellt werden sollten.
In diesem Zusammenhang ist eine sorgfältige Auswahl der hochwertigsten Naturprodukte von essentieller Bedeutung. In allen Bereichen der Gastronomie ist das große Ganze bedeutender als die Summe aller Teile, sofern man mit den besten Zutaten beginnt und etwas Magie sowie handwerkliches Geschick hinzufügt. Doch wenn am Anfang minderwertige Zutaten stehen, so kann auch die beste „Zauberformel“ zu keinem guten Ergebnis mehr führen. Ganz nach dem Motto: „garbage in, garbage out“.
          Unter diesem Aspekt strebe ich danach Produkte zu kreieren, die ausgewogen, gesund und darüber hinaus köstlich sind. Selbst Backwaren können, wenn man auf die richtige Balance der Zutaten achtet, Teil einer ausgewogenen, gesunden Ernährung sein und noch dazu hervorragend schmecken. Leider leben wir momentan in einer Welt, die von einer industrialisierten und kurzsichtigen Esskultur dominiert wird. Voller gentechnisch veränderter Lebensmittel, ganz zu schweigen von den Unmengen an Konservierungsstoffen, die wir Jahr für Jahr zu uns nehmen. Eine Welt in der billige Tricks regieren – wie zum Beispiel die Verwendung von minderwertigem Zucker in Form von billigem und ungesundem Maissirup, oder unnötig hohen Mengen an Natrium und anderen Konservierungsstoffen, während mit dem wesentlich gesünderen Fruchtzucker und anderen hochwertigen natürlichen Inhaltsstoffen viel zu sparsam umgegangen wird.


          Was meiner Leidenschaft für die Küche wahre Bedeutung verleiht ist es diese mit anderen Menschen zu teilen. Erst dann stellt sie auch einen Wert für mich dar. Ich möchte mein eigenes Café eröffnen, um die Ergebnisse meiner lang andauernden Forschung unters Volk zu bringen, innovative Kreationen zu liefern und den Menschen neue Geschmackserlebnisse zu bieten.
          Meine unmittelbare Erfahrung hat mir gezeigt, dass der Fokus auf Qualität, nicht nur in Bezug auf Lebensmittel, sondern auch für jeden Aspekt im Leben, von enormer Bedeutung ist. Neue Erfahrungen sind die Farbtupfer in einer sonst so fahlen Welt. Sie bringen Farbe in unser Leben. Der Grund, warum ich FARBO Café ins Leben rufen möchte.


                                    FARBO Café - 

               ein Ort wo neue Erfahrungen Farbe 

                               ins Leben bringen!






    Was ich brauche & was Ihr erhaltet

          Um das FARBO Café gründen zu können benötige ich € 68.000. Ich arbeite hart, um eigene finanzielle Mittel für dieses Projekt aufzubringen, doch es würde mich etliche Jahre kosten, um es aus eigener Kraft zu schaffen. Ich bin sicher, dass ich mit Eurer Hilfe mein Ziel schneller erreichen kann und zweifelsohne mehr in der Welt bewirken kann als einfach nur einen Kredit bei der Bank aufzunehmen. Abgesehen von den köstlichen und gesunden Produkten, die ich in die Welt hinaustrage, werde ich in der Lage sein Menschen zu helfen, sie auszubilden und ausgewogene Nahrungsmittel an den Mann/die Frau zu bringen, anstatt irgendwelche Kredithaie mit horrenden Zinsen zu füttern.
          Hier auf Indiegogo, sowie Facebook, Twitter and YouTube werden alle die mich unterstützen mit up-to-date- Bildern, einem Newsletter und sämtlichen Neuigkeiten rund ums FARBO Café Projekt versorgt. So erfahrt Ihr aus erster Hand welch große Wirkung Euer Beitrag erzielt!
          Solltet Ihr Euch dazu entschließen mich zu unterstützen, dann werft doch mal einen Blick auf die tollen FARBO Café- Gutscheine.






 FARBO
Café Spezialitäten-Gutscheine
     
    Nachfolgend befinden sich Gutscheine für all jene die das FARBO Café nicht besuchen können. Ich bin
davon überzeugt, dass jeder in den Genuss unserer tollen Produkte einfach
kommen muss, vor allem heutzutage in unserer modernen schnelllebigen Welt.
Jeder soll FARBO erleben können! Hier sind die FARBO Café Specialty Perks, die FARBO’s Qualitäts- Kaffeebohnen und Teeblätter portionsweise, mit unserem „step-by-step“- Prinzip Kochrezepte,
zu Euch bringen.

   
         Farbo Specialty Beans (Third Wave)*


          Mit diesem Perk erhaltet Ihr die
frisch gerösteten FARBO- Kaffeebohnen bester Qualität mit freundlichen Grüßen unserer
Kaffeebauern und Röster.
Wir bieten 3 verschiedene
Packungsgrößen:
FarboSpecialty Beans    250 g.
Farbo Specialty Beans   500 g.
Farbo Specialty Beans   1000 g.
Wählt jene, die Euch am
besten passt.


                         Farbo Specialty Tea*


         Für alle Teetrinker gibt es einen besonders tollen Farbo’s Tee- Perk. Ihr bekommt die feinsten FARBO Teeblätter von unserem Partner Teebauern.
Wir bieten 3
verschiedene Packungsgrößen:
Farbo Specialty Tea     250 g.
FarboSpecialty Tea     500 g.
Farbo Specialty Tea   1000 g.
Wählt jene, die
Euch am besten passt.





    WIR SEHEN UNS IM FARBO CAFÉ!





* Please note, as we are not yet a retail shop and still in the
process of creating FARBO Café, we will need more time than usual to process orders
for our valued contributors. As a result, at this moment, we are not able to
name specific coffee beans or tea leaves that will be sent, as they are subject
to change and we wish to avoid misrepresentation. However, I do guarantee that!
Be sure you will get “Chef’s best choice” of the very best product we have
available at the time of your order.

story:
Summary

My name is Ruben Morgado and I am a Mozambican architect living in the United States. I don’t know anyone that loves his country like my father, Carlos Morgado, did.  After he passed away, my brothers and I made a promise to keep his name and legacy alive - for that reason we created the Carlos Morgado Foundation.

Mangundze is a village in the south of Mozambique with a severe lack of basic infrastructure like water, electricity and sanitation.

Why Mangundze?

Mangundze is a community with many pressing needs, but with a little bit of funding, we've identified a way to immediately and easily address some of those needs.  Juan Gabriel Arias, an Argentinian priest that is a close friend of Pope Francis, has a crazy passion for soccer (we do too!) and settled locally to become the caretaker of the old and charming church of Mangundze, is dedicated to assisting the community in any way that he can.  We immediately recognized in him the same commitment and determination to help our country.  Together, we have already worked towards a better Mozambique by implementing projects to rehabilitate schools and a health center to improve the lives and health of vulnerable Mozambicans.

The most critical problem in Mangundze is lack of access to drinking water from improved water sources.  The Carlos Morgado Foundation is determined to work with the regional government and other local organizations to build more boreholes and/or wells closer to the population;  however, this will take time, and requires a larger investment.  While these efforts are being planned, the lack of water continues to affect the daily lives and health of the population.

For this reason we are committed, with your help, to buying and transporting 50 Hippo Water Rollers (www.hipporoller.org) from South Africa to Juan Gabriel for distribution to the population.  A Hippo Water Roller is a high capacity plastic drum that can be rolled when filled, instead of the traditional jugs that require carrying, often on the head.  The plan is that 1 hippo roller will be shared by 5 families, resulting in a life-changing impact to 250 families, or approximately 1,250 people.

The Budget

Imbuvu Projects in South Africa, the company that sells the Hippo Water Roller, has quoted us with a cost for 50 units to be delivered to the closest postal office to Mangundze in the city of Xai-xai. If we are unable to reach our fundraising goal to buy 50 units, we will still buy and distribute any units possible with the funds raised.

The Problem

Only a very small percentage of the population in Mangundze has direct access to an improved water source - drinking water here is a luxury. The lack of access to water is responsible for serious health problems in the population and is the main direct cause of the high infant mortality in the region. Consumption from unimproved water sources most commonly leads to diarrhea, and consequently dehydration, exacerbating the effects of chronic malnutrition in the region. In addition to these obvious health concerns, the community’s social, educational and economic development is stifled as a result.

Access to Water Sources

For the World Health Organization (WHO), an improved drinking water source is defined as one that, by nature of its construction or through active intervention, is likely to be protected from outside contamination, in particular from contamination with fecal matter.

Consumption of Water

The average water consumption in developed countries varies between 200 and 300 liters (52 and 79 gallons) per person, per day.  According to the WHO, the minimal water consumption for drinking and cooking is set at 15 liters (3.9 gallons) per person, per day. In rural Mozambique, this is estimated at approximately 4 liters (1 gallon).  With just this one glaring statistic, the extent of the problem becomes clearer.  Due to lack of access, residents of Magundze consume only one quarter of the minimal amount of water deemed necessary for a healthy life.

Women and Children

In Magundze, women and children travel long distances every day to collect water for their families, carrying the water on top of their heads.  Most of these children skip school to help with this important task, yet the quantity of water that can be collected in one day is still insufficient.  The physical stress of carrying the large weight of water on their heads is immense, often causing spinal injuries and other back problems.  Furthermore, temperatures can easily reach 35 degrees Celsius (95F) and higher, making the collection of water even more physically taxing.

The Immediate Solution

“Designed in Africa for Africa the Hippo Water Roller enables women, children and the elderly to collect 5 times more water than a single bucket by simply rolling it along the ground. The savings in time, energy and reduced suffering are immense and the positive social-impact benefits are far reaching."


The Hippo Water Roller is a plastic drum with 90 liters of capacity. With Hippo Rollers, the population can collect drinking water and easily roll it back to their homes. The use of this solution has the following immediate benefits:

  • Makes the collection of drinking water faster
  • Reduces the physical strain of carrying the water
  • Relieves women and children to have more time for education, livelihood and social activities

The use of Hippo Rollers does not replace the need for new water sources, but with a lifespan of 5-7 years, it will alleviate this stress in the community while efforts are made to open up new water access points.

Thank you for your help!
story_txt:
Summary
My name is Ruben Morgado and I am a Mozambican architect living in the United States. I don’t know anyone that loves his country like my father, Carlos Morgado, did.  After he passed away, my brothers and I made a promise to keep his name and legacy alive - for that reason we created the Carlos Morgado Foundation.
Mangundze is a village in the south of Mozambique with a severe lack of basic infrastructure like water, electricity and sanitation.Why Mangundze?
Mangundze is a community with many pressing needs, but with a little bit of funding, we've identified a way to immediately and easily address some of those needs.  Juan Gabriel Arias, an Argentinian priest that is a close friend of Pope Francis, has a crazy passion for soccer (we do too!) and settled locally to become the caretaker of the old and charming church of Mangundze, is dedicated to assisting the community in any way that he can.  We immediately recognized in him the same commitment and determination to help our country.  Together, we have already worked towards a better Mozambique by implementing projects to rehabilitate schools and a health center to improve the lives and health of vulnerable Mozambicans.
The most critical problem in Mangundze is lack of access to drinking water from improved water sources.  The Carlos Morgado Foundation is determined to work with the regional government and other local organizations to build more boreholes and/or wells closer to the population;  however, this will take time, and requires a larger investment.  While these efforts are being planned, the lack of water continues to affect the daily lives and health of the population.
For this reason we are committed, with your help, to buying and transporting 50 Hippo Water Rollers (www.hipporoller.org) from South Africa to Juan Gabriel for distribution to the population.  A Hippo Water Roller is a high capacity plastic drum that can be rolled when filled, instead of the traditional jugs that require carrying, often on the head.  The plan is that 1 hippo roller will be shared by 5 families, resulting in a life-changing impact to 250 families, or approximately 1,250 people.
The Budget
Imbuvu Projects in South Africa, the company that sells the Hippo Water Roller, has quoted us with a cost for 50 units to be delivered to the closest postal office to Mangundze in the city of Xai-xai. If we are unable to reach our fundraising goal to buy 50 units, we will still buy and distribute any units possible with the funds raised.
The Problem
Only a very small percentage of the population in Mangundze has direct access to an improved water source - drinking water here is a luxury.  The lack of access to water is responsible for serious health problems in the population and is the main direct cause of the high infant mortality in the region.  Consumption from unimproved water sources most commonly leads to diarrhea, and consequently dehydration, exacerbating the effects of chronic malnutrition in the region.  In addition to these obvious health concerns, the community’s social, educational and economic development is stifled as a result.
Access to Water Sources
For the World Health Organization (WHO), an improved drinking water source is defined as one that, by nature of its construction or through active intervention, is likely to be protected from outside contamination, in particular from contamination with fecal matter.

Consumption of Water
The average water consumption in developed countries varies between 200 and 300 liters (52 and 79 gallons) per person, per day.  According to the WHO, the minimal water consumption for drinking and cooking is set at 15 liters (3.9 gallons) per person, per day.  In rural Mozambique, this is estimated at approximately 4 liters (1 gallon).  With just this one glaring statistic, the extent of the problem becomes clearer.  Due to lack of access, residents of Magundze consume only one quarter of the minimal amount of water deemed necessary for a healthy life.

Women and Children
In Magundze, women and children travel long distances every day to collect water for their families, carrying the water on top of their heads.  Most of these children skip school to help with this important task, yet the quantity of water that can be collected in one day is still insufficient.  The physical stress of carrying the large weight of water on their heads is immense, often causing spinal injuries and other back problems.  Furthermore, temperatures can easily reach 35 degrees Celsius (95F) and higher, making the collection of water even more physically taxing.
The Immediate Solution
“Designed in Africa for Africa the Hippo Water Roller enables women, children and the elderly to collect 5 times more water than a single bucket by simply rolling it along the ground. The savings in time, energy and reduced suffering are immense and the positive social-impact benefits are far reaching."
The Hippo Water Roller is a plastic drum with
90 liters of capacity.  With Hippo Rollers, the population can collect drinking water and easily roll it back to their homes. The use of this solution has the following immediate benefits:

Makes the collection of drinking
     water faster
Reduces the physical strain of
     carrying the water
Relieves women and children to have
     more time for education, livelihood and social activities

The use of Hippo Rollers does not replace the need for new water sources, but with a lifespan of 5-7 years, it will alleviate this stress in the community while efforts are made to open up new water access points.Thank you for your help!

story:
Holistic Dreamz, Soldier’s Success Story

Take your place in the line of people standing together. Secure the future for thousands of soldiers and their families. Instantly guarantee hope for their health and happiness.

The road to recovery

A powerful show of support is what military and veterans need right now.

Enterprising soldier Gemma Gardner fought her way back from a mental breakdown. She took the road to recovery.

She now owns a successful health and wellbeing venture. She is mapping out the route for others to follow.

33-year-old Gemma from Salford UK, served 14 years in the army.

She was left devastated in 2014 when she was medically discharged with compartment syndrome, causing her legs to become very swollen.

Cut off from army life, loss of identification from all she had known since the age of 17, Gemma suffered a mental breakdown and became totally reliant on her husband Gareth.

But her hope for the future started to improve when she discovered healing therapies that worked alongside medical advice. Through determination and support the mother-of-three went on to launch Holistic Dreamz, which connects the public to a range of alternative healing services. Now Gemma is expanding the business to focus on military personnel and their families. She needs your help to promote her 90 day programme of support.

Gemma is a living testament to the success of taking ownership when transitioning from military to civilian life.

Help thousands of military personnel worldwide

This campaign will reach out to 2,437,000 European, 59,000 Canadian, 51,000 Australian, 9,000 New Zealand, 1,370,000 US military personnel.

A unique 90 day programme (with 100% success rate) can provide structure, remove personal barriers and give life focus. The 90 day programme provides continual support to those who are feeling overwhelmed by life outside the parameters of the armed forces. Struggling in silence can become a thing of the past.

What the programme does

If someone can’t swim, they need help to stay afloat until they can swim. If someone has health problems, they need help to find answers until good health returns.

The programme will give ironclad information and support to serving and veteran military personnel in Europe, Canada, Australia, New Zealand and the USA.

Your donation will save family lives

There are currently over 20 million veterans living in the United States and nearly ten percent are receiving care for mental illness [1] Although Governments give high priority to the care of injured troops, including mental health support, often more support is needed too. As Gemma knows, the feelings of isolation and despair can be overwhelming. Every opportunity to allow military service personnel to discover what works for them will save family lives. References can be found at:
[1] jmvh.org/article/correlates-of-frequent-mental-distress-among-active-and-former-military-personnel/  and nimh.nih.gov/news/science-news/2014/suicide-in-the-military-army-nih-funded-study-points-to-risk-and-protective-factors.shtml

Select a Perk

Here’s your fun part! Select a perk and enjoy your reward. Thank you for your powerful show of support for what military and veterans need right now

Apply to become one of our Ambassadors

Take your place in the line of people standing together. We need Ambassadors to 'shout out' and support our campaign because military personnel need your help. Get in touch with the founder Gemma.

Use the Indiegogo tools and share on all your social media channels. We need maximum worldwide exposure to reach the millions. This will happen with your support. This is your quick way to instantly guarantee hope for health and happiness.

Reality - Why I need your support

  • License Insurances
  • Software database (online Workshops & Directory)
  • Marketing and advertisement
  • Copywriter
  • Branding 
  • Social Media
  • Legal & Consultancy fees
  • Setting up the Charity - Half way homes for military personnel and their families.

story:
Who we are and what do we do?

I want to start my story with the Jack Ma's quote“Don’t hire the most qualified, hire the craziest” (founder and Executive Chairman of Alibaba Group). That is exactly what our platform is about! 

We are the company of young people with European education and great ambitions. Like many peers (generation "y" representatives), we've finished university with an MBAs and Professional Masters degrees and started to ask ourselves: "what's next?". It was clear, we stuck in a circle of job-search process. I don't have a job as I don't have experience - I don't have experience, as I can't get a job. The companies prefer to hire someone with 5+ years of experience, creating a huge gap between generations and make us spend around 3 years in internships or go into service positions that doesn't make life easier. And of course, there is the reason for that, everyone wants to be sure in employers, but are there any ways to checks person's skills or knowledge? Answering these questions we came up with the LevelUp idea. We decided to create a place where companies and students (alumni) can meet and start to evolve and develop together. 


What is LevelUp?


Description

LevelUp is an online service (crowdsourcing platform) where companies can publish any case or assignment, brief or question and receive unique solutions and great ideas from the young people who know how to think out-of-box. ‪Generation Y ‬views a job not just as a means to pay the rent, rather a route to exploring their passions, hobbies and philosophies. 

The platform has a rate mechanic that obligates companies evaluate all the ideas through the certain scale. The best students will receive bonuses  like free workshop participation or meeting with CEO of favorite company or even a money prize for genius solutions. 

In addition, it is a calendar of events and workshops all over the world and fresh news.  

How does it look like?

Stage

The first release (beta version) is going online on the 19-the of June, 2015. We want to invite everyone to become a co-creator and  help us with the website testing, give us advices and make our product better. 

Support

We are in the early stage of our promotion, but have already got some support from international advertising agency "Cheil", web development company "PintaWeb" and local video production "Studio Performance".   We are sure, you are going to be the next! 

 



Why do we need Funding?

We understand that connection of two target audiences is not that easy goal! The main aim is to spread the information about LevelUp as fast as we can. That's why all raised funds will be spent on promotion activities and product enhancement.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our idea, please tell 5 different friends (students or companies' owners or to those who can be interested in) about LevelUp 

Please send us (info@lvl-up.me) your successful or unsuccessful stories about building career or job search, etc., and we will spread them through our social media and publish at LevelUp platform. (Please add photos or video)

And finally, join us on Facebook!

story:
¿QUIENES SOMOS?

Mi nombre es Katherine Cepeda. Yo y 3 amigos somos Cómesela a La Negra. Somos cuatro 23 añeros intentando crear una empresa de empanadas artesanales, veganas, vegetarianas y horneadas en Río Piedras, Puerto Rico. Somos muy jóvenes todas/os en este embeleco. Tenemos unas ganas de trabajar increíbles que se convierten en amor y en comida para ustedes.  Estamos de nómadas ofreciendo nuestras “nenas” en Río Piedras y algunas áreas de San Juan pero ya queremos oficializar nuestra magia y colocarnos en un local propio donde todos/as ustedes puedan comérmela. Nos estamos fajando haciendo todo lo posible por crear un producto de alta calidad que no sea dañino a la salud.

¿QUE OFRECEMOS?

Hacemos empanadas artesanales, veganas y vegetarianas. Hacemos la masa desde 0. Hacemos el relleno desde 0. Sin comprar nada congelado. Todo es fresco. La mayoría de nuestros ingredientes son orgánicos y son de aquí. Usamos solo aceite de uva, de coco o de oliva en nuestras preparaciones. Solo ofrecemos productos horneados o para hornearse.

Nuestras empanadas son las más ricas de la cuadra, del país, rellenas a capacidad y con sabor hasta en la masa. Nuestras empanadas tienen masas artesanales de sabores creativos como “Jengibre y Pimienta”, “Cebolla y Queso”, “Espinaca y Ajo”, “Café” entre otros. Tenemos rellenos como “Berenjena Parmesana”, “Piña Colada”, “Pizza Artesanal” entre otros. ¿Qué no son ricas? Ve a nuestra página, mira nuestras obras de arte y PRUEBALAS pa’ que veas.

¿QUE NECESITAMOS?

Necesitamos una manita para comprar todo lo necesario para convertir nuestra iniciativa en un negocio. Queremos ser una empresa. Ayúdanos con un empujoncito a conseguir el dinero que nos hace falta para hacer las reparaciones de nuestro primer local y a conseguir el equipo que nos hace falta para abrir la fábrica de La Negra a más comelones/as. 

Necesitamos recaudar las primeras rentas del local que tenemos en mente ($3,000 en total de $1,000 por mes) para comenzar a hacer los arreglos del restaurante. Este tiempo de arreglos es un espacio en el cual casi no generaremos ingresos y necesitamos un fondo económico para hacerlo. Necesitamos al menos $7,000 más para comprar algunos de los equipos necesarios para operar y decorar (hornos, congeladores, neveras, mesas, tablas, sillas, artículos de cocina, uniformes, etc.). Aunque en nuestros planes está hacer todo lo que se pueda con materiales reciclados, la mano de obra de estos artículos artesanales nos va a costar. El resto del dinero lo utilizaremos como un fondo para hacer compra, pagar agua-luz y nómina ($5,000) mientras comenzamos a generar nuestra propia solvencia económica. Aunque probablemente necesitemos un poquito más con este dinero podemos comenzar.  

Estamos utilizando 2 plataformas distintas para recaudar la totalidad de este dinero. 

¿COMO NOS PUEDES AYUDAR?

Puedes donar hasta $1 en esta plataforma. También puedes entrar a nuestra página, hacer una orden y comer de nuestras empanadas. Te enamorarás sin duda. 

Comparte este enlace y ayúdanos a crecer.  

Somos más que agradecidas/os con el tiempo que empleaste leyendo esto.

Recuerda, Cómesela a La Negra.

:D!

story:
Turning The Dream Into A Reality


After years of competing in bmx, road bike, and mountain bike events, the industry has always been my passion.  With over 30 years experience in the bicycle repair industry I realized a need for a mobile repair shop.  With Florida being a retirement state, there is a particular need for my service. 


My mission is to offer low to no cost quality bicycle repairs to the homeless, less fortunate and retired individuals.  I will travel between mission homes, homeless shelters, senior citizen communities, and mobile home parks to do repairs on bicycles, adult tricycles, and manual wheelchairs, as well as offer supplies and support to the local bicycle clubs and events.  Additionally, I plan to obtain unwanted bicycles which I would repair, restore and donate back to the community.


Although I have worked hard undertaking this project myself to keep startup costs low, it is not enough.  With this in mind, I would like to ask for your contribution so that I may obtain my goal of changing lives of individuals for the better.  Any amount is welcomed.  It would go a long way in launching this business and making it successful to give back to the community. 

My


Mygoal is to raise $10, 000 which will enable me to obtain parts, inventory and specialty tools required to offer this service.  All funds received will go directly toward those costs.  



Prior to relocating to Florida in 2003, I had success in supporting the Erie County Chapter of MS by following riders on their annual 100 mile fund raising ride and repairing various problems at no cost. 

I feel my services would be an asset to the community since individuals use their bicycles, etc. as a means of transportation, exercise and general daily living.  Not everyone has the means to transport their bicycles or wheelchairs to shops for repair.  My service would take me directly to them at their convenience.



My biggest obstacle will be getting the word out and getting communities to accept me as a trusted repair service.  This will be overcome by building trust and lasting relationships with my clients.  My presence in the community itself and through local events will enable me to advertise my services and build additional trust and confidence.


Please consider this request with graditude.  Thank you for helping turn a vision into reality.

story:
GriotWorks Future Campaign - Your Story is Our Story!

GriotWorks has been a force in Philadelphia since 2007! We've produced over 100 programs to include storytelling programs, cultural competency courses, panel discussions, films, videos and theater productions. We've reached the END of an era. Under NEW LEADERSHIP, GriotWorks will evolve into a resource for a national base of Modern Griots and will serve even more communities through tours, technology, and music production.

This is not a bright idea. We have DONE THE WORK! Every day, we'll show you something we've done. Your donations are an investment in an institution that has and will continue to serve communities with an emphasis on Black Storytelling, Black People and Black Culture.

Funds raised will go towards:

1- Archiving and documenting our work and pedagogy

2- Editing the documentary about "Griot Work"

3 - Producing the GriotWorks Future Celebration and Awards Ceremony

GriotWorks has a future and we're happy you're a part of it!

Under NEW LEADERSHIP, GriotWorks will evolve into a resource for a national base of Modern Griots and will serve even more communities through tours, technology, and music production. This is not a bright idea. We have DONE THE WORK! Every day, we'll show you something we've done. Your donations are an investment in an institution that has and will continue to serve communities with an emphasis on Black Storytelling, Black People and Black Culture.Funds raised will go towards:1- Archiving and documenting our work and pedagogy 2- Editing the documentary about "Griot Work"3 - Producing the GriotWorks Future Celebration and Awards CeremonyGriotWorks has a future and we're happy you're a part of it!

story:
What is Dreamer's Cup?

You know those things that you don't know you need until you get one and then you ask yourself how did I manage without it? Dreamers's Cup is one of them. It is a vessel for milk foam making which is better than any other you can currently find in the world market. It's made of iron steel. It's purpose is to keep milk cool while preparing milk foam for cappuccino or any other coffee with milk. When milk is hot, the foam can not be made and therefore when it's hot it can not be used anymore but it is usually thrown away. Using Dreamer's Cup you save milk because it stays cold longer. It was tested and proved that it saves 25% of milk. The foam is better too because it is cooled even while being prepared. By using Dreamer's Cup you can make a nice and tasty milk foam easily. It is an innovative product that was patented in Croatia (patent number: HR PK20120905 B3) and applied for the international patent (still in process).


How does it work?

Every bar, restaurant, coffee shop etc. which makes coffee with coffee machine using hot steam has all it needs to use the vessel. Ice is used as a medium of cooling down. 

The use is very simple. You put ice  and water in the lower part of the vessel, and then immerse the upper part in the ice and water and connect the upper and the lower part of the vessel by means of threads. Then you put milk in the upper vessel and start making foam with the steam nozzle of a coffee machine. And that's all you need to do to get nice, rich and tasty milk foam. 

When you feel that the lower vessel is starting to warm up, you divide the vessels and change the ice and water. The upper vessel can stand alone without needing to hold it - even with milk inside. After you put new ice and water, connect the vessels and continue making wonderful foam. It's as easy as that.

How did I come to the idea?

I started working at my parents fast food when i was thirteen. We have been selling lots of coffee with milk and had a problem of milk overheating that could not be used when it warms up to a certain temperature - in that case the foam can not be made. We had to put the warm milk in te fridge to cool down, but when it gets cold again it changes taste so we couldn't use that milk because it would change the taste of the coffee. We where trowing away about 2 l of milk per day, that's about 60 l per month or 730 l per year. That quantity of milk was waisted. One day I put the old vessel that we used to make steam in the ice bucket to keep milk cold. And this day we did not throw away any milk. The only problem was that everything was wet because of the water from the ice bucket. Then I dreamed  that I would like to have a vessel wich can be cooled down without spilling the water. Several years after I made one and my dream came true. That's why I called it "Dreamer's Cup".

What have we done?

Project documentation. 

Company which made samples found.

Mould for making the vessel financed and made.

Samples made.

Vessel tested.

What do we need more money for?

We need money to order first 1000 pcs. Then the Dreamer 's Cup firm would be able to start developing the business, marketing and sales network. 

Risks & Challenges:

The only possible risk is that the market does not recognize Dreamer's Cup right away. But we think that savings of 25 % of milk, better taste and easier preparing will be very convincing.

story:
What is Dom’s Chop Salsa?

Dom’s Chop Salsa (DCS) is the real deal; made in a way that’s different from other salsa you might see on the shelf.  The secret is that we grill our ingredients – instead of oven roasting them.


Why is grilled better?  The process results in a natural smoky flavor that is infused into all of our salsa fixin’s.  The heat, temperature and mesquite chips in the charcoal creates this flavor goodness right over the open grill.  No fake flakes here!

Our secret seasoning combines authentic Tex-Mex flavor and the homestyle BBQ taste you love.  Traditional + BBQ = a special flavor fusion known as DCS.

The Story:

Started by Dom and Susie Mendiola in August 2014, the DCS concept came from a desire to share a unique homemade salsa with friends and family. What began with a couple of grills, blenders, and fry carts expanded as demand increased - which led to the decision to scale production, fill online orders and enter the local market.

Why do we need to fund DCS?

Our goal is to raise $50,000 ... and keep your mouths happy with that smoky grilled taste! Hitting this gets us:

1. A custom made stainless steel grill ... the DCS 5000, designed just for us:

To keep making salsa and take DCS to market with our true grilled taste – this is a must! 

Designed by our partner Ernest Flores,  this will allow us to automate and scale production 1000 percent.  Today we can make 25 jars per hour and we can't keep up with demand ... the DCS 5000 will bring us to 275 jars per hour! 

The DCS 5000 will cost $25k to have created through a custom grill fabricator and is essential to keep DCS going.

2. First official release of Dom’s Chop Salsa:

We are ready to release three official DCS flavors:

  • Traditional Mild
  • Happy Medium
  • Scorpion Hot 
A minimum of 1100 jars per flavor is required, which means the first official DCS release will be a minimum total of 3300 jars. Our hope is that this campaign will blow that number out of the water! Shh – don’t tell our co-packer yet.


3. What we need to make it all work:

From labels to advertising to getting Dom some voice lessons (he sings to the tomatoes) ... we're gonna do it right. It also includes some of the fun stuff we’ve got in the pipeline for this campaign – stickers, t-shirts, engraved grill plates, grill kits, launch party support & more.

How else to get involved:  

  1. Share our campaign. Click that button and get the word out to your friends. Facebook, Tweet, email Gammy in Ohio - whatever you can do to help us spread the word!
  2. Continue to believe in us. The support we've had from family, friends & the community is what has taken DCS this far and inspires us to push even further.  
TL;DR: We have the best grilled salsa in South TX and need your help sharing it with the rest of the world.  If you don’t go-go, it’s a no-go!

story:
Short Summary

Born in 2011, People Power Movement-Movimiento Poder Popular is a democratic people's organization dedicated to educating, agitating, and organizing for popular control of all the areas affecting our lives, such as our schools, workplaces, housing, transportation, etc.

Our primary campaign involves fighting displacement in the Bronx, specifically in Kingsbridge. The borough stands as the last frontier against gentrification, and it has been targeted by the real estate industry for multimillion dollar developments in working-class neighborhoods, fully endorsed by the Mayor and the Bronx Borough President.  Furthermore, we're organizing on college campuses against tuition increases, the gentrification of CUNY and sexual assault on campus.

Below you can find links to media coverage of our previous campaigns:

-http://www.nytimes.com/2015/05/15/nyregion/de-b...

-http://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/bronx/plan-...

-http://bronx.news12.com/news/ice-skating-center...

-http://www.mnn.org/news/yc-spotlight-community-...

-http://riverdalepress.com/stories/Residents-bla...


What We Need & What You Get

A large part of our members attend class full-time and/or work at low-wage jobs. Our goal is to raise $500 to purchase 4 unlimited MetroCards for those members, in order to alleviate their transportation costs when organizing in the community and on campuses.

Any amount you can contribute is greatly appreciated, but if you're interested in a perk, take a look at our various hand-made items. Any or all of them could be yours!


The Impact

Since we do not accept corporate or foundation money, your contributions are extremely important for sustaining our work, as well as building a financially independent movement organizing for Fundamental Social Change.

This is our first time using a crowdfunding platform to support our efforts, but while we do not have an established track record in this regard, we have considerable organizing experience. 

Our past campaigns involved mobilizing the community to protest against police harassment, including illegal stop-and-frisks, and indiscriminately giving summonses to Lehman high school students; organizing a pedal power caravan after Hurricane Sandy to deliver water, food, clothes, and heaters, to Red Hook, Brooklyn; organizing CUNY City College students and Harlem community members to protest the illegal seizure of the Guillermo Morales/ Assata Shakur Center, among other activities in the Bronx.


Other Ways You Can Help

Make sure to share this campaign with your friends! Once you contribute, you can also help our organizers by promoting our hashtags on social media.

story:
The Sick Bay is a unique place to come and chill out, socialise and make new friends. Set in a converted textiles mill in Ancoats, Manchester we provide a cosy and inviting space, open to everyone, to come and hangout with us and everyone else.

Free refreshments such as tea, coffee, hot chocolate, milkshake, cereal, fresh cakes, fresh popcorn and sweets are available all day, every day so come in and help yourself. Grab a seat on the leather sofas, rocking chair or beanbags and for as long as you like kick back, relax and chill out with your new found friends.

Plenty of games to choose from including a fantastic "Cops & Robbers" Scalextric race track hanging from a solid beech hand carved table hanging from the ceiling, which doubles up as a coffee or games table. Grab a book, do a jigsaw, build a model or learn to hula-hoop!
The Sick Bay is decorated with dozens of fantastic tattoo-style original paintings and prints and all sorts of other goodies such as jewellery, entomology, antlers, clothes and accessories which are all for sale and money raised from these goes straight back into funding the facility, although there's no obligation to buy whatsoever.

The aim is to provide a warm welcome and friendly stay in our little community hub so you can go away feeling relaxed and inspired having spent time away from the "always on" smartphones and tablets we seem to be solely communicating with these days!

Did I mention we have our own popcorn machine for fresh hot popcorn any time?
