story:
Unique Health and Beauty Boutique

Hello Dear Citizens of the World!  I am very excited to share my dreams, ideas and passion with you!  Thank you for watching my video!

My name is Ilze.  I am very passionate about beauty and I feel privileged to have met some of the most beautiful people in my life. They were kind, caring, they shared their stories, their happiness and smiles, they were open-hearted and they made me feel special.

Today I feel experienced enough, wise enough, and determined enough to create a place where people can gather together to indulge in beauty and feel special.


This beautiful building is a true landmark of Cork City. It has been empty for a long time.

A few weeks ago it came on the market, the starting price is € 950,000 and it needs a lot of renovation and complete refurbishment.
I have walked past it so many times envisioning the amazing place it could become.  The official use at the moment is listed as offices, but it could be changed. This building could become a true embodiment of beauty and health.  A place where people can come to regain their energy, clear their mind, socialize productively, and get inspired.

Just imagine...

  • Unique Spa where you can enjoy a Manicure, Pedicure, Facial, Full Body Mud Treatment, Sauna and Relaxing Massage

  • Organic Food Restaurant where you can treat yourself to the most Delicious and Nutritious Food presented in creative recipes

  • Organic Cosmetic Shop where you can get skincare you can trust

  • Beauty Training School where newly qualified specialists can gain real experience through unique training programs designed by experienced professionals

  • Function Room where you can enjoy your drink in the company of great people with wonderful live music performances

  • 40 Seat Home-Style Cinema for watching documentaries, speeches and inspiring movies designed for the ultimate feel of comfort

  • Lecture Room where courses on self-development, lifestyle, beauty and nutrition would be held

  • Solo Escape Meditation Rooms were you can hide away from the world for a while and reconnect with yourself.  There would be a Silent Room, Mantra Room, and a Symphonic Music Room featuring color and imagery therapy

  • Men’s Grooming Wing for men who like to take good care of themselves. There is nothing as charming as a well-groomed and well-mannered man

  • Guest Bedrooms for a very special stay in Cork City

  • Kids Drop off Point, happy days! Just imagine leaving your children in safe hands while you pamper yourself or catch an inspiring lecture.

It is a big dream and I know that the funds I am looking for are not small and the work that needs to be done is tremendous but I have seen how people together can do incredible things!

A lot of my motivation comes from a simple observation that a lot of men and women, and especially women, struggle to like and feel good about themselves - What to wear?  What to eat?  Am I too fat?  Is my make-up looking o.k?  Am I beautiful enough?  Hours and hours are spent in front of the mirror and are we ever fully happy with what we see?  The reflection in the mirror has taken over the real person.  We need to look more carefully to see clearly, we need to look within.

Beauty starts with taking good care of yourself - your intellect , your body and your feelings.  It is a way to develop a contented character, a healthy body and a  heart that is filled with hope, love and happiness.  It can be hard work to get there but it is worth it!  It leads to meaningful relationships, a satisfying life and lasting happiness.

A bit of my story

I grew up in a small town in Latvia.  There was a time when I believed I would never board a plane, it was something only privileged people got to do.  We got to visit the airport with my class teacher to see the air planes.  Through a child's eyes they were amazing and I dreamed of taking flight one day.

At the age of 19 I boarded my first flight to Ireland.  Times had changed fast and flying had become affordable.  English was the language I always wanted to learn. Cork, a beautiful and charming city, became my home.

I grew fond of Irish people immediately, I found them kind, friendly, very helpful, and full of cheer.

I started working in bars and retail shops.  Soon enough I found myself itching to become master of some trade.  At age 21 I embarked on my first nail course. Breaking into the beauty industry was harder than I imagined, but the joy of making people happy and being able to listen to so many life stories kept me going.

Eight years went by, I did a lot of growing up, explored the world, and worked for different salons.  I started to dream of my own salon, I had a clear, vivid vision of how it would look and feel, and how it could change the concept of a beauty salon.

When I found the Beauty Crime premises, at first my friends thought I was a mad woman and I guess they had a good reason!

This is what we were facing..

Together we embarked on the mission to make the impossible possible. It was three months of super hard work, a lot of worry but a lot of laughter too.

There was very little sleep and a lot of coffee with chocolate croissants. The abundant support of my friends and family was invaluable.

Today when I see people enjoying themselves at Beauty Crime I think to myself – it was all worth it.

I wanted our clients to experience beauty with all of their senses. I wanted them to feel comfortable, to see beautiful surroundings, to inhale the mild calming scent of fresh flowers and incense with every breath.  I wanted them to forget about their daily worries, just sip away on delicious coffee, flip through inspiring books and truly indulge themselves in serenity while our friendly team of professionals are taking good care of them.  After a few  months I saw that Beauty Crime was becoming a very special place.

The Vision

Creating Beauty Crime on a bigger scale would be an amazing opportunity to provide everyone living and visiting Cork with wonderful and unforgettable experiences; a place where you can renew your energy and enjoy your time, a place where the true meaning of beauty can be revived, cherished and shared!  If this beautiful vision comes true who knows...  one day we might spread our wings to reach you overseas!

What We Need & What You Get 

To buy the building €950,000 is needed.  I went inside the building three weeks ago, to take some pictures, and I got the floor plans.  I showed it all to my brother to see if it would be architecturally possible.  My brother Ervin has been passionate about building since childhood, he builds houses from the foundation upwards, and completed the renovation at Beauty Crime premises as well as custom made all the wooden furniture. I call him the man with "golden hands" and have always admired his skill, creativity and precision.  We estimate that the renovations, refurbishing and opening to the public will cost us € 1.500 000.

If  we don't manage to get enough funding to buy and renovate the beautiful white building on Grand Parade, we can explore other possibilities of how to invest the funds to expand and make some of these wonderful things come true.  All our supporters that purchased Treatment Vouchers are welcome to book and enjoy their treatments at our current beauty salon: Beauty Crime on 10 Cornmarket Street, Cork, Ireland .
Everyone who contributed by purchasing products from our ELIER Organic Skin Care Perks will receive their package soon after the funds are transferred with a little thank you token!

This is how you can support us!

Voucher PERKS*

You can purchase a voucher for your preferred treatment to pamper yourself or your loved ones and you can always use the amount on the voucher for an alternative treatment!

If you are not living in Ireland who knows you might visit us one day, and we will be happy to see you even few years down the line as there is no expire date on the vouchers!

NAIL CARE Treatments


*The clients with the Hand and Foot Treatment Vouchers will enjoy extended            hand/foot massage!

*Your Total Saving on 6D Brows is €100

Thank You for supporting us by purchasing our Treatment Voucher Perks.  You can start to redeem your vouchers from February 2016 at Beauty Crime, 10 Cornmarket Street, Cork, Ireland. We will be able to accept 10 vouchers a week to keep our current business healthy.

Natural Skin Care PERKS

ELIER - Highly Organic Mud Cosmetics

I chose a relatively new brand of natural cosmetics for the treatments we offer at Beauty Crime and as you might have never heard about ELIER before, I will give you some insights.

The company and the products are based on Organic Mud that has been used in skin regeneration for more than 200 years.

I started to use Elier 3 years ago when I decided to spend a summer at my parents’ house after coming home from 6 months of traveling in India.  My Mom had become a true admirer of the brand which meant that wherever I turned there was a bottle of Elier.  What I loved immediately were the scents and feel of all the products – light, smooth, natural, truly elegant.  Twice a week we covered ourselves in Elier Organic Mud and enjoyed the pleasant heat of traditional Latvian sauna, which increases the effect of the mud.  After this process I felt like a new born baby, clean and pure inside out.  Two months later I was in love with Elier and in many ways this new found love added inspiration for me to open a beauty place that embraces health, a place where the least possible amount of chemicals are used.

Elier has a beautiful history.  The Organic Mud has been used in skin regeneration treatments for more than 200 years.  The known history dates back to the time of the Russian Empire when Catherine the Great discovered Elier Mud in a small village in the land where Latvia now is.  In 1785 Catherine the Great opened a clinic for the people, before that it was used only by the royal family. The clinic remained open until World War II.  Later the natural reserve of Elier Organic Mud was bought by a private investor.

At the time there was no scientific research done, and there was no clarity on why the mud was so effective in skin regeneration.  The research was started in 1999 by an international team of scientists in Switzerland, the results were incredible - the underground caves that were filled with Elier Mud over millions of years were formed from broken down flora and fauna soaking through the ground.  The mud reservoir is like a living organism capable of reproducing.  The composition of Elier Organic Mud has more than 800 biologically active substances that are all present in human skin cells which means that our skin can easily recognize and absorb them.

ELIER

ELIER product formulas were developed in collaboration with scientific laboratories. The Swiss ELIER Laboratory developed a 5-stage patented extraction technology that made it possible to extract highly organic substances and create a unique skin and health care product range that could mark the end to your search for the perfect product!

Today the 800 organic components extracted from Elier Organic Mud is recognized as Peloid Complex®.

Elier Peloid Complex® is a high concentration of active substances: amino acids, vitamins, enzymes, minerals, micro- and macro-elements, natural anti-oxidants and natural antibiotics.

Peloid Complex® has a positive influence on blood micro-circulation and the state of the body's capillary system and lymphatic vessels.  It activates the immune system, stabilizes the functioning of the nervous system and eliminates toxic and metabolic intermediate products from skin cells, while enhancing their vitality and process of regeneration.  It also provides a deep antioxidant effect,  and regulates the synthesis of collagen and elastane.

ELIER Treatment Perks

ELIER Skincare Perks

* Your Total saving on the Activlift Package is €73
*Your Total saving on Cellfood Package  €51

We created the Full Face Care Packages for you to experience the real power of Elier Organics Cosmetics.  We recommend not to mix other products into your skincare routine in order to get maximum results.  In the package you have everything you need from your morning to evening skincare routines.  You will receive all directions on how, when and what to use as well as some essential beauty tips.


*Your Total saving on Fresh Start Package is €17
*Your Total saving for Shower Perfect Package is €28

*Your Total saving on Men's Care Package €40

ELIER Unique Skincare Perks

Elier Unique is luxury line from Elier.  The mud used in the Elier Unique range comes from the deepest layer of the reservoir and has the highest concentration of the active organic components.  Elier Unique brings you the quality of Professional Spa Products in the the comfort of your own home.

* Your Total saving on Unique Face Care Package is €50
* Your Total saving on Luxury Full Body Care Package is €105

Thank You for supporting us by purchasing our Natural Skin Care Perks!  We will start posting out your packages soon after the funds are received.  You will be enjoying Elier before Christmas is here!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you might not be able to contribute, but it doesn't mean you can't help!

When I originally discovered Indiegogo I was enormously happy and excited that such a platform exists that can bring people together to support and inspire each other.  I never thought that I would end up exposing my dreams and hopes to the world.  I kindly ask you to make as much noise as possible, please share it with others!

  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools
  • E-mail this link   
  • https://www.indiegogo.com/campaigns/unique-health-and-beauty-boutique
  • Facebook - share it on your timeline or message it to others
  • Our just tell your friends!

Thank You from the bottom of my heart!

Sincerely,

Ilze and The Beauty Crime Crew
story_txt:
Unique Health and Beauty Boutique 
 

Hello Dear Citizens of the World!  I am very excited to share my dreams, ideas and passion with you!  Thank you for watching my video! 
My name is Ilze.  I am very passionate about beauty and I feel privileged to have met some of the most
beautiful people in my life. They were kind, caring, they shared their stories,
their happiness and smiles, they were open-hearted and they made me feel special. 
Today I
feel experienced enough, wise enough, and determined enough to create a place where
people can gather together to indulge in beauty and feel special. 

This beautiful building is a true landmark of Cork City. It has been empty for a long time.

A few weeks ago it came on the market, the starting price is € 950,000 and it needs a lot of renovation and complete refurbishment. I have walked past it so many times envisioning the amazing place it could become.  The
official use at the moment is listed as offices, but it could be changed. This building
could become a true embodiment of beauty and health.  A place where people can come to regain their energy, clear
their mind, socialize productively, and get inspired. Just imagine...

Unique Spa where you
can enjoy a Manicure, Pedicure, Facial, Full Body Mud Treatment, Sauna and Relaxing Massage



Organic Food Restaurant where you can treat yourself to the most Delicious
and Nutritious Food presented in creative recipes

Organic
Cosmetic Shop where you can get skincare you can trust 

Beauty
Training School where newly qualified specialists can gain real experience
through unique training programs designed by experienced professionals


Function
Room where you can enjoy your drink in the company of great people with wonderful
live music performances


40
Seat Home-Style Cinema for watching documentaries, speeches and inspiring movies
designed for the ultimate feel of comfort


Lecture Room where courses on self-development, lifestyle, beauty and nutrition
would be held



Solo
Escape Meditation Rooms were you can hide away from the world for a while and reconnect with yourself.  There would be a Silent Room, Mantra
Room, and a Symphonic Music Room featuring color and imagery therapy 


Men’s
Grooming Wing for men who like to take good care of themselves. There is nothing as charming as a well-groomed and well-mannered man


Guest Bedrooms for a very special stay in Cork City




Kids
Drop off Point, happy days! Just imagine leaving your children in safe hands while you
pamper yourself or catch an inspiring lecture.


It is a big dream and I know that the funds I am looking for are not small and the work that needs to be done is tremendous but I have seen how people together can do incredible things! 
A lot of my motivation comes from a simple observation that a lot of men and women, and especially women, struggle to like and feel good about themselves - What to wear?  What to eat?  Am I too fat?  Is my make-up looking o.k?  Am I beautiful enough?  Hours and hours are spent in front of the mirror and are we ever fully happy with what we see?  The reflection in the mirror has taken over the real person.  We need to look more carefully to see clearly, we need to look within. 

Beauty starts with
     taking good care of yourself - your intellect , your body and your feelings.  It is a way to develop a contented character, a healthy body and a  heart that is filled with hope, love and happiness.  It can be hard work to get there but it is worth it!  It leads to meaningful relationships, a satisfying life and lasting happiness. A bit of my story 

I
grew up in a small town in Latvia.  There was a time when I believed I would never board a
plane, it was something only privileged people got to do.  We got to visit the airport with my class teacher to see the air planes.  Through a child's eyes they were amazing and I dreamed of taking flight one day.


At
the age of 19 I boarded my first flight to Ireland.  Times had changed fast and flying had become affordable.  English was the language I always wanted to learn. Cork, a beautiful and charming city, became my home.I
grew fond of Irish people immediately, I found them kind, friendly, very helpful,
and full of cheer. 

I
started working in bars and retail shops.  Soon enough I found myself itching to
become master of some trade.  At age 21 I embarked on my first nail course. Breaking into the beauty industry
was harder than I imagined, but the joy of making people happy and being able to listen to so many life stories kept me
going.


Eight
years went by, I did a lot of growing up, explored the world, and worked for
different salons.  I started to dream of my own salon, I had a clear, vivid vision
of how it would look and feel, and how it could change the concept of a beauty salon.

When
I found the Beauty Crime premises, at first my friends thought I was a mad woman and I
guess they had a good reason!
This is what we were facing..

Together
we embarked on the mission to make the impossible possible. It was three months of super hard work, a lot of worry but a lot of laughter too.There
was very little sleep and a lot of coffee with chocolate croissants. The abundant
support of my friends and family was invaluable. 
Today when I see people
enjoying themselves at Beauty Crime I think to myself – it was all worth it.

I wanted our clients to experience beauty with all of their senses. I wanted them to feel comfortable, to see beautiful surroundings, to inhale the mild calming scent of fresh flowers and incense with every breath.  I wanted them to forget about their daily worries, just sip away on delicious coffee, flip through inspiring books and truly indulge themselves in serenity while our friendly team of professionals are taking good care of them.  After a few  months I saw that Beauty Crime was becoming a very special place.

The Vision

Creating Beauty Crime on a
     bigger scale would be an amazing opportunity to provide everyone living and visiting Cork with wonderful and unforgettable experiences; a place where you can renew your energy and enjoy your time, a place where the true meaning of
     beauty can be revived, cherished and shared!  If this beautiful vision comes true who knows...  one day we might spread our wings to
     reach you overseas!
  What We Need & What You Get  
To buy the building €950,000 is needed.  I went inside the building three weeks ago, to 
take some pictures, and I got the floor plans.  I showed it all to my 
brother to see if it would be architecturally possible.  My brother Ervin 
has been passionate about building since childhood, he builds houses 
from the foundation upwards, and completed the renovation at Beauty 
Crime premises as well as custom made all the wooden furniture. I call 
him the  man with "golden hands" and have always admired his skill, 
creativity and precision.  We estimate that the renovations, refurbishing and opening to the public will cost us € 1.500 000. If  we don't manage to get enough funding to buy and renovate the 
beautiful white building on Grand Parade, we can explore other possibilities of how to invest the funds to expand and make some of these wonderful things come true.  All our supporters that purchased Treatment Vouchers are welcome to book and enjoy their treatments at our current beauty salon: Beauty Crime on 10 Cornmarket Street, Cork, Ireland .
 Everyone who contributed by purchasing products from our ELIER Organic Skin Care Perks will receive their package soon after the funds are transferred with a little thank you token!This is how you can support us! 
Voucher PERKS* 



You can purchase a voucher for your preferred treatment to pamper yourself or your loved ones and you can always use the amount on the voucher for an alternative treatment! 
If you are not living in Ireland who knows you might visit us one day, and we will be happy to see you even few years down the line as there is no expire date on the vouchers!
NAIL CARE Treatments









*The clients with the Hand and Foot Treatment Vouchers will enjoy extended            hand/foot massage!*Your Total Saving on 6D Brows is €100Thank You for supporting us by purchasing our Treatment Voucher Perks.  You can start to redeem your vouchers from February 2016 at Beauty Crime, 10 Cornmarket Street, Cork, Ireland. We will be able to accept 10 vouchers a week to keep our current business healthy.
 Natural Skin Care PERKS 

ELIER - Highly Organic Mud Cosmetics




I chose a relatively new brand of natural cosmetics for the
treatments we offer at Beauty Crime and as you might have never heard about ELIER before, I will give you some insights.The company and the products are based on Organic Mud that has been used in skin regeneration for more than 200 years.
I started to use Elier 3 years ago when I decided to spend a summer at my parents’ house after coming home from 6 months of traveling in India. 
My Mom had become a true admirer of the brand which meant that wherever I
turned there was a bottle of Elier.  What I loved immediately were the scents and
feel of all the products – light, smooth, natural, truly elegant.  Twice a week
we covered ourselves in Elier Organic Mud and enjoyed the pleasant heat of traditional Latvian sauna, which increases the effect of the mud.  After this process I felt like a new born baby,
clean and pure inside out.  Two months later I was in love with Elier and in many ways this new found love added inspiration for me to open a beauty place that
embraces health, a place where the least possible amount of chemicals are used.
Elier has a beautiful history.  The Organic Mud has been used
in skin regeneration treatments for more than 200 years.  The known history dates back to the time of the Russian Empire when Catherine the Great discovered Elier Mud in a
small village in the land where Latvia now is.  In 1785 Catherine the Great
opened a clinic for the people, before that it was used only by the royal family.
The clinic remained open until World War II.  Later the natural reserve of
Elier Organic Mud was bought by a private investor.
At the time there was no scientific research done, and there
was no clarity on why the mud was so effective in skin regeneration.  The
research was started in 1999 by an international team of scientists in
Switzerland, the results were incredible - the underground caves that were
filled with Elier Mud over millions of years were formed from broken down flora
and fauna soaking through the ground.  The mud reservoir is like a living organism
capable of reproducing.  The composition of Elier Organic Mud has more than 800 biologically active substances that are
all present in human skin cells which means that our skin can easily recognize and absorb them.
 
ELIER

ELIER product formulas were developed in collaboration with
scientific laboratories. The Swiss ELIER Laboratory developed a 5-stage patented extraction technology that made it possible to extract highly organic substances and create a unique skin and
health care product range that could mark the end to your search for the perfect
product! 
Today the 800 organic components extracted from
Elier Organic Mud is recognized as Peloid Complex®.
Elier Peloid Complex® is a high concentration of active substances:
amino acids, vitamins, enzymes, minerals, micro- and macro-elements, natural
anti-oxidants and natural antibiotics. 
Peloid Complex® has a positive influence on blood micro-circulation and the state of the body's capillary system and lymphatic vessels.  It
activates the immune system, stabilizes the functioning of the nervous system and eliminates
toxic and metabolic intermediate products from skin cells, while enhancing their
vitality and process of regeneration.  It also provides a deep antioxidant effect,  and regulates the synthesis of collagen and elastane.

ELIER Treatment Perks










ELIER Skincare Perks

* Your Total saving on the Activlift Package is €73 *Your Total saving on Cellfood Package  €51We created the Full Face Care Packages for you to experience the real power of Elier Organics Cosmetics.  We recommend not to mix other products into your skincare routine in order to get maximum results.  In the package you have everything you need from your morning to evening skincare routines.  You will receive all directions on how, when and what to use as well as some essential beauty tips.
*Your Total saving on Fresh Start Package is €17*Your Total saving for Shower Perfect Package is €28
*Your Total saving on Men's Care Package €40



ELIER Unique Skincare Perks
Elier Unique is luxury line from Elier.  The mud used in the Elier Unique range comes from the deepest layer of the reservoir and has the highest concentration of the active organic components.  Elier Unique brings you the quality of Professional Spa Products in the the comfort of your own home. 

* Your Total saving on Unique Face Care Package is €50* Your Total saving on Luxury Full Body Care Package is €105Thank You for supporting us by purchasing our Natural Skin Care Perks!  We will start posting out your packages soon after the funds are received.  You will be enjoying Elier before Christmas is here! 

 Other Ways You Can Help 
 Some of you might not be able to contribute, but it doesn't mean you can't help!
When I originally discovered Indiegogo I was enormously happy and excited that such a platform exists that can bring people together to support and inspire each other.  I never thought that I would end up exposing my dreams and hopes to the world.  I kindly ask you to make as much noise as possible, please share it with others!  You can use the Indiegogo share tools 

E-mail this link   

https://www.indiegogo.com/campaigns/unique-health-and-beauty-boutique

Facebook - share it on your timeline or message it to others

Our just tell your friends!


Thank You from the bottom of my heart!

Sincerely,
Ilze and The Beauty Crime Crew

story:
Team Canada has been selected for IFMA's 2015 Royal World Cup International Tournament on August 13th-23rd, and we want them to bring home gold.

Travelling internationally is expensive and we want to help lighten the load for our athletes so they can focus on their training and nutrition. Travel & tournament expenses alone are $3,500 per athlete. The better we can ease their financial burdens, the better chance of success each one will have.

Our aim is to establish Ontario as a predominant source of world class athletes for the sport of amateur Muay Thai. However, performing at this level presents substantial challenges outside the ring. Funding, in particular, is the biggest barrier to high level amateur competition and, in order for our athletes to reach the world stage, they need your support. Ontario has historically been underrepresented on Team Canada, and we want that to change. We have a wealth of Muay Thai talent in our province and this is our time to put Ontario on the map.

This fundraiser is for the benefit of four athletes who represent our province on Team Canada:

·  Noel Hussey of West City Muay Thai

·  Janice Lyn of Krudar Muay Thai

·  Matt Mackillop of Siam No. 1

·  Christine Doyle of Siam No. 1

The International Federation of Muaythai Amateur is the highest level organization for amateur Muay Thai and considered the Olympic level of the sport. Each year, IFMA holds an international tournament with this year's being the Royal World Cup in Bangkok, Thailand. Athletes that go to IFMA are considered the best in the amateur circuit, and many champions go on to successful professional careers.

You can help the Ontario athletes with your donations. Any fundraiser perk that has a physical reward will have a cost to cover, with any remaining profit being divided evenly among the team. If physical rewards aren't your thing you can donate any amount without selecting a perk and all the funds will go straight to the athletes. Alternatively you can mail a cheque to

Muay Thai Ontario

153-155 Limestone Crescent
Toronto ON, M3J 2R1

Our goal is raise $5,200 for the team ($1,300 per athlete) which is only a portion of the travel expenses. If we're extremely successful, any additional funding will still be disbursed to the athletes, up to $14,000; funds donated beyond this amount will be set aside for future athlete travel. Should we not reach our goal any received funds will still be distributed equally among the athletes.

All donors will be listed permanently on MuayThaiOntario.org.

$1-15: Donor

$16-50: Bronze Donor

$51-99: Silver Donor

$100-199: Gold Donor

$200-500: Provincial Champion Donor

$500-999: National Champion Donor

$1000+: World Champion Donor

There are direct expenses related to the Royal World Cup, totalling $3,500.

·  $1700 for a round-trip flight to Thailand;

·  $1,500 for 10-nights of accommodation and food;

·  $200 in registration fees; and

·  $100 in team uniforms.

The athletes have to train incredibly hard in preparation for competition, incurring additional expenses in the form of

·  Specialized coaching (Strength, conditioning, sports doctors, exercise therapy);

·  Proper nutrition;

·  Equipment; and

·  Training camps.

Our athletes are incredible role models and act as ambassadors for our country. With consistent support they will continue to inspire future generations of Canadians.

Considering this is our first fundraiser, we'll be establishing a new means of support and setting a precedent in Ontario. We aim to be trailblazers in the community when it comes to finding financial support for our athletes so they can represent our country on a national or international stage. Future opportunities will be built out of this success, establishing a legitimacy for the sport and allow even greater resources to be rallied behind our athletes.

We want to learn from our experiences, grow as a community and continue to represent Canada with our provincial athletes. It's important to us that Ontario play an integral role in the sport of Muay Thai in Canada. You can help us do that by supporting our athletes as they prepare to travel overseas.

Yes, there are some risks

As is the case with any sport, there's always the risk that an athlete can get injured during the training leading up to competition. In the event of a withdrawal from the event, the funds will be evenly distributed among the remaining athletes representing Ontario. Unfortunately Olivia Loth of Krudar has injured her knee and had to withdraw; we wish her a speedy recovery!

As a thank you most levels of donations have a perk attached to them. What's a perk? A perk is either a physical good or service that Muay Thai Ontario will facilitate delivering to you once the fundraiser ends. We have partnered with InFightStyle to bring you EXCLUSIVE #TeamOntario2015 apparel and gear, that will only be made for this limited run.

PLEASE NOTE: There may be minor variances between the product images and finished product.














There are other ways you can support Muay Thai in Ontario than through financial donations. Share our fund-raising campaign on various social media platforms and help get the word out on the street. If you have the time, you can volunteer, or, alternatively, Muay Thai Ontario is always looking for talented individuals who want to assist with our campaign effort.

story:
What is Humanitree House?

Humanitree House is an organic cold pressed juice bar located in Augusta, Georgia.


Those of you that have come to know us since the conception of Humanitree House may be aware of our community service component.  Currently our raw organic juices are $4 below the national market price.  We are attempting to keep our prices low to ensure that more of the community can afford them. However, our community giving can't continue if we aren't making the profit to give from the excess. So we decided to launch this effort specifically for those who have a need but not the resources. We know that we can't possibly help everyone. BUT if we can help ONE, that's a blessing within itself.

While we are a small locally owned businesses, we spend a lot of time, money and energy helping those in the community who otherwise may not be able to afford a juice, a healthy lunch or get some advice and assistance toward leading a healthier lifestyle.  Currently, we are faced with not being able to afford to outreach at all; which we feel will hinder the energetic flow of why we decided to open Humanitree House.   Some of the things we desire to do include workshops, classes, guest teachers, life coaches and those who can help to shift the dynamic from hurting to healthy in our beautiful city.

How you Can Help

We decided to launch a pay it forward initiative. Your $10 or more gift will help us to continue this effort. We often don't talk about what we do in terms of outreach, however, we don't want to lose the ability to do it. Your $10 or more donation can help us provide a juice and a meal to someone who may have a need. It is not designed to feed or provide for the same person daily. However, DAILY someone comes in that needs assistance.  From the occasional person who really needs something healthy in their body and realizes at the register that they can't afford $7 for a juice; the person who just found out they have an illness and needs a consultation on where to start; or the young person who lives in a house where unhealthy food is the norm, but seeks out Humanitree House to get a juice a week just to pump some veggies in their system.

The Impact

 Your donations will help us to make healthy food and cold pressed juice accessible to people who otherwise would only have access to fast food and processed meals.  By doing this we can be a part of the change to shift the occurrences of childhood obesity and other diet related illnesses. (i.e. high blood pressure, type II diabetes and more).

Challenges

When people walk through the doors of Humanitree House it immediately transforms their thoughts. They often forget that they are inside of a small, locally owned, business and they often wonder why we can't just give it all away for free.  We are willing to take the risk of having to repeatedly explain the challenges of being a small business, serving organic food and juice for way below market price. Hence, explaining why we can't afford to continue our outreach without your help.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please get the word out about our campaign! Share it! Talk About it!


We Need You!  If you've had opportunity to spend 5 minutes talking to us then you already know how much we attempt to give! Help us....F.E.E.D. those in Augusta with needs but not necessarily the financial resources.

story:
Spanish version

________________________________________________

KIRI KIDS, El proyecto.

La lectura es un eje fundamental como instrumento de aprendizaje permanente, ya que permite la adquisición y fundamentación de conocimientos, mejora las capacidades de innovación, comunicación, imaginación, organización del pensamiento en niños y adultos, etc. 

KIRI KIDS será el lugar idóneo en El Salvador, en el que las actividades lúdicas están a la orden del día, diseñado especialmente para que la lectura sea una prioridad en la dinámica enseñanza-aprendizaje, en cuyos espacios se rescate el entusiasmo de los juegos tradicionales y en el que las relaciones humanas a través de los juegos esté presente.

Queremos que KIRI KIDS sea el espacio y la opción para que los niños y niñas de El Salvador pasen su tiempo libre, ya sea después de la escuela o en periodos de vacaciones, donde niñas y niños con su creatividad sean co-creadores de métodos lúdicos y de cooperación para propiciar la motivación a la lectura y posicionar simultáneamente los juegos tradicionales de nuestro país, así como el arte y la cultura por medio de teatro, danza, pintura y talleres de desarrollo artístico. 

En este espacio se configurará la amalgama perfecta que dará lugar al detonante de todas las potencialidades que niñas y niños adquieren desde que nacen, y las cuales se irán desarrollando en la medida en que las personas adultas creemos las condiciones para que sean descubiertas!

NUESTROS PRIMEROS PASOS

En nuestra primera fase, KIRI KIDS iniciará la adecuación del espacio para la librería, área de lectura, mini teatro, y jardín de juegos.

En la librería podremos encontrar todos aquellos libros que despierten la imaginación, promuevan el arte y la cultura en nuestras niñas y niños, así como un pequeño espacio para juguetes artesanales, imaginativos o relacionados con los libros.

En el espacio de lectura se dará vida a historias de la literatura infantil, didáctica y educación en general por medio de cuentacuentos, títeres u otros métodos a través de los cuales nuestros hijos e hijas se convertirán en los personajes principales de las historias.

En el mini teatro llevaremos a cabo talleres de poesía, teatro y danza infantil; todos encaminados a la promoción y animación hacia la lectura así como la difusión de audiovisuales en el que se proyecte films o cortos relacionados a personajes o historias de libros.

Nuestro jardín será adecuado como el espacio propicio en el que reviviremos los juegos tradicionales al aire libre, utilizando dinámicas con los habituales juegos que nuestra generación disfrutó (peregrina, hule, trompo, arranca-cebolla, etc.).

QUEREMOS IR POR MÁS

Con el crecimiento en visitas de nuestro espacio único para niños y niñas, esperamos construir cabañas (2) en nuestro jardín, en las cuales podamos hacer campamentos o “pijamadas” donde la experiencia de contar historias sea inigualable, y sean los mismos niños y niñas quienes promuevan la aventura de adentrarse en el mundo de sueños que la lectura les proporciona.

Además queremos incluir un espacio dedicado únicamente para actividades o talleres de jardinería en el cual los niños y niñas puedan tener experiencias asociadas a la madre tierra y la importancia del cuidado de la naturaleza.

Otra de las fases que queremos incluir en nuestro crecimiento es un pequeño laboratorio en el cual se enseñe robótica, diseño y electrónica.

Asimismo el crecimiento del proyecto dará lugar a una nueva iniciativa de una librería rodante a través de la cual podamos dar la oportunidad a niños de escasos recursos a tener acceso a lectura y actividades de estimulación y motivación a ese inimaginable mundo de los libros.

LAYOUT / DISTRIBUCIÓN DE KIRI KIDS (projected)

IMPACT / IMPACTO


KIRI KIDS, The Project (SEE THE SPANISH VERSION)

Aware that reading is a cornerstone of lifelong learning as a tool because it allows the acquisition and foundation of knowledge, improved innovation capabilities, communication, imagination, organization of thought, etc. 

KIRI KIDS will be the ideal place in El Salvador, where ludic activities are , specially designed to make of reading a priority in the dynamic teaching and learning, in which spaces the excitement of rescue  traditionals games  and  human relationships through games.

We want KIRI KIDS to be the space and the option for the children of El Salvador spend their free time, either after school or during holiday periods, where they with their creativity are co-creators of special methods of cooperation to promote reading motivation and simultaneously positioning the traditional games of our country, as well as art and culture through theater, dance, painting and artistic development workshops. In KIRI KIDS perfect amalgam that will lead to the trigger for the potential that children acquire from birth, and which will be developed to the extent that adults believe the conditions to be discovered!

OUR FIRST STEPS

In our first phase, KIRI KIDS begin adapting the space for the library, reading area, mini theater, and playground.

In the library we can find all those books that spark the imagination, promote the art and culture of our children as well as a small craft toys area, with imaginative toys associated with books.

The reading area will bring to life stories of children, teaching and literature education through storytelling, puppetry or other methods through which our sons and daughters will become the main people of the stories.

In the mini theater we will conduct poetry workshops, theater and children's dance; all aimed at the promotion and animation to reading and audiovisual broadcasting in which short films or characters or stories related to books is projected.

Our garden will be suitable as a favorable space in which to relive traditional outdoor games, using dynamic with the usual games played our generation (pilgrim, rubber, spinning, arrancacebolla, etc.).

WE WANT TO GO FOR MORE 

With the growth in visits from our unique space for children, we hope to build 2 small wooden houses in our garden, where we can do camps or "sleepovers" where the experience of storytelling is unique, and are the same children who promote adventure into the world of dreams that reading provides.

We also want to include a space dedicated solely to gardening workshops or activities in which children may be associated with Mother Earth experiences and the importance of caring for nature.

Another phase that we include in our growth is a small laboratory in which teach robotics, electronics and design.

Also the growth of the project will result in a new initiative of a mobile library through which we can provide an opportunity for underprivileged children to have access to reading and activities of stimulation and motivation to that unimaginable world of books.




NOTA: La entrega de recompensas para Salvadoreños en El Salvador se efectuará a partir de septiembre de 2015, sin ningún cargo adicional.
CUALQUIER CONTRIBUCIÓN DE SALVADOREÑOS EN EL SALVADOR OBTENDRÁN UNA SESIÓN GRATUITA DE MOTIVACIÓN A LA LECTURA  PARA SU HIJO  O HIJA.
